description: Give an ally +2|+0 or +0|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 or +0|+3 this round.
flavorText: "Never fear change. It will question you, test your limits. It is our greatest teacher." - Karma
name: Twin Disciplines

description: Give an ally +0|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +0|+3 this round.
name: Discipline of Fortitude

description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
name: Discipline of Force

description: When you <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy, I deal 2 to it.
descriptionRaw: When you Stun or Recall an enemy, I deal 2 to it.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You Stun or Recall 5+ units.
flavorText: "Death is like the wind..."
name: Yasuo

description: When you <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy, I strike it.
descriptionRaw: When you Stun or Recall an enemy, I strike it.
flavorText: "...always by my side."
name: Yasuo

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an attacking enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Yasuo</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an attacking enemy.
Create a Yasuo in your deck.
flavorText: "Hasagi!" - Yasuo
name: Yasuo's Steel Tempest

description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: "On this day, yours will become the face of discipline, training, humility, and balance. Today, you become Kinkou."
name: Keeper of Masks

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Lifesteal this round.
flavorText:
"During winter's reign, we heard the tread of
Footsteps 'cross the snowy floor. 
In its wake, new vine and leaf emerged to rearrange
The forest floor and herald season's change."
- Shon-Xan poem
name: Herald of Spring

description: When you <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit, grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you Stun or Recall a unit, grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: "Oh, so you think I'm 'cute'? 'Fuzzy'?? Let's see how 'adorable' you find THIS!"
name: Fae Bladetwirler

flavorText: "Once, this place held our schools, our temples, our homes. Now, we are left to skulk about its shadow-infested ruins. Zed's Order has defiled the legacy of this sacred place--I will be sure they regret it."
name: Kinkou Lifeblade

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
descriptionRaw: Round End: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You're Enlightened.
flavorText: "Through reflection, we can focus the mind, and find a path around any obstacle."
name: Karma

description:
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
When you play a spell, copy it with the same targets.
descriptionRaw:
Round End: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
When you play a spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavorText: "We'll bring peace to Ionia, whatever the cost."
name: Karma

description:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Create 2 instead.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Karma</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
Enlightened: Create 2 instead.
Create a Karma in your deck.
flavorText: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma
name: Karma's Insight of Ages

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally.
flavorText: The wise combatant knows not only tenacity, but restraint. A successful retreat guarantees a chance to fight a better fight.
name: Recall

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> with my stats.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Living Shadow with my stats.
levelupDescription: I've seen myself or my shadows <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> the enemy Nexus twice.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen myself or my shadows strike the enemy Nexus twice.
flavorText: "Balance is a fool's master. The shadows have shown me true power."
name: Zed

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> with my stats and positive keywords.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Living Shadow with my stats and positive keywords.
flavorText: "Few men think to look back at their shadow. It is their last mistake."
name: Zed

description:
<link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Zed</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
Create a Zed in your deck.
flavorText: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?
name: Zed's Shadowshift

flavorText: A blade of shadow is as sharp as one of steel.
name: Living Shadow

description: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in hand +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in hand +1|+1.
flavorText: Ionian knowledge is outlined in the written word, but it is the tales and teachings of Ionia's venerated elders that give ancient text new life.
name: Greenglade Elder

flavorText: "This might sound crazy, but the last thing I remember was a... fuzzy sensation...?" - Navori Brigand
name: Nimble Poro

description: To play me, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
descriptionRaw: To play me, Recall an ally.
flavorText: "C'mon, we gotta get out of here! My name? I'll explain on the way, I promise...."
name: Navori Conspirator

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3.
flavorText:
"In times of conflict, villagers sought the ancient guardian of Autumn Valley. Those who swayed her heart were granted blessings that could turn the tide of battle."
- Saga of the First Lands
name: Jeweled Protector

description: Grant all allies in hand +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Grant all allies in hand +1|+0.
flavorText: "Not just seeds, younglings. The legacy of the land itself, promises for our prosperous future." - Karma
name: Sown Seeds

description: Remove <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> from an ally to grant it to an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Remove Ephemeral from an ally to grant it to an enemy.
flavorText: "I am the blade in the darkness." - Zed
name: Death Mark

description: Grant ALL battling followers <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant ALL battling followers Ephemeral.
flavorText: When the flows of magic are diverted from their balanced state, they surge from the spirit world into the mortal realm--often with startling results.
name: Shadow Flare

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
flavorText: “Took years to cultivate this deadly physique! Tireless days of spotting birds, describing clouds, and lifting tray after tray of sweet buns! Who else has such dedication?”
name: Inspiring Mentor

description: Summon 2 exact copies of an ally. They're <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 exact copies of an ally. They're Ephemeral.
flavorText: "Shen is one man caught between the perils of two worlds, he will fail them both. I devote myself to Ionia alone." - Zed
name: Dawn and Dusk

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant me +3|+0 or +0|+3.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant me +3|+0 or +0|+3.
flavorText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.
name: Scaled Snapper

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
flavorText:
Gracefully she glides
Noiseless steps in the shadows
Claws the only trace.
name: Shadow Assassin

flavorText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.
name: Scaled Snapper

flavorText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.
name: Scaled Snapper

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Barrier this round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen allies gain Barrier 5+ times.
flavorText: "Like hands clasped, the mortal and spirit realms intertwine..."
name: Shen

description:
<link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
When an ally gets <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>, give it +3|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw:
Support: Give my supported ally Barrier this round.
When an ally gets Barrier, give it +3|+0 this round.
flavorText: "...Their actions exist in harmony, and under my watch, neither shall overtake the other."
name: Shen

description:
Swap 2 allies. Give them <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Shen</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Swap 2 allies. Give them Barrier this round.
Create a Shen in your deck.
flavorText: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen
name: Shen's Stand United

flavorText: "What would you sacrifice for power? Your path begins with an oath, and ends only when it has taken all you have to give." - Zed
name: Shadow Fiend

description: Give an ally +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +1|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: Combat is merely a race to take the life of another before they take yours.
name: Rush

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun 2 enemies.
flavorText: "When I was a child, I asked my brother: 'Does the wind flee, or does it follow?' He followed me then for guidance. I follow him now for justice."
name: Yone, Windchaser

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Stun 2 enemies.
flavorText: "Stand aside. I have come for the Unforgiven." - Yone, Windchaser
name: Staggering Strikes

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create an exact copy of a card in hand other than <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Zephyr Sage</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Create an exact copy of a card in hand other than Zephyr Sage.
flavorText:
"As the warrior wept for his loss, the elder consoled him: 'Seek the sage of the skies. Only he can return that which is lost to this world, but still held in memory.'"
- Saga of the First Lands
name: Zephyr Sage

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Reduce the cost of the most expensive unit in your hand by 1.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Reduce the cost of the most expensive unit in your hand by 1.
flavorText: "Patrol, we've one... no... TWO massive furry creatures coming our way! Call for ba--Oh. Hold on. Scope's wrong way 'round again..."
name: Greenglade Lookout

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> 3 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Play: Recall 3 enemies.
flavorText: "There we were, tearing across the meadow and suddenly, this KID just leaps out from nowhere and BAM, BAM, BAM--knocks the wind right outta us!" - Navori Brigand
name: Minah Swiftfoot

description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 4. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 4. Draw 1.
flavorText: "Only when the mind is elevated can the body be made whole." - Karma
name: Ritual of Renewal

description: Swap 2 allies. Give them <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Swap 2 allies. Give them Barrier this round.
flavorText: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen
name: Stand United

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Elusive this round.
flavorText: "Stay hidden, and do not return until your task is finished." - Zed
name: Ghost

description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
flavorText:
"Spring blooms first on Ionia's cliffsides, where the beating of newly formed wings bathes the land in the season's gentle breezes."
- Saga of the First Lands
name: Windfarer Hatchling

description:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Create 2 instead.
descriptionRaw:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
Enlightened: Create 2 instead.
flavorText: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma
name: Insight of Ages

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a copy of me in hand.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a copy of me in hand.
flavorText: "Flesh is untrustworthy. Fragile. Delicate as the borders between light and shadow."
name: Silent Shadowseer

description: Your <link=keyword.Burst><sprite name=Burst><style=Keyword>Burst</style></link> and <link=keyword.Focus><sprite name=Focus><style=Keyword>Focus</style></link> spells cost 1 less.
descriptionRaw: Your Burst and Focus spells cost 1 less.
flavorText: Its songs could be heard from the villages--long, low waves of sound rippling from sky to hillside, each as formless and strange as the afternoon clouds.
name: Cloud Drinker

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit.
descriptionRaw: Recall a unit.
flavorText: When invaders first set foot on Ionian soil, they found that conquering the land's inhabitants alone would not be enough.
name: Will of Ionia

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> 3 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Recall 3 enemies.
flavorText: "We go FLYING and next thing I know I'm flat on my back!" - Navori Brigand
name: Skyward Strikes

description: When I'm summoned, give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give me Elusive this round.
flavorText: "I'll get the drop on him, no problem. Get me outta there and I'll split the loot with you, make it more than worth your while!"
name: Navori Bladescout

description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: "What's the point of fighting if there's no one to see your moves?"
name: Sparring Student

description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
flavorText:
"Hey, watch those branches! Left, LEFT!" 
"When I'm on YOUR shoulders, Fuzzball, we can go wherever you want. 'Til then, I got this!"
name: Greenglade Duo

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon a 1 cost ally from your deck.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Summon a 1 cost ally from your deck.
flavorText: Wherever she goes, she ensures that others can follow.
name: Kinkou Wayfinder

flavorText: "Your order has thrust us from our lands. You've proved your power, Master Zed. Now let me prove that I too am worthy of your teachings."
name: Yusari

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow Fiend</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Shadow Fiend in hand.
flavorText: “Run. Fight. Cower. It matters not, the shadows have come for you.”
name: Ren Shadowblade

description: <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have +4|+4.
descriptionRaw: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
flavorText: "War is fostered by our basest instincts. But instinct has no power over our highest virtues: trust, patience, and contemplation."
name: Emerald Awakener

description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
flavorText: Every generation, region, and family has its own home remedy--though some are undeniably more effective than others.
name: Health Potion

description: Stop a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stop a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill.
flavorText: No.
name: Deny

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Navori Brigand</style></link> with my stats.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Navori Brigand with my stats.
flavorText: “I was a traveling musician, known in every village 'ere to the Placidium--until the Noxians came. Now I'm scraping by on stolen coin. Mother was right, should've been a healer... ”
name: Navori Highwayman

flavorText: A bandit on the road means more in the brush.
name: Navori Brigand

flavorText: "The sky itself heaved as coils of clouds and powerful winds flattened our brigade. We tried to follow it, but who can chase the wind?" - Legion General
name: The Empyrean

description: When an ally gets <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>, grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When an ally gets Barrier, grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: "The glade protects its own. And you--you are not from here..."
name: Greenglade Caretaker

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an attacking enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an attacking enemy.
flavorText: "Hasagi!" - Yasuo
name: Steel Tempest

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Barrier and Lifesteal this round.
flavorText: "This blade was once my father's. May it bring you the strength that I once lacked." - Shen
name: Spirit's Refuge

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Draw a spell.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Draw a spell.
flavorText: "We are proud children of the First Lands, and the streams of her magic flow through our vastayan blood as they do through our realm."
name: Rivershaper

description: When I'm summoned, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> all other allies.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Recall all other allies.
flavorText: "Reflex and instinct are the only company I desire."
name: Solitary Monk

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
flavorText: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?
name: Shadowshift

description:
Grant <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Grant Barrier to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
flavorText: "Those who keep the balance shall know the protection of the Kinkou." - Shen
name: Ki Guardian

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spinning Axe</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or strike: Create a Spinning Axe in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've struck with 2+ total Spinning Axes.
flavorText: "You want an autograph? Get in line, pal."
name: Draven

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spinning Axes</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or strike: Create 2 Spinning Axes in hand.
flavorText: "WHAT'S MY NAME?"
name: Draven

description:
A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a battling enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Draven</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
A battling ally strikes a battling enemy.
Create a Draven in your deck.
flavorText: "I have the best job." - Draven
name: Draven's Whirling Death

description:
To play, discard 1.
Give an ally +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
Give an ally +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Yeah, his brother'd win one-on-one, but you see those axes spiraling... it's art, it is. Art." - Arena regular
name: Spinning Axe

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've had 5+ allies survive damage.
flavorText:
Vicious. Cold. Cruel. Intriguing. Perceptive. Charming.
Irresistible...
name: Vladimir

description: For each attacking ally on <link=card.vlad><style=AssociatedCard>Vladimir</style></link>'s right, deal 1 to it and <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: For each attacking ally on Vladimir's right, deal 1 to it and drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Delicious." - Vladimir
name: Crimson Pact

description: For each attacking ally on <link=card.vlad><style=AssociatedCard>Vladimir</style></link>'s right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: For each attacking ally on Vladimir's right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Delicious." - Vladimir
name: Crimson Pact

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Do you find my little fête banal, darling? Then let me give you a real show."
name: Vladimir

description:
Deal 1 to an ally and give another ally +2|+2 this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Vladimir</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to an ally and give another ally +2|+2 this round.
Create a Vladimir in your deck.
flavorText: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir
name: Vladimir's Transfusion

description: Kill a unit with 3 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Kill a unit with 3 or less Power.
flavorText: Everyone dies. The weak just die faster.
name: Culling Strike

description: When I survive damage, create a random Crimson unit in your hand.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, create a random Crimson unit in your hand.
flavorText: "Beloved companions!" "Were you? Well I received an invitation." "--Reveler's Ball! Yes!" "Then we must! I shall present my family." "Starters before dessert, my dear. And you, Kye? Will you attend?"
name: Crimson Curator

levelupDescription: I see the enemy Nexus has half of its starting Health or less.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I see the enemy Nexus has half of its starting Health or less.
flavorText: "An iron will and a titan's strength. There is no finer general to lead the Trifarian Legion." - Swain
name: Darius

description: When I'm summoned, grant other Spider allies +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other Spider allies +2|+0.
flavorText: A single glance and you're hers. A single bite and you're theirs.
name: Arachnoid Host

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Any fool can throw overwhelming force at the enemy. It takes vision to conceal that force until the decisive moment." - Swain
name: Decisive Maneuver

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: "Oh, how she captivates me! Her endless legs, voice of paralyzing sweetness, and eyes red as the rose. To think, she chose to dine with me tonight!" - Hapless Aristocrat
name: Arachnoid Sentry

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: It was not the kiss he had in mind.
name: Paralyzing Bite

description: Deal 1 to an ally to give another ally +2|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an ally to give another ally +2|+2 this round.
flavorText: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir
name: Transfusion

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Our Shieldbreakers can split a man in two. But the Legion has other talents at its disposal when it requires a more... discreet touch." - Swain
name: Legion Saboteur

flavorText: "Stand in our way and I'll cut you down myself!"
name: Darius

description:
Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Darius</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a Darius in your deck.
flavorText: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius
name: Darius' Decimate

description: Grant 2 allies +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Grant 2 allies +2|+0.
flavorText: "Bonds forged in war are just as strong as those of kinship. Indeed, blood is shared in both." - Legion Veteran
name: Brothers' Bond

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Spiderling.
flavorText: "My spiders love company. Shame that company never feels the same." - Elise
name: House Spider

description: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Edvin! There you are, handsome. I was just thinking of you!" "Each of us can go, now…" "Escort me. I'll make it fun." "Or nothing at all?"
name: Crimson Disciple

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: He roared with glee. For a moment, the heart of the arena pulsed in time with his and the excitement of the assembled masses was clutched in his triumphant hand.
name: Arena Battlecaster

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant allied Legion Marauders <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant allied Legion Marauders everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText: The Trifarian Legion is trailed by opportunistic brigands who prey on the weak and injured in its wake.
name: Legion Marauder

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
flavorText: Some reckoners are adored for their charisma. Others, for their swift technique. Vessid possesses neither, but no one turns a rival to splatter with more efficiency.
name: Crowd Favorite

description: A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a battling enemy.
descriptionRaw: A battling ally strikes a battling enemy.
flavorText: "I have the best job." - Draven
name: Whirling Death

description: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
flavorText: "WHO'S READY TO REEEEEECKONNNNNN?!" - Arena Battlecaster
name: Reckoning

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Boom." - Legion Saboteur
name: Sabotage

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> all enemies with 4 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Stun all enemies with 4 or less Power.
flavorText: “He’s taking a deep breath - we might get a - yes, there we have it, folks! That’s Thunder’s famous war cry! We’re all shaking in our boots out here, Thuuuunder!” - Arena Battlecaster
name: Intimidating Roar

description: When another ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When another ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0.
flavorText: He returned from the war on the brink of death, restored only by his husband's touch and the apothecary's balms. Noxus spared no expense to ensure his expert counsel, long after his fighting years.
name: Legion Veteran

description: I deal double damage to the Nexus.
descriptionRaw: I deal double damage to the Nexus.
flavorText: "He said what?! That man has bricks for brains. Can't fault those shoulders, though..."
name: Shiraza the Blade

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Blade's Edge</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Blade's Edge in hand.
levelupDescription: I've <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> once. When I level up, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've struck once. When I level up, Recall me.
flavorText: "Nothing like a little Demacian target practice to sharpen the senses..."
name: Katarina

description:
When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link> and create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Blade's Edge</style></link> in hand. It costs 0.
<link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, Rally and create a Fleeting Blade's Edge in hand. It costs 0.
Strike: Recall me.
flavorText: "No sir! Just a flash of red. Next thing I know, I look up and it... it was like a slaughterhouse in there." - Demacian border guard
name: Katarina

description:
Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Katarina</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
Create a Katarina in your deck.
flavorText: "Dance with me!" - Katarina
name: Katarina's Death Lotus

description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Decimates</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Decimates in hand.
flavorText: Deep in Zaun's Sump, young Benn Farron was labeled a menace. Unstable. Unacceptable. In the ranks of Noxus he was embraced. Awarded. Unstoppable.
name: Captain Farron

flavorText: In Noxus, where soldiers are revered for their audacity on the battlefield, rearguard duty is nothing short of a punishment.
name: Legion Rearguard

description: Deal 1 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to anything.
flavorText: "In the right hands, a blade can cut through anything... and I do mean anything." - Katarina
name: Blade's Edge

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Every Noxian is taught that a life spent in service to the empire is well spent, but few spend their lives as spectacularly as the Legion's grenadiers.
name: Legion Grenadier

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each unit you've Stunned or Recalled this game.
flavorText: All Noxians know the three Principles of Strength, but if a soldier is to rise through the ranks, they must learn to master them.
name: Legion General

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: The Legion spread the empire's reach with every beat of her drum. Nothing could stop them. Nothing did.
name: Legion Drummer

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Discard your lowest cost card to draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Discard your lowest cost card to draw 1.
flavorText: "...you bet on Shiraza as SOLE SURVIVOR, and that Ionian kid--sure he's missing an arm--but he ain't dead. Makes him a survivor, see? 'Course, you could always double down..."
name: Arena Bookie

description: When played or discarded, grant all allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When played or discarded, grant all allies +1|+0.
flavorText: "Those who cannot see the future have no place in it." - Jericho Swain
name: Vision

flavorText: "I don't have the patience for a siege. Send the Shieldbreakers." - Darius
name: Trifarian Shieldbreaker

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Stun the weakest enemy.
flavorText: "I don't care who wronged you or what they did. You need me to make it right in the pit, you pay up front. There's no discount for sad stories."
name: Minotaur Reckoner

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +4|+0.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant me +4|+0.
flavorText:
"Sir, they're refusing to open their gates. They've demanded to speak with Darius, but he's two days' ride away. Should we send riders?"
"Oh, that won't be necessary."
name: Battering Ram

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +2|+0.
flavorText: "Ah, you too? To the Reveler's B--" "How am I to tolerate mine?" "Respectfully, my dear, my father would disown me. ...perhaps we should wear matching dresses."
name: Crimson Aristocrat

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
flavorText: "You'll earn the title when your axe is blunt with battle and your boots're sopped with blood." - Legion Veteran
name: Trifarian Hopeful

description: Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: "When I say subtlety is overrated, that doesn't mean it isn't good. It's just overrated." - Darius
name: Might

flavorText: She loves them all. She just loves this one more.
name: Precious Pet

description: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
flavorText: "Dance with me!" - Katarina
name: Death Lotus

description: Deal 2 to an enemy, then <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy, then Rally.
flavorText: By the time you've seen the blade, it's far too late.
name: Shunpo

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
flavorText: "It takes a ruthlessly discerning eye to select those worthy enough to become part of the Trifarian Legion, but she can sort the wolves from the sheep a mile away." - Legion General
name: Trifarian Assessor

description: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
flavorText: Nothing is messier than a hemomancer's first lesson.
name: Blood for Blood

flavorText: "Next up, CLAWS! Last time was a BLOODY takedown versus the Psycho Five... now the Psycho Three. Allllright! Takin' bets on today's victim! Four to one!" - Karl, Arena Bookie
name: Savage Reckoner

flavorText: Earning a place in the Trifarian Legion is good enough for most, but not all.
name: Trifarian Gloryseeker

description: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius
name: Decimate

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Grant me +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
flavorText: This particular unit does use horses, just not for riding. The beasts find them delicious.
name: Basilisk Rider

flavorText: "Noxus has no room for... for weakn--Will someone get this DAMNED THING OFF ME?!" - Darius
name: Affectionate Poro

description: When I'm summoned, move <link=card.dravenRef><style=AssociatedCard>Draven</style></link> to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, move Draven to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
flavorText: "You want an autograph? Get... Get in line, pal!"
name: Draven's Biggest Fan

flavorText: "Recklessness is a fault. Tempered by the Legion, it becomes a tool." - Swain
name: Reckless Trifarian

description: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
flavorText:
"When the open hand is declined, there's always the fist."
- Noxian axiom
name: Elixir of Wrath

description: Kill a damaged unit to create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Noxian Guillotine</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Kill a damaged unit to create a Fleeting Noxian Guillotine in hand.
flavorText: To Darius, mercy is a deft blow.
name: Noxian Guillotine

description: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
flavorText: "Even if I said 'no', you'd drag me along. So... sure."
name: Crimson Awakener

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: "Shiraza is a great girlfriend--I mean friend--and we are in no way dating. But if we were, I would like her to know that I wish her a happy anniversary. Thank you, no more questions."
name: Kato The Arm

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: "Allow your enemies enough rope to hang themselves and you'll save yourself the effort." - LeBlanc
name: Guile

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Grant other allies +1|+1 if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: Round End: Grant other allies +1|+1 if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Evil has taken the hour, but it will not win the day. Remember our fallen, and wear their memories like armor!"
name: Dawnspeakers

levelupDescription: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied Senna die.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied Senna die.
flavorText: "I'll be alright, Senna, long as I've got you."
name: Lucian

description: Reduce the cost of all allies in hand by 1.
descriptionRaw: Reduce the cost of all allies in hand by 1.
flavorText: "From the fields to the front in a fortnight. This is what we expect from each and every able body in Demacia." - Garen
name: Mobilize

levelupDescription: I've seen you play 6+ mana of spells.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, create a <link=card.warcry><style=AssociatedCard>Final Spark</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you play 6+ mana of spells. When I level up, create a Final Spark in hand.
flavorText: "I've always known there's something different about me... a light from within. I'm not sure what it is, but I have to find out!"
name: Lux

description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lux</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally Barrier this round.
Create a Lux in your deck.
flavorText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux
name: Lux's Prismatic Barrier

description: When you play 6+ mana of spells, create a <link=card.warcry><style=AssociatedCard>Final Spark</style></link> in hand. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When you play 6+ mana of spells, create a Final Spark in hand.
flavorText: "No more holding back!"
name: Lux

description: Deal 4 to an enemy. If there are no enemies, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to an enemy. If there are no enemies, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: "I've hidden my light for my whole life. What would happen if they knew... if *I* knew what I could really do?" - Lux
name: Final Spark

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a random Elite in hand.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create a random Elite in hand.
flavorText: "It takes a bold heart to trust their life to a silverwing, locked in combat far above solid ground. Bold, and highly durable." - Garen
name: Swiftwing Lancer

flavorText: "We didn't know who or what those creatures were. But we knew the faces of our fellow soldiers by our sides, and that was all we needed."
name: Vanguard Defender

description: When you summon an Elite, grant it +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an Elite, grant it +1|+1.
flavorText: Wars are won in the forge.
name: Battlesmith

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Rally.
flavorText: “Our House has bled for this realm. You’ll not throw away this family’s honor for a few tricks of light.”
name: Tianna Crownguard

description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've struck twice.
flavorText: Training and resilience are the way of a soldier. Even in the face of great peril, we will not falter.
name: Garen

description:
When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
Round Start: Rally.
flavorText: "You think me rigid. Single-minded. Predictable. I am rigid, for nothing can sway me. I am single-minded, for I believe in Demacia. And I am predictable, for I will surely defeat you.”
name: Garen

description:
A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> all battling enemies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Garen</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
A battling ally strikes all battling enemies.
Create a Garen in your deck.
flavorText: Justice always comes full circle.
name: Garen's Judgment

description: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
flavorText: When others fail, it falls upon the shoulders of a true hero to find a path to victory.
name: Stand Alone

levelupDescriptionRaw: I've killed 2 enemies.
flavorText: "From arena to tournament, training ground to battleground, I long for a worthy opponent. I will not rest until I know I am the greatest."
name: Fiora

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give all allies <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Attack: Give all allies Barrier this round.
flavorText: "This formation is the basis of our tactics. It requires the faith of each soldier in their shield, and in the shields of their companions. So long as they stand, so too shall our realm." - Garen
name: Brightsteel Formation

description: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Rally.
flavorText: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian
name: Relentless Pursuit

description:
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Rally.
Create a Lucian in your deck.
flavorText: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian
name: Lucian's Relentless Pursuit

description: Each round, the first time an ally dies, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time an ally dies, Rally.
flavorText: "World's full of monsters. If you're lucky, they're the ones you can see. The worst are the ones that stay under your skin."
name: Lucian

description: An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> a unit.
descriptionRaw: An ally Captures a unit.
flavorText: "Submit to us. We are the law and you are its subject. There is nothing more." - Mageseeker Persuader
name: Detain

description: A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> all battling enemies.
descriptionRaw: A battling ally strikes all battling enemies.
flavorText: Justice always comes full circle.
name: Judgment

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> to an ally in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant Challenger to an ally in hand.
flavorText: "He seemed a preening fop with an expensive blade--turns out he really knew how to swing that sword! I'd demand a rematch, but I missed his name with that ridiculous accent." - Demacian ensign
name: Laurent Duelist

description: Grant me +2|+2 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant me +2|+2 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "Long ago, the wild magicks of the Rune Wars brought all Runeterra to its knees. Thus, our order was created to protect our kingdom by ridding it of magic, whether abroad or within." - Mageseeker's Handbook
name: Mageseeker Inciter

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant other allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Grant other allies +1|+1.
flavorText: "You must understand the weight of our banner. It flies for our king, our houses, our citizens. It is our unwavering belief in Demacia itself. Hold it high. Show them our pride." - Tianna Crownguard
name: Vanguard Bannerman

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: No one in the Demacian army should be trifled with.
name: War Chefs

flavorText: "New recruit has the kind of endurance and courage shown by our finest soldiers. Will he make it to the Vanguard someday? He's... smaller than the rest, but we'll see." - Vanguard Sergeant
name: Plucky Poro

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create in hand another random <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> follower from your regions.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create in hand another random Challenger follower from your regions.
flavorText: "...Good grief." - Fiora
name: Laurent Chevalier

description: I cost 1 less for each ally that died this round. Summon a random 5 cost follower from Demacia.
descriptionRaw: I cost 1 less for each ally that died this round. Summon a random 5 cost follower from Demacia.
flavorText: "Today we rise to right the injustices that felled those before us. The sacrifices of our comrades were not in vain." - Radiant Guardian
name: Remembrance

description: When I've killed 4 enemies and survived, you win the game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I've killed 4 enemies and survived, you win the game.
flavorText: "... and now I know."
name: Fiora

description:
Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Fiora</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
Create a Fiora in your deck.
flavorText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora
name: Fiora's Riposte

description: Fully heal an ally, then double its Power and Health.
descriptionRaw: Fully heal an ally, then double its Power and Health.
flavorText: In Demacia, to be as good as two of the enemy isn't just a boast.
name: Redoubled Valor

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
flavorText:
"Arcane items have undeniable intrigue. But these objects of power are best left to the capable hands of our experts, and away from the well-meaning ignorance of our citizens."
- Mageseeker's Handbook
name: Mageseeker Conservator

description: When I'm summoned, summon an exact copy of me.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon an exact copy of me.
flavorText: They fell from the clouds like silvery bolts of lightning, swift and sure as they dove toward their targets. Then, as suddenly as they appeared, they were gone.
name: Silverwing Vanguard

flavorText: "He did WHAT? I entrusted him with Pierre de Guillard's priceless dual-balanced sabre! He said it was only to be used for training!" - Laurent Bladekeeper
name: Laurent Protege

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguard</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Dauntless Vanguard.
flavorText: Vestments of the Dauntless Vanguard are handed down from one soldier to the next, so that new recruits may feel the weight and pride of their responsibilities.
name: Succession

flavorText: Just because it's quiet doesn't mean it's safe.
name: Vanguard Lookout

description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a follower.
descriptionRaw: Silence a follower.
flavorText:
"Your petricite Graymark is your primary safeguard against magic, a symbol of our responsibilities, and a reminder to others of our authority. Honor it above all else."
- The Mageseekers' Handbook
name: Purify

flavorText: The Dauntless Vanguard are Demacia's most elite warriors, each a legend in their village or shire. But all of them seek to have their names known throughout the realm.
name: Dauntless Vanguard

description: Grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant me +1|+1 and Challenger once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "Citizens of Demacia, it is my honor to keep you safe. But we must demand your unwavering support, for even within our high walls, mages still walk among us!"
name: Mageseeker Persuader

description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
flavorText: "Everyone I met, every journey I took taught me something new. But the more I learned and the stronger I became, the more I realized I had much further to go..." - Cithria, Vanguard Squire
name: Vanguard Squire

description: Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
flavorText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora
name: Riposte

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguards</style></link>, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Dauntless Vanguards, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
flavorText:
"Our rivals know that to strike at any of us is to strike at all of us."
- The Vanguard's Code
name: Reinforcements

description: When I'm summoned, grant me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me Lifesteal and Tough if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Waves of cold undead hands pulled down her companions. Only she remained, a gleaming beacon of justice whose blade seemed to sing the names of the fallen with every swing." - Demacian ensign
name: Radiant Guardian

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally +2|+2.
flavorText: "Yes, they are beautiful. But like any fine instrument, they only reveal their true beauty in the hands of a master."
name: Laurent Bladekeeper

description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: An ally and an enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Save your words; we speak with blades." - Fiora
name: Single Combat

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavorText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux
name: Prismatic Barrier

description: Give all allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give all allies Challenger this round.
flavorText: "There's not a Demacian alive who would refuse a Laurent's lesson in swordsmanship. Or survived one, for that matter." - Fiora
name: En Garde

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>For Demacia!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a For Demacia! in hand.
flavorText: "He leads our drills from morning to night, and he's the first to head into the fray. Hard as steel, steady as stone--couldn't choose a finer leader." - Demacian ensign
name: Vanguard Sergeant

description: The first time an allied <link=card.luc1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> dies, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time an allied Lucian dies, grant me +1|+1 and Double Attack.
flavorText: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."
name: Senna, Sentinel of Light

description: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
flavorText:
"Cover me, I'm going in!"
"Funny, I was about to say the same to you."
- Lorn and Dax of the Eastern Battalion
name: Back to Back

description: Give all allies +3|+3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give all allies +3|+3 this round.
flavorText: “It is our homes, our families, our comrades in arms. It is our pride, our honor, our strength. And so, today, as we fight for its defense and its very existence, let us shout its name: DEMACIA!" - Vanguard Sergeant
name: For Demacia!

description: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: "Undead fight like they've got no tomorrow. We'll make sure they won’t get one." - Lucian
name: Radiant Strike

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavorText: "We are a prosperous nation because each warrior's fate is a coin we will never be content to spend." - King Jarvan III
name: Brightsteel Protector

flavorText: "Each night before bed, my mother would tell me stories of Demacia's greatest heroes as she sharpened her sword. My dreams were full of adventures, and today I'll begin a story all my own."
name: Cithria of Cloudfield

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant me +2|+2.
flavorText: The battle cry sounds, and my feet are already turning over the soil. I need nothing but my lady's order to know my destiny and enact her will.
name: Vanguard Firstblade

description: When you summon another ally, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally, grant me Challenger.
flavorText: These relatives of the silverwing raptors have the predatory instincts of their cousins alongside a dogged unfamiliarity with their own comparatively diminutive size.
name: Fleetfeather Tracker

flavorText: The Vanguard needed no drums, no music to keep time in their advance. Only the steady, even beat of hooves against soil.
name: Vanguard Cavalry

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Tough.
flavorText: Demacian steel is known throughout the world for its superior strength. Its forging requires smiths of equal strength and repute.
name: Chain Vest

description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Detain</style></link> in hand once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Create a Detain in hand once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "Forgive the intrusion, but we will require your full cooperation. We have been notified of some... 'unusual happenings'..."
name: Mageseeker Investigator

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+1 and Fearsome this round.
flavorText: "Legends, tales--they were never just fiction to me. They were adventure calling my name. I left Cloudfield to discover my own adventure, only to find I would have many. And they’re just beginning.”
name: Cithria the Bold

description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Our fallen shall be remembered in every battle cry, in every swing of our swords, and every crash of our shields! Today, we shall be victorious!"
name: Vanguard Redeemer

flavorText: Arrows rained down from the fortress walls in droves, but none could touch that fleck of silver darting through the sky.
name: Silverwing Diver

levelupDescription: I see your hand is empty.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I see your hand is empty.
flavorText:
"What'samatter, Fishbones?"
"I'm worried about you, Jinx! Every time you get bored, you..."
"...want to blow something up! Great idea, Fishbones!"
name: Jinx

description:
To play, discard 1. Deal 3 to anything.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jinx</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1. Deal 3 to anything.
Create a Jinx in your deck.
flavorText: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx
name: Jinx's Get Excited!

description: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus and 1 to all enemies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus and 1 to all enemies.
flavorText: "See ya!" - Jinx
name: Super Mega Death Rocket!

description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Draw 1.
Each round, the first time I level up or you empty your hand, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Super Mega Death Rocket!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Round Start: Draw 1.
Each round, the first time I level up or you empty your hand, create a Super Mega Death Rocket! in hand.
flavorText: "It's all just fun and games until something gets blown up - then it's a PARTY!"
name: Jinx

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've planted 15+ Poison Puffcaps.
flavorText: "Bandle Scout Rule 154: Never fear the unknown! Rule 276: Denizens of the woodlands are our friends! Rule 354: If it's fuzzy, it might be safe to pet but certainly isn't safe to eat! Rule 417..."
name: Teemo

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Double the <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Double the Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
flavorText: "... make sure you're out of the blast zone!"
name: Teemo

description:
Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Teemo</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
Create a Teemo in your deck.
flavorText: First, the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...
name: Teemo's Mushroom Cloud

description: When you play a spell, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Turret in hand with equal cost. It costs 0.
descriptionRaw: When you play a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. It costs 0.
levelupDescription: I've seen you summon 12+ Power of Tech allies.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you summon 12+ Power of Tech allies.
flavorText: "Mad scientist? Pft! I'm clearly a very-stable-if-slightly-disorganized-and-eclectic scientist, thank you very much!"
name: Heimerdinger

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
flavorText: His dreams cost him his hands, yet he persisted. Nothing would stand in his way.
name: Augmented Experimenter

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Create 4 copies of the supported ally in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Support: Create 4 copies of the supported ally in your deck.
flavorText: The boom of the cannons drew crowds toward the plaza, eager to see the show. It would take them weeks to wash the last of the confetti from their hair.
name: Parade Electrorig

description: When you play a spell, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Turret in hand with equal cost. Grant it +1|+1 and it costs 0.
descriptionRaw: When you play a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. Grant it +1|+1 and it costs 0.
flavorText: "PROGRESSSSS!"
name: Heimerdinger

flavorText:
"Safety precautions for the laboratory! Recent postings have mentioned young Jayce's workshop was raided by thieves. Ha--local intruders, beware!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 2
name: Mk2: Evolution Turret

flavorText:
"PROGRESS CONTINUES! I have finally found a way to combine the raw power of hexenergy with my ball tosser! I present, the STORMLOBBER! Now to sleep."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 4
name: Mk4: Stormlobber

description:
Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Heimerdinger</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
Create a Heimerdinger in your deck.
flavorText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!
name: Heimerdinger's Progress Day!

flavorText:
"Ah, the sweet smell of science! I have successfully upgraded my turrets! I must say... this model's appearance sends hypothermic waves through my vertebrae! Brr!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 3
name: Mk3: Apex Turret

flavorText:
"After a few production issues--propulsion and guidance, predominantly--I am ready to unveil my PROPELLED COMBUSTIBLES! ...must work on a better name."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 5
name: Mk5: Rocket Blaster

flavorText:
"I dreamt of a great mechanical beast, obeying my every command! I MUST realize this vision. First, stability tests, then ordnance and armor evaluation..."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 7
name: Mk7: Armored Stomper

flavorText:
"TODAY I EMBARK UPON A NEW SCIENTIFIC ADVENTURE: AUTOMATONS! As the saying goes, it takes a great mind to create great things! Who said that, you ask? Why, ME!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Preface
name: Mk0: Windup Shredder

flavorText:
"It occurred to me earlier that--with only two hands--I can only maximally operate two wrenches! My solution: MORE HANDS. Oho! I jest. A WRENCHBOT!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 1
name: Mk1: Wrenchbot

flavorText:
"I seem to have misplaced my latest work. And my mezzanine. I'm concerned about my bot, but the shrieking from the ceramics research laboratory gives me hope!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 6
name: Mk6: Floor-B-Gone

flavorText: How does she aim? That's an excellent question.
name: Academy Prodigy

description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana.
flavorText: Not everyone is cut out to further progress in Piltover immediately. Some need a little guidance--those who look at invention through the wrong lens, for instance.
name: Eager Apprentice

description: When you play a spell, plant 3 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: When you play a spell, plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText:
"These any good?"
"Of course! They're all top notch! Spoke to them myself!"
"Okay hand em--wait what?"
"Mmhmm! Getting married, this one!"
"How many have you had...?"
"--to a barnacle!"
name: Puffcap Peddler

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
descriptionRaw: Play: Obliterate the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
flavorText: "The narrow-minded Piltovans know only gears and metal, and cannot appreciate the delicate art in every stem, every petal, every cell of my cultivair. I will craft them an undeservedly graceful doom."
name: Corina Veraza

description: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
flavorText: "I told them that every achievement had its cost. I didn't tell them who would pay it." - Corina Veraza
name: Magnum Opus

flavorText: Everyone tries to chase it down. Poor little thing just wants to play in puddles!
name: Scrap Scuttler

flavorText:
"IT'S FINALLY COMPLETE! SIX-HUNDRED AND FIFTY-TWO FEET OF ROTARY-TEMPERED, HEX-PLATED, QUADRANIUM-CELL-POWERED STOMPING!!! My finest work, if I daresaysomyself."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 8
name: T-Hex

description: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
flavorText:
"Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Ow ow ow, ow ow ow!
Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Down we go, down we go!"
- Zaunite nursery rhyme
name: Poison Puffcap

description: When played or discarded, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrap Scuttler</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When played or discarded, summon a Scrap Scuttler.
flavorText: With a handful of scrap and mere moments left, the young inventor recalled an unusual source of inspiration: a creature she once saw scuttling along the rivers of a distant jungle.
name: Jury-Rig

description: Give an ally +4|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +4|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: "It kinda tickles when it starts to glow. That's normal... right?" - Ezreal
name: Rising Spell Force

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText:
"You sure about this?"
"Nope."
"You were supposed to say 'yes'."
"You weren't supposed to ask."
name: Boomcrew Rookie

description: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Time to go!" - Boomcrew Rookie
name: Undermine

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
flavorText: "Hello, fellow Chem-Barons!"
name: Shady Character

description: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
descriptionRaw: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
flavorText: Definitely not a pair of yordles in a suit.
name: Impersonate

description: When I'm summoned, summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Caustic Casks</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon 2 Caustic Casks.
flavorText: "Ziel sent ya? I told him, what's his is his. Can't refund somethin' I ain't ever seen before, can I? But, as it happens, I just received a batch of new casks I could be persuaded to part with..."
name: Used Cask Salesman

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard a card to draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard a card to draw 1.
flavorText: In the Sump, waste is never wasted.
name: Sump Dredger

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mystic Shot</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a Fleeting Mystic Shot in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've targeted enemies 8+ times.
flavorText: "Goggles? Check. Scarf? Check. Awesome gauntlet-with-magical-properties-that-I-totally understand? Check, check, aaaand check!"
name: Ezreal

description:
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mystic Shot</style></link> in hand.
When you play a spell, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. If it targeted an enemy, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw:
Nexus Strike: Create a Fleeting Mystic Shot in hand.
When you play a spell, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. If it targeted an enemy, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: "Impossible is my favorite kind of possible!"
name: Ezreal

description:
Deal 2 to anything.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ezreal</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to anything.
Create an Ezreal in your deck.
flavorText: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal
name: Ezreal's Mystic Shot

description: When I'm targeted, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm targeted, draw 1.
flavorText: Heir apparent to Piltover's prestigious Clan Medarda, Jae preferred hunting ancient artifacts over managing the family business... much to his father's chagrin.
name: Jae Medarda

description: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText: First is the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...
name: Mushroom Cloud

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard a card to draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard a card to draw 1.
flavorText:
"You'd think the sumprats would look after their own."
"Too busy basking in their self-pity, brother."
"Shame. Ah... have you seen my purse?"
name: Zaunite Urchin

description: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
flavorText: Progress, whatever the price.
name: Reckless Research

description: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random card for each <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Back Alley Barkeep</style></link> you've summoned this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random card for each Back Alley Barkeep you've summoned this game.
flavorText: "Yeah mate, it's got a slight kick the same way the Sump's got a slight smell. Bucket's by the songspinner."
name: Back Alley Barkeep

description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, 2 to another, and 1 to another.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, 2 to another, and 1 to another.
flavorText: "When you've got talent, there's no such thing as a lucky shot." - Ezreal
name: Trueshot Barrage

flavorText: Her first launch was pure accident: she slipped inside a Progress Day cannon while preening herself. Now she's the toast of Piltover, arcing across the sky to the adoring gasps of the crowds below.
name: Daring Poro

description: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck.
flavorText: Imitation is the sincerest form of thievery.
name: Counterfeit Copies

description: Deal 2 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to anything.
flavorText: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal
name: Mystic Shot

description: If you've played <style=Variable>20</style> cards with different names this game, summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Catastrophe</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: If you've played 20 cards with different names this game, summon Catastrophe.
flavorText: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan Project engineer
name: Purrsuit of Perfection

flavorText: Your end is MEOW.
name: Catastrophe

description: Transform a follower into an exact copy of another follower.
descriptionRaw: Transform a follower into an exact copy of another follower.
flavorText:
"YOU KEPT SAYING YOU WANTED TO LOSE WEIGHT."
"SO YOU TURNED ME INTO A YORDLE?!"
"YOU LOST WEIGHT!"
"...I'M ALSO A YORDLE!"
name: Hextech Transmogulator

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of me.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Summon an exact copy of me.
flavorText:
"Mr. Berz, we found you asleep INSIDE the vault, covered in golden cogs and clutching the safe's broken door."
"Weren't me. Jus' some fella wot look like me."
"You're still holding the door."
"Prove it."
name: Midenstokke Henchmen

description:
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
Draw 1.
flavorText: "And that's how we discovered arc discharge! Of course, my predecessor had hypothesized such an event, but underestimated the arc's reach. Poor fellow..." - Heimerdinger
name: Statikk Shock

flavorText: KILL. CRUSH. DESTROY. REPEAT.
name: Golden Crushbot

description: To play, discard up to 2 cards. Draw 1 for each card you discarded.
descriptionRaw: To play, discard up to 2 cards. Draw 1 for each card you discarded.
flavorText: "Oooooh, boy--FIVE ENFORCERS AND A GOLEM? Waitaminute! I have just the thing! Soooooomewhere..." - Jinx
name: Rummage

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrap Scuttlers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Scrap Scuttlers.
flavorText: Two gentle creatures, once separated by an impassable lane of land, were finally brought together in the tepid waters of the Sump.
name: Scrapdash Assembly

description:
To play, spend all your mana.
<style=Variable>Deal that much to a unit.</style>
descriptionRaw:
To play, spend all your mana.
Deal that much to a unit.
flavorText: "We've exhausted both our time and funds, and though the beam works, we haven't been able to regulate its energy consumption." - Zaunite experimenter
name: Thermogenic Beam

description: When you draw a card, give me +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you draw a card, give me +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: Imagination is the spark of great invention. Yet, it is research that makes the spark a conflagration.
name: Astute Academic
