description: Each round, the first 3 times you play a card, I play a Destiny Card.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first 3 times you play a card, I play a Destiny Card.
flavorText: "...it ain't gamblin' if you can't lose."
name: Twisted Fate

description:
Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 2 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. Give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Twisted Fate</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 2 at the next Round Start. Give them Fleeting.
Create a Twisted Fate in your deck.
flavorText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate
name: Twisted Fate's Pick a Card

description:
Refill 1 spell mana.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Refill 1 spell mana.
Draw 1.
flavorText: "Blue as the Serpentine." - Twisted Fate
name: Blue Card

description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Somethin' for everyone." - Twisted Fate
name: Red Card

levelupDescription: When you are <link=keyword.Deep><sprite name=Deep><style=Keyword>Deep</style></link>. <style=Variable></style> When I level up, copy <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link> allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
levelupDescriptionRaw: When you are Deep.  When I level up, copy Tossed allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
flavorText: "'Twas an anchor what broke the Rancour. Pulled Finn down, an' all. Just a handful of us left now, but night's coming... and the cold. I'm sorry, Ma. You were right. The Titan lives." - Recovered note
name: Nautilus

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a <link=card.champCheck><style=AssociatedCard>Nautilus</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nautilus</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a Nautilus.
Create a Nautilus into your deck.
flavorText: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus
name: Nautilus' Riptide

description: Sea Monster allies cost 4 less.
descriptionRaw: Sea Monster allies cost 4 less.
flavorText: All pay the tithe, one way or another.
name: Nautilus

description:
When drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
descriptionRaw:
When drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
flavorText: "Ain't nothin' like a hot streak to keep the chips comin'." - Twisted Fate
name: Pocket Aces

description: Summon 2 random 1 cost followers.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 random 1 cost followers.
flavorText:
"Oi, Gav--ain't that the fella we're after? Looks like he found a friend."
"Is that... Is that a shark-man, Baz?"
"It's also a bunch more gold, mate. Come on..." - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
name: Double Trouble

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> ANY follower into your hand.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Recall ANY follower into your hand.
flavorText: "Yer workin' fer us now!" - Petty Officer
name: Strong-arm

description: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Longtooth</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and summon Longtooth.
flavorText: "Shark!" - Fizz
name: Chum the Waters

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Kegs</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Powder Kegs.
flavorText: "Barrel!" - Gangplank
name: More Powder!

description:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.
name: Parrrley

description: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
flavorText:
"Whatcha think, Baz? He don't look so tough."
"Ya sure, Gav? He broke out of prison..."
"Means he's wily, not tough. Come on!" - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
name: Jailbreak

description: Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 2 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. Give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 2 at the next Round Start. Give them Fleeting.
flavorText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate
name: Pick a Card

description: Remove an attacking ally from combat to <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Remove an attacking ally from combat to Rally.
flavorText: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz
name: Playful Trickster

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a <link=card.champCheck><style=AssociatedCard>Nautilus</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a Nautilus.
flavorText: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus
name: Riptide

description: This round, grow all allies' Power and Health to the number of other spells you've played this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: This round, grow all allies' Power and Health to the number of other spells you've played this game.
flavorText: The currents and tides around Bilgewater are rightly feared for their strength and sudden turns. But no sailor knows the true power within those waters.
name: Mind Meld

description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Deal 7 to a unit.
descriptionRaw:
Toss 3.
Deal 7 to a unit.
flavorText: "If it sinks 'em, it was worth it." - Bilgewater saying
name: Scrapshot

description:
Reduce the cost of Sea Monster allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> by 1.
Draw a Sea Monster.
descriptionRaw:
Reduce the cost of Sea Monster allies everywhere by 1.
Draw a Sea Monster.
flavorText: Sailors speak in hushed tones of dark days to come; when the seas churn and boil, and unspeakable horrors rise from the waves.
name: Lure of the Depths

description:
Deal 2 to an enemy.
If this kills it, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to an enemy.
If this kills it, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "I always shoot first." - Miss Fortune
name: Double Up

description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2.
Draw 2.
descriptionRaw:
Toss 2.
Draw 2.
flavorText: Flotsam doesn't stay afloat for long. Any seafarer worth their salt has to be able to quickly discern valuable cargo from common junk...
name: Salvage

description:
<link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
<link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1 more.
descriptionRaw:
Nab 1.
Plunder: Nab 1 more.
flavorText: What's mine is mine, and what's yours is... also mine.
name: Pilfered Goods

description: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round. If it dies this round, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy Vulnerable this round. If it dies this round, draw 1.
flavorText: "Keep yer chin up and yer spirits high, boy! If the cap'n sees ya saggin', he'll hoist ya up, cut y'open, an' feed ya to the gulls. Now, move yer arse!" - Dreadway deckhand
name: Ye Been Warned

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Draw a random non-champion card from the enemy hand.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Draw a random non-champion card from the enemy hand.
flavorText: "Cards ain't about luck. It's about people. You get the folks across the table to doubt themselves? Might as well take all they've got there and then." - Twisted Fate
name: Sleight of Hand

description: Deal 1 to three different randomly targeted enemies or the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to three different randomly targeted enemies or the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune
name: Make it Rain

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Yer supposed to fire w' the rest of us, lad! That's what a salvo is!" - Petty Officer
name: Warning Shot

description: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 4.
descriptionRaw: Toss 4.
flavorText: "If it ain't worth its weight, it goes over. Same goes for you lot, 'n all. Now back ta work!" - Petty Officer
name: Jettison

description: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it Scout.
flavorText:
"Lift the light from Mother Serpent
To the clouds, up from the waves.
The sky looks down, with gray eyes earnest,
A calm reflection of her gaze.
She smiles, is at peace..."
- prayer to Nagakaborous
name: Island Navigator

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Get an empty mana gem.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Get an empty mana gem.
flavorText: The young riders of the Winter's Claw are given a wolf pup the moment they can hold a weapon. Their upbringing is devoted entirely to battle--the wolf trained to savage and maim, and the rider to pillage and steal.
name: Wolfrider

description: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: "These warmbloods wouldn't last a single day in the Freljord!" - Sejuani
name: Caught in the Cold

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
levelupDescription: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds.
flavorText: While her flail of True Ice is formidable, Sejuani herself is the weapon--forged in the bitter cold of the Freljord and tested against the freezing climes.
name: Sejuani

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavorText:
"They will till their fruitful fields,
They will weakly sow their seeds.
We will set 'most all aflame, 
Winter's Claw takes what it please!" - a Winter's Claw children's rhyme
name: Ember Maiden

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: I transform into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Stormclaw Ursine</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: I transform into Stormclaw Ursine.
flavorText: The Ursine begin as humans, but give up the familiar trappings of their mortal lives for the feral, savage power granted by the great spirit of the Volibear.
name: Ursine Spiritwalker

description: Other allies with 5+ Power have <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Other allies with 5+ Power have Overwhelm.
flavorText: Fully unleashed, the Ursine shed their humanity and take on the power of the storm. They tear across the frozen steppes, their roars echoing like peals of thunder.
name: Stormclaw Ursine

description:
Grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1.
<link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Draw 1 of them.
descriptionRaw:
Grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1.
Plunder: Draw 1 of them.
flavorText: "Share and share alike." - Ruthless Raider
name: Shared Spoils

description:
When I'm summoned, Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Sejuani</style></link>.
<link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, Draw a Sejuani.
Plunder: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
flavorText: "When Spring brings weather just warm enough for us to plant, it also brings longboats... and the grain that started plentiful grows sparse." - Avarosan Hearthguard
name: The Tuskraider

description:
Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Sejuani</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
Create a Sejuani in your deck.
flavorText: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani
name: Sejuani's Fury of the North

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
Each round, the first time you damage the enemy Nexus, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> all enemies.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
Each round, the first time you damage the enemy Nexus, Frostbite all enemies.
flavorText: "Lay them low! Show them the Freljord belongs to the Winter's Claw!"
name: Sejuani

description: Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
flavorText: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani
name: Fury of the North

flavorText: The Winter's Claw has no equal in the Freljord, and all know the ferocity of these merciless raiders. Once their bloodlust takes over, one can only pray for a quick death.
name: Ruthless Raider

description: Create 2 random Poro followers and 2 <link=card.snaxRef><style=AssociatedCard>Poro Snax</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create 2 random Poro followers and 2 Poro Snax in hand.
flavorText:
"When you wish upon a poro,
An' look at da night sky,
You'll see da snax among da stars,
All sparkly in our eyes" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Aurora Porealis

description:
When I'm summoned, draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Swain</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus twice.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw a Swain.
Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus twice.
flavorText: When the Ionian locals saw it looming on the horizon, they thought it a monster. They were not far from the truth--the steel warship is terrifying, the greatest feat of Noxian naval engineering yet.
name: The Leviathan

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've dealt 12 non-combat damage.
flavorText: "A power beyond mortal understanding gave me the vision to see what most cannot. I peer through the darkness others fear."
name: Swain

description:
When you deal non-combat damage to the enemy Nexus, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> backrow enemy.
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 3 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
When you deal non-combat damage to the enemy Nexus, Stun the strongest backrow enemy.
Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "No sacrifice is too great to see my vision for Noxus fulfilled."
name: Swain

description:
Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Swain</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or Stunned.
Create a Swain in your deck.
flavorText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.
name: Swain's Ravenous Flock

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: The elder’s voice was surprisingly calm. “What, pray tell,” he inquired, “is the point of gathering stones to build higher walls, when the Noxians always manage to toss them back over?”
name: Citybreaker

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> all damaged enemies.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Stun all damaged enemies.
flavorText: “For generations, we have been subjugated. It was not until Noxus took our lands that we finally understood true freedom. That is why I fight for the empire.”
name: Aurok Glinthorn

description: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or Stunned.
flavorText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.
name: Ravenous Flock

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Quick and quiet, 'til the boom."
name: Imperial Demolitionist

description: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to anything.
flavorText: "Sacrifices must be made." - Jericho Swain
name: Noxian Fervor

description: Enemies with 4 or less Power cannot damage me.
descriptionRaw: Enemies with 4 or less Power cannot damage me.
flavorText: "There's no stopping a warbeast once it's in motion--best just to get out of the way." - Basilisk Rider
name: Armored Tuskrider

description: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: The hazards of using black powder are a small price to pay for tactical victory.
name: Black Powder Grenade

description: Deal 2 to an enemy and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Try to die with dignity." - Swain
name: Death's Hand

flavorText: "A siege is easy, if you've the tools. The 'breakers bring 'em out, and the ballistae bring 'em down." - Siege Engineer
name: Iron Ballista

flavorText: It's true what they say--pets look like their owners.
name: Loyal Badgerbear

flavorText: A ranger recruit spends months in the forest with their companions, learning to predict their stag's every move. They must be patient, but once the two have bonded, nothing can come between them.
name: Greathorn Companion

flavorText: "I swore an oath to protect this forest, and all who seek shelter within it."
name: Greenfang Warden

description: When I'm summoned, summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon Valor.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you attack 4 times.
flavorText: "She's always been a fearless ranger-knight, our Quinn--and with Valor by her side and in the skies, the two are unstoppable." - Genevieve Elmheart, ranger-knight
name: Quinn

description:
Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Quinn</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Summon Valor.
Create a Quinn in your deck.
flavorText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder
name: Quinn's Blinding Assault

flavorText: Those who meet him swear they see a glimmer of something more in those sharp eyes, a shrewd intelligence that far surpasses any ordinary bird of prey.
name: Valor

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link> <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon Valor Challenging the strongest enemy.
flavorText: "I'll follow your lead, Valor!"
name: Quinn

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Loyal Badgerbear</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon a Loyal Badgerbear.
flavorText: Betrand got his start in the Bandle Scouts. He got all the badges except for 'Cheerful Demeanor'."
name: Grizzled Ranger

description: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
flavorText: Ignoring the pain of her wounded leg, the ranger stood once more, sword aloft. It was not just her own resolve that kept her standing, but the resolve of Demacia itself.
name: Unyielding Spirit

description: Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon Valor.
flavorText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder
name: Blinding Assault

description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: To see the rangers of Demacia in battle is inspiring. They fight as one--human and animal, side by side, fiercely determined and utterly inseparable.
name: Genevieve Elmheart

description: Give all allies <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give all allies Tough this round.
flavorText: "When the enemy draws near, do not let fear into your hearts, for the trees themselves protect us." - Greenfang Warden
name: Ranger's Resolve

description: Pick an enemy. 2 allies <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> it one after another.
descriptionRaw: Pick an enemy. 2 allies strike it one after another.
flavorText: "With me, as one!" - Greenfang Warden
name: Concerted Strike

description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Heal all allies 3.
descriptionRaw:
Toss 3.
Heal all allies 3.
flavorText: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai
name: Sap Magic

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Toss 3.
flavorText: "The great treant has continued showing... creatures. This one... to spread life as she wanders... remarkable such... here. These are Blessed Isles indeed!" - Recovered journal
name: Deadbloom Wanderer

description: Each round, the first time you summon another ally, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you summon another ally, Toss 2 and summon a Sapling.
levelupDescription: Your units have died or your cards have been <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link> 25 times.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Your units have died or your cards have been Tossed 25 times.
flavorText: These cursed lands would not break Maokai. The treant's commitment ran too deep, and his fury burned too bright, for anything to stand in his way.
name: Maokai

flavorText: "Life here… so effortless. Verdant forests... to sprout overnight… quite exquisite. What a treasure this land is. Must preserve… generations." - Recovered journal
name: Sapling

description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Heal all allies 3.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Maokai</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Toss 3.
Heal all allies 3.
Create a Maokai in your deck.
flavorText: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai
name: Maokai's Sap Magic

description:
When I level up, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> the enemy deck, leaving 4 non-champions.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I level up, Obliterate the enemy deck, leaving 4 non-champions.
Round Start: Summon a Sapling.
flavorText: He would destroy the blight within these isles, and restore its long-lost life.
name: Maokai

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and heal your Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Toss 2 and heal your Nexus 2.
flavorText: "...remarkable species… same creature I found as a child... not a day older! I wonder… next town. Perhaps these wonderful fellows will live forever!" - Recovered journal
name: Thorny Toad

description:
Sea Monster allies have <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>. 
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Sea Monster allies have Fearsome. 
Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: They realized the danger too late. The titanic beast opened its gaping maw and surged toward them. The hunters could only wait for death as the endless teeth slowly crunched through their ship.
name: Terror of the Tides

description: When another ally dies, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When another ally dies, drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Bumped into Niven this... the new ferryman! He rowed us... to... He can certainly hold a tune! Before... must invite him to supper soon." - Recovered journal
name: Neverglade Collector

description: When you summon a follower, kill it to summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Overgrown Snapvine</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you summon a follower, kill it to summon an Overgrown Snapvine.
flavorText:
"Today... another remarkable... surfaced around... children quite scared. But... posed no threat. Nuzzled... quite a trusting creature. Must forage them more berries!"
- Recovered journal
name: Overgrown Snapvine

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Saplings</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to summon 2 Saplings.
flavorText: "Every heart is a garden where roots may take hold!"
name: Blighted Caretaker

description: The first time an ally dies, grant me +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: The first time an ally dies, grant me +2|+2.
flavorText: The creatures of the Shadow Isles shed sentimentality long ago. They all must eat.
name: Barkbeast

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link> at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Sapling at the next Round Start.
flavorText: "Wheeeeeeee!" - Sapling
name: Sapling Toss

description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.secondSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Resonating Strike</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally Challenger this round.
Create a Fleeting Resonating Strike in hand.
flavorText: "Master yourself..." - Lee Sin
name: Sonic Wave

description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "...master the enemy." - Lee Sin
name: Resonating Strike

description: When I'm <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link>, transform me into <link=card.cardRef><style=AssociatedCard>Concussive Palm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm Recalled, transform me into Concussive Palm.
flavorText: "A student must move with grace, for the Dragon's breath created the wind and waves which brought motion to our world." - Teachings of the Dragon
name: Tail of the Dragon

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Dragon's Protection</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Dragon's Protection in hand.
flavorText: "A student must act with compassion, for the Dragon nurtured the First Lands, and graced them with warmth and life." - Teachings of the Dragon
name: Scales of the Dragon

description: Grant an ally +0|+3.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +0|+3.
flavorText: "The Dragon will keep you safe." - Scales of the Dragon
name: Dragon's Protection

description:
When you play a spell, give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
If you play another, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
When you play a spell, give me Challenger this round.
If you play another, give me Barrier this round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played 10+ spells.
flavorText: "The Dragon aids the worthy. To the weary, it gives vigor. To the sick, comfort. To the lost, light. To the shaken, balance..."
name: Lee Sin

description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.secondSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Resonating Strike</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lee Sin</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally Challenger this round.
Create a Fleeting Resonating Strike in hand.
Create a Lee Sin in your deck.
flavorText: "Master yourself..." - Lee Sin
name: Lee Sin's Sonic Wave

description:
When you play a spell, give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
If you play another, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
I <link=card.attackSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Dragon's Rage</style></link> enemies that I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When you play a spell, give me Challenger this round.
If you play another, give me Barrier this round.
I Dragon's Rage enemies that I Challenge.
flavorText: "...But for the tyrant, the Dragon breathes fire."
name: Lee Sin

description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>striking</style></link> both.
If the enemy survives, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking both.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin
name: Dragon's Rage

flavorText: "A student must strive with all their might, for the Dragon pulled the earth from beneath the waves, and gave us a land to call home." - Teachings of the Dragon
name: Horns of the Dragon

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dragonling</style></link><style=Variable></style>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Flow: Summon a Dragonling.
flavorText:
"A student must think with clarity, for the Dragon draws the sun across our skies, and reveals the world around us."
- Teachings of the Dragon
name: Eye of the Dragon

description: Summon me from hand the first time you've played 2 spells each round.
descriptionRaw: Summon me from hand the first time you've played 2 spells each round.
flavorText: "A student must listen with focus, for the Dragon roared the first sounds, and blessed our young spirits with the gift of magic." - Teachings of the Dragon
name: Claws of the Dragon

flavorText: "The spirit gives to those who listen." - Eye of the Dragon
name: Dragonling

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy to summon a <link=card.cardRef><style=AssociatedCard>Tail of the Dragon</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy to summon a Tail of the Dragon.
flavorText: "You did not see me leave, nor will you see me return." - Tail of the Dragon
name: Concussive Palm

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.secondSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Return</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to create a Fleeting Return in hand.
flavorText: The first Noxians to set foot on the Ionian beaches found a weak and unprepared enemy. Countless were slaughtered, but a handful managed to make their way to safety...
name: Retreat

description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>striking</style></link> the enemy then the enemy Nexus.
If the enemy survives, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking the enemy then the enemy Nexus.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin
name: Dragon's Rage

description: Summon an ally that costs 3 or less from hand.
descriptionRaw: Summon an ally that costs 3 or less from hand.
flavorText: ...and how they rallied. The survivors soon gathered their forces, found their center, and showed the invaders the resilient spirit of the First Lands.
name: Return

description:
<link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
Draw 2 other spells.
descriptionRaw:
Flow: I cost 2 less.
Draw 2 other spells.
flavorText: Meditation is a journey with no destination--a path that can only be followed by getting lost along the way.
name: Deep Meditation

description: Your opponent discards the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> follower from hand.
descriptionRaw: Your opponent discards the weakest follower from hand.
flavorText: "The frail have no place in this world. Each day brings them new torment, another turn of the vise. I do not deal in death, I deal in mercy." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Hunt the Weak

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If it has <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, deal excess damage to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes an enemy. If it has Overwhelm, deal excess damage to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Oooh the wildman's looking EXTRA savage today! Stay clear of those claws, folks!" - Arena Battlecaster
name: Wild Claws

description: When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, Reforge.
levelupDescription: I see <link=card.blade><style=AssociatedCard>Blade of the Exile</style></link> in your hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I see Blade of the Exile in your hand.
flavorText: "I will not run from what I was. I made a promise to mend what I have broken..."
name: Riven

description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: "A warrior must know the weight of their weapon, burdened heavy with guilt." - Riven
name: Heavy Blade Fragment

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round. <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Riven</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round. Reforge.
Create a Riven in your deck.
flavorText: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Riven's Weapon Hilt

description: Grant an ally +2|+0, <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +2|+0, Overwhelm, and Quick Attack.
flavorText: "But a warrior is more than their weapon alone. They must know power, but also consequence, forgiveness, and redemption." -  Riven
name: Blade of the Exile

description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: "A warrior must know the sharpness of their blade, an edge that cuts both friends and foes." - Riven
name: Keen Blade Fragment

description:
When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
Each round, the first time you increase my Power, increase it by twice the amount.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, Reforge.
Each round, the first time you increase my Power, increase it by twice the amount.
flavorText: "...and I will not run from those who would break me."
name: Riven

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "A warrior must know their weapon's history... every bloody piece." - Riven
name: Glinting Blade Fragment

description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. Reforge.
flavorText: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Weapon Hilt

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If you played a spell on me this round, I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Round End: If you played a spell on me this round, I strike the weakest enemy.
flavorText:
"Hide, we will find you. 
Breathe, we will hear you.
Run, we will kill you."
name: Arrel the Tracker

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
If you have a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Darius</style></link>, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy.
If you have a Darius, Rally.
flavorText: "I'll handle this myself." - Darius
name: Apprehend

flavorText: "There is nothing like hunting another soldier. To track them, you must think and feel as they do. To catch them, you must fear them as they fear you. It is a bond that few will know, but one I savor above all others."
name: Wrathful Rider

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
flavorText: The basilisk trainers withhold live food from the beasts in the days leading up to battle. By the time the creatures are unleashed, they do not distinguish friend from foe, and are utterly indomitable.
name: Basilisk Bloodseeker

description: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
flavorText: "It's not the sharpness of the claws you've got to look out for, it's the appetite of the beast that's grown 'em." - Basilisk trainer
name: Gouge

description:
Allies can't drop below 1 health this round.
When discarded, your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally can't drop below 1 health this round.
descriptionRaw:
Allies can't drop below 1 health this round.
When discarded, your strongest ally can't drop below 1 health this round.
flavorText: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Survival Skills

description: Give an ally +3|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +3|+2 this round.
flavorText: "Yeah, I'll mend your weapons, and tend to the mounts, and cook your bloody food. What else am I good for, eh?" - Erath, Blade Squire
name: Sharpened Resolve

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Reforge.
flavorText: "Like the huntresses said--a hundred days and nights. A hundred blisters on these feet, a hundred bugs in my breakfast, a hundred 'blade'-this and 'vengeance' that. And well more than a hundred brow-beatings from those three, I'll tell you..."
name: Blade Squire

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Reforge.
flavorText: "Most weapons are crude tools, no better than the hands that wield them. But a weapon infused with runic magic is so much more than mere steel."
name: Runeweaver

description: When I'm summoned, give me <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, give me Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: "There you are. We KNEW you wouldn't come without a fight! Or so we hoped."
name: Brutal Hunter

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sleep with the Fishes</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a Sleep with the Fishes in hand.
flavorText: Years in the boxing ring taught Jack valuable lessons. He learned that if his opponent can bleed, they can fear. He learned the power of a silent stare. He learned the power of uncontrolled violence.
name: Jack, the Winner

description: An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
descriptionRaw: An ally Captures another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
flavorText: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench
name: Bayou Brunch

description: Place a unit or landmark into its deck.
descriptionRaw: Place a unit or landmark into its deck.
flavorText: "Now, I delivered to you exactly what you wanted, friend. I never said it would last forever." - Tahm Kench
name: Sunk Cost

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>An Acquired Taste</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create an An Acquired Taste in hand.
levelupDescription: I've <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captured</style></link> 3+ units.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> my <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captured</style></link> enemies and release my allies.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've Captured 3+ units. When I level up, Obliterate my Captured enemies and release my allies.
flavorText: "My friend, I know that expression. I can see you feelin' like the cards you're holdin' ain't the ones you deserve. You got a desire for the finer things, don'tcha? Perhaps you'll allow me to satisfy your hunger, let you savor all that you ever desired. All I need is your name, scratched on my paper... and you, my friend, will be satisfied for life."
name: Tahm Kench

description: <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tahm Kench</style></link> swallows an enemy unit. It <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> him, then he <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Tahm Kench swallows an enemy unit. It strikes him, then he Captures it.
flavorText: "You had a chance to walk away. Instead, you're the fool who let me in..." - Tahm Kench
name: An Acquired Taste

description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>An Acquired Taste</style></link> in hand.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> my <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captured</style></link> enemies and release my allies.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create an An Acquired Taste in hand.
Attack: Obliterate my Captured enemies and release my allies.
flavorText: "You struck a deal, my friend, and though you will undoubtedly bask in its benefits, remember... there will be a time when I get my fill, too."
name: Tahm Kench

description:
An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tahm Kench</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
An ally Captures another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
Create a Tahm Kench in your deck.
flavorText: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench
name: Tahm Kench's Bayou Brunch

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 2 to me.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 2 to me.
flavorText: "Ah, people are stupid! Give them cold drink and warm chair, and they tell all kinds of secrets to friendly faces. And who has friendlier face than young Leonard, hmm?" - Fortune Croaker
name: Lounging Lizard

description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link>.
<link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Summon another at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Summon a Powder Monkey.
Plunder: Summon another at the next Round Start.
flavorText: "Aw... d'ye think they're cute? WELL, THEY'RE NOT. They get into everything, they're messier than a seasick courier, an' THEY WON'T BLOODY SHUT UP. NO MONKEYS ON THE SHIP. THAT'S THE END OF IT." - Petty Officer
name: Monkey Business

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 3 to me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 3 to me.
flavorText: "Sure, Pablo might be in a bit of a 'dry patch'--heh--and, yeah, he's taken his fair share of punches... but ya know what? Ain't nobody else around here getting octokills, pal." - Wise Fry
name: Boxtopus

description: Deal 2 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Daub 'em with your blood, and set the sharks loose." - Jack, the Winner
name: Sleep with the Fishes

description:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Kegs</style></link> equal to the amount of damage dealt.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Summon Powder Kegs equal to the amount of damage dealt.
flavorText: "Young Gerent raised the alarm right afore the first one blew. Our hull rocked, the jib caught flame, but the Jilldaw held. Thought that was that, but as I followed Gerent's gaze out to sea, I saw me four more rowboats comin' our way, all loaded with powder." - Jilldaw survivor
name: Boomship

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 1. If you are <link=keyword.Deep><sprite name=Deep><style=Keyword>Deep</style></link>, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Toss 1. If you are Deep, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster.
flavorText: Every day, locals wander through the Slaughter Docks to see the horrors Bilgewater's hunters have hauled up from the depths. The beasts are usually dead. Usually.
name: The Slaughter Docks

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 2 to me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 2 to me.
flavorText: "RING THE BELL, WILL YA?! AH'LL SHOW THAT POINTY FART WHY AH'VE GOT ALL MA NICKNAMES, AYE. 'EIGHT PUNCH PABLO', 'THE CRACKIN' KRAKEN', 'THE TENTACLED TERROR'! YOUR WEE STINGER'S GONNA BE CRYING FOR YA MAMMIE BY THE TIME AH'M DONE WI' YA!" - Boxtopus
name: Crusty Codger

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to all other allies and grant me +1|+0 for each of them.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to all other allies and grant me +1|+0 for each of them.
flavorText: The rise to power is often a violent business... but it's not normally this freakin' sloppy.
name: Wise Fry

description:
I cost 1 less for each spell you've played this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
descriptionRaw:
I cost 1 less for each spell you've played this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
flavorText: "Stand stwait, noobie! Your mishun is to infiltrate behind emenee lines, plant as many bubbels as you can, an' tell us evewythin' you SEE! E-VE-WEE-THIN'. DO YOU UNNASTAN'?!" - Admiwal Shelly, Shellshocker
name: Wiggly Burblefish

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
flavorText: "Ol' Babs has had a few mishaps. Killed a few locals in her time, but I s'pose it helps lend her an air of authenticity." - Lounging Lizard
name: Fortune Croaker

description: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link> and give a random enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round for each time you've activated <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Summon a Powder Monkey and give a random enemy Vulnerable this round for each time you've activated Plunder this game.
flavorText: "Oh, those little sootballs aren't so bad. Here's a tip for you--they like fireworks. So, you take out an enemy's gunpowder stores, and the monkeys, well, they'll do the rest." - Miss Fortune
name: Powder Pandemonium

description: Deal 2 to an ally to grant 2 enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an ally to grant 2 enemies Vulnerable.
flavorText: "You gonna tell me where you got those 'extra kegs', Slim? Huh? Otherwise, we could play a lil' tug-of-war between your tongue and Jimbo's arm. And buddy... I ain't bettin' on you." - Wise Fry
name: Shakedown

description: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+0 and Challenger this round.
flavorText: Tianna looked out over the assembly, assessing the gathered ranks. The only sound in the square was her banner snapping in the breeze. She gave a curt nod of approval, then lifted the banner with a shout. "Who among you is ready to fight for Demacia?" The resounding cry from all those assembled shook the very mountains.
name: The Grand Plaza

description: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: Targon is a capricious place, where the unbreakable is broken, and the broken made whole.
name: Divergent Paths

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in your hand, deck, or play.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in your hand, deck, or play.
flavorText: Heroes come to the bridge, called to it by something from the unknown. They brave its bitter cold and crumbling deck to see what lies beyond--victory, or death.
name: The Howling Abyss

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
flavorText: What could better lure a soul to this wretched place than the promise of eternal life, and endless riches?
name: Vaults of Helia

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Heal damaged allies 1. Then, once I've seen you heal 22+ damage from allies, win the game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Round End: Heal damaged allies 1. Then, once I've seen you heal 22+ damage from allies, win the game.
flavorText:
"Up to the sacred falling flow,
Deep into pools, the healing springs
Shining light, water all aglow,
Listen to how the river sings,
High on the crystal mountain."
- Ottrani verse
name: Star Spring

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sanctuary</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a Sanctuary in hand.
flavorText: The Ionian mountains hide a handful of sanctuaries for those looking to center themselves and gather their spirits.
name: Monastery of Hirana

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally.
flavorText: "The monastery welcomes all who seek refuge." - Elder Souma
name: Sanctuary

description: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker
name: Scorched Earth

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally and the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Round End: Your strongest ally and the weakest enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Hey there, rrrrreckoner fans, are you ready for a night of scorchin' hot THRILLS in the RING OF FIRE?! Wuh-oh, looks like Tiny Trik drew the SHORT straw today. He's up against the mighty, fight-y, GRANAAAAK the Great! Get those medics ringside, it's gonna be a quick one!" - Arena Battlecaster
name: Noxkraya Arena

description: Destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Destroy a landmark.
flavorText: Each summit gave way before them, emboldening their climb and filling their hearts with determination. They would scale Targon.
name: Path of Destruction

description: Draw a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Draw a landmark.
flavorText: Beyond each summit loomed yet another, but their spirits pushed them onward. They would surmount the peaks of Targon.
name: Path of Discovery

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> a unit or landmark.
descriptionRaw: Play: Capture a unit or landmark.
flavorText: As a child, Arrika saw firsthand the devastation Noxus could inflict as it laid waste to her home. When she enlisted in the military, she vowed never to let the Noxian flag fly over Demacian land, or leave another child orphaned.
name: Captain Arrika

description: <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> a unit or landmark.
descriptionRaw: Capture a unit or landmark.
flavorText: "Take back what is ours!" - Captain Arrika
name: Claim

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally unit or landmark to <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy unit or landmark.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally unit or landmark to Recall an enemy unit or landmark.
flavorText: "Trevvvvorrrrrr, come baaaack..." - Trevor's house
name: Homecoming

description: Kill an ally to kill a unit or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to kill a unit or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: Nothing lasts on these haunted isles. All will end.
name: Crumble

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Reduce the cost of a random card in ALL players' hands to 0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Reduce the cost of a random card in ALL players' hands to 0 this round.
flavorText: Standing watch at the gate to the Celestial Realm is Targon's crystalline guardian. Things fall away in it's presence - hope, doubt, fear. Its trials strip all mortal concerns, and lays bare the essence of the climber's soul. It is on this that they are judged, for the guardian is the great arbiter.
name: Targon's Peak

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them Fleeting.
flavorText: The inventions of Professor Cecil B. Heimerdinger made him famous, but it was his animated lectures and notoriously unpredictable classroom demonstrations that earned him a lasting impression on Piltover's brightest minds.
name: The University of Piltover

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> ALL landmarks or deal 3 to ALL other units.
descriptionRaw: Play: Obliterate ALL landmarks or deal 3 to ALL other units.
flavorText: "There was no time to gather our things or warn the others. We could only run for the forest and watch as it leveled our homes." - Avarosan Hearthguard
name: It That Stares

description: Deal 3 to ALL other units.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to ALL other units.
flavorText: The people shall perish.
name: Extinguishing Ray

description: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> ALL landmarks.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate ALL landmarks.
flavorText: The earth shall break.
name: Destructive Ray

description: I cost 2 less if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial.
descriptionRaw: I cost 2 less if you Behold a Celestial.
flavorText: "Adults are LAME. The only cool kids around here are Zoe and her buddies. I learn a lot from them, y'know? Not like that stupid high radiance priestess lady. I mean UGHHHH."
name: Starry Scamp

description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Invoke.
flavorText: The heavens hang over you, a tapestry of black lit with twinkling stars. You are small and dim against its vastness. Where will you turn your gaze first?
name: Behold the Infinite

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
flavorText:
"As leaves unfurl from barren branches, the Lady of Spring sends her messenger to inform the Lord of Winter of the changing season. The messenger's bark startles the stars into new places in the sky, while his loyal heart warms the land." 
- Song of the Seasons
name: The Messenger

flavorText:
"During Targon's first equinox, the people of the mountain attempted their first truce. But as their leaders laid their weapons down, one suddenly cried out in pain! Soldiers drew their spears, and all thoughts of peace were lost. Little did they know the true betrayer was a serpent hidden beneath their feet, forevermore a sign of violent times." 
- Targonian folk tale
name: The Serpent

description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
The first time I would die, fully heal me instead.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
The first time I would die, fully heal me instead.
flavorText: "For ages, the Immortal Fire flew alone, till one day she saw a young bird with fiery golden wings like hers. She rejoiced, for she had never known another like herself. But as years passed, the young bird grew old and flickered out. The Immortal Fire grieved, for she had never known death. And so she wept sparks and sighed herself ablaze, till she emerged, renewed in body but burdened with knowledge." - Shuriman folk tale
name: The Immortal Fire

description: Reduce the cost of a card in hand by 1.
descriptionRaw: Reduce the cost of a card in hand by 1.
flavorText: "Each full moon bathes our world in Her silver glow, revealing paths not yet trod, stories not yet told." - Lunari Priestess
name: Moonsilver

description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other allies +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
Attack: Give other allies +2|+2 and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: Legends speak of a Scourge that lurks at the furthest reaches of the Celestial Realm. Here, it awaits the time-at-the-end-of-time, when it will wield the power of the stars to shatter the foundations of the world.
name: The Scourge

description: When I'm summoned, summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>The Silver Sister</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon The Silver Sister.
flavorText:
"From the heavens
Two beings came:
One was robed in silver's glow,
The other clad in golden flame..."
- Hymn of the Hours
name: The Golden Sister

description: Grant an ally +0|+2 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +0|+2 and SpellShield.
flavorText: "Bathe in Her gentle glow and receive Her blessing." - Lunari Priestess
name: Moonglow

description: Draw a champion. Reduce its cost by 1 and grant it +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Draw a champion. Reduce its cost by 1 and grant it +2|+2.
flavorText: "The vastness of the night sky represents the gulf between humanity below and the divine above. But there are some mortals who strive to achieve a higher purpose, and if the mountain deems them worthy, they may rise to become one with the stars themselves." - Mountain Scryer
name: Written in Stars

description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> 2 enemy units or landmarks.
descriptionRaw: If you Behold a Celestial card, Obliterate 2 enemy units or landmarks.
flavorText: Dying stars create explosions so bright and powerful that even other stars, still lively and burning, are easily outshone.
name: Supernova

description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, grant allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: If you Behold a Celestial card, grant allies everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: "Look to the night sky. Take in the stars' brilliance, and let them suffuse you with their healing light." - Soraka
name: Cosmic Inspiration

description: Fill your hand with random <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Celestial cards. Refill your mana to full.
descriptionRaw: Fill your hand with random Fleeting Celestial cards. Refill your mana to full.
flavorText: "They say that some constellations were once mortals whose exceptional exploits earned them a place amongst the stars." - Mountain Scryer
name: Living Legends

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game.
flavorText: "To safeguard the spaces between land and sky, a horned guardian was placed in the stars over the mountains. Sturdy and swift, it traverses the night sky in search of intruders, whom it greets with an impact that sends shudders through earth and sky alike." - The Minotaur Histories
name: The Destroyer

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Invoke.
flavorText: "We were always one and the same--we were separated only by the mountain, the journey, and a sea of stars."
name: The Traveler

description: Deal 4 to an enemy and 1 to another.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to an enemy and 1 to another.
flavorText: "Forging stars is a messy business, I'm afraid. You never know where those little rocks will land. I am so terribly, terribly sorry if they happen to fall on you. And crush you. Oh so violently." - Aurelion Sol
name: Meteor Shower

description: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> a unit or landmark.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate a unit or landmark.
flavorText: "I will drive the stars themselves through this insufferable place. It will be GLORIOUS." - Aurelion Sol
name: Falling Comet

description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
I am a Dragon.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
I am a Dragon.
flavorText: "Oh yes, my favorite constellation. I like to think it will be the first to rain down upon this forsaken mountain." - Aurelion Sol
name: The Great Beyond

description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> enemies with 3 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: If you Behold a Celestial card, Obliterate enemies with 3 or less Power.
flavorText: In the dark beginning, a spark of creation rippled through the universe. What sound it made, what light it shone, we will never know, for there were not yet then words to describe, nor yet ears or eyes to perceive it.
name: Cosmic Rays

description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a follower.
descriptionRaw: Silence a follower.
flavorText: In the space between the stars, there is absolute silence.
name: Equinox

flavorText: The strongest star in the night's sky, they say, is that of the warrior. An ancient being, thought immortal, who descends from the stars to prove his worth in combat. Never has he been beaten, but all stories must end, and all stars must die.
name: The Warrior

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Stun 2 enemies.
flavorText: "Even the moon's glow can be blinding." - Diana
name: Crescent Strike

flavorText: "So, there I was going 'bout my day, when in struts this fella packed to the gills with gold. Easy mark, eh? I sidle over, amp up the charm, and amp up the price. It's only when I put my coins away I realize the little scamp's paid me with my OWN money! The Trickster was shining bright that night, I tell ya." - Yordle Grifter
name: The Trickster

flavorText:
"...Though both were formed of cosmic light,
They fought, for they were too alike.
And so these two split night from day,
So each could always have their way..."
- Hymn of the Hours
name: The Silver Sister

flavorText: "The gold of the sun adorns his horns, and its fire lights his heart. Let the thunder of our shields ring out like the thunder of his hooves across the horizon!" - Solari battle prayer
name: The Charger

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavorText:
"Mother Moon, show me the way,
Tear the sky open,
Show me beyond."
- Lunari Prayer
name: The Fangs

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Duskpetal Dust</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Duskpetal Dust in hand.
flavorText: "Duskpetals bloom at night, and then only under a full moon. A proud symbol of the Lunari, we have used their dust for centuries, as only we know how to harvest them safely."
name: Lunari Duskbringer

description: The next card with <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> you play this round costs 1 less.
descriptionRaw: The next card with Nightfall you play this round costs 1 less.
flavorText: The fragrance of the duskpetal is like none other. Sweet and strange, but fleeting, it is delicate as moonlight itself.
name: Duskpetal Dust

description:
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, create the <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phased</style></link> Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Nightfall: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, create the Phased Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played 4+ Moon Weapons.
flavorText: "With every conflict, we show the Solari we are worthy of respect. We have taught them that the moon's light is equal to their sun's, we have taught them not to disregard that which they did not know. And of the lessons they are yet to learn..." - Lunari wanespeaker
name: Aphelios

description: Summon a random 2 cost follower from your regions. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Calibrum><style=AssociatedCard>Calibrum</style></link> or <link=card.Severum><style=AssociatedCard>Severum</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a random 2 cost follower from your regions. Phase Calibrum or Severum.
flavorText: "A crescent path opens before us." - Alune
name: Crescendum

description: Give an ally +2|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Crescendum><style=AssociatedCard>Crescendum</style></link> or <link=card.Calibrum><style=AssociatedCard>Calibrum</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+1 and Overwhelm this round. Phase Crescendum or Calibrum.
flavorText: "The moon grows in flame." - Alune
name: Infernum

description:
Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aphelios</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Create an Aphelios in your deck.
flavorText: "Reach out, Aphelios..." - Alune
name: Aphelios' Gifts From Beyond

description: Give an ally +1|+2 and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Gravitum><style=AssociatedCard>Gravitum</style></link> or <link=card.Infernum><style=AssociatedCard>Infernum</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +1|+2 and Lifesteal this round. Phase Gravitum or Infernum.
flavorText: "From darkness, light." - Alune
name: Severum

description: Deal 3 to a follower. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Severum><style=AssociatedCard>Severum</style></link> or <link=card.Gravitum><style=AssociatedCard>Gravitum</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to a follower. Phase Severum or Gravitum.
flavorText: "Move sure as the moon, Brother." - Alune
name: Calibrum

description:
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create the <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phased</style></link> Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.<style=Variable></style>
Your Moon Weapons cost 1 less.
descriptionRaw:
Nightfall: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards or Round Start: Create the Phased Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.
Your Moon Weapons cost 1 less.
flavorText: "...it is Aphelios and Alune who will best teach them.." - Lunari wanespeaker
name: Aphelios

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's a follower, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Infernum><style=AssociatedCard>Infernum</style></link> or <link=card.Crescendum><style=AssociatedCard>Crescendum</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start. Phase Infernum or Crescendum.
flavorText: "Doubt weighs heavy on their minds." - Alune
name: Gravitum

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> enemies with 2 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun enemies with 2 or less Power.
flavorText: Through the crystalline silence of the mountainside came the tinkling sounds of falling ice and, far above them, what the travelers could have sworn was... laughter.
name: Sneaky Zeebles

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Heal your Nexus 3. Deal damage to me equal to the amount healed.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Heal your Nexus 3. Deal damage to me equal to the amount healed.
flavorText: "Nobody knows the paths of Targon like I do, so I get stuck with some of the, uh, willful stellacorns. Good thing they've got me to look after them!"
name: Broadbacked Protector

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant 2 allies +0|+4.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant 2 allies +0|+4.
flavorText: "Listen, Osu. Do you hear that? Bells! Grandfather's back!" - Illi, Star Shepherd
name: Grandfather Rumul

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick 2 enemies.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> them.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Pick 2 enemies.
Round Start: Stun them.
flavorText: Travelers who lock eyes with the creature are said to be struck by a knowledge so profound, an insight so awesome, that their minds crumble beneath its gaze.
name: The Infinite Mindsplitter

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall or when you activate another Nightfall: Give me Challenger this round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've activated Nightfall 4+ times.
flavorText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in silver and blue, her eyes like stars. As the moon rose and shone down on her, each of the Lunari gathered there closed their eyes in silent prayer for her safety, and in gratitude.
name: Diana

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall or when you activate another Nightfall: Give me +2|+0 and Challenger this round.
flavorText: Diana raced down the mountain, sword drawn and coated with duskpetal dust. She knew Leona would find her--she was counting on it. Her heart fluttered with anxious anticipation, and she breathed deeply to still it. This time upon their meeting, she would have the upper hand; this time, she would face her old friend head-on.
name: Diana

description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Draw 1.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Diana</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Draw 1.
Create a Diana in your deck.
flavorText: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana
name: Diana's Pale Cascade

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally Overwhelm.
flavorText: Those seeking to scale Targon would do well to befriend the local fauna. No creature is more familiar with Targon's perilous gauntlet, and none can travel more swiftly across its icy terrain.
name: Crystal Ibex

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Gem in hand.
flavorText: The goats of Mount Targon are even more dangerous than their ordinary cousins, for the gems that make up their horns embed painful shards upon impact.
name: Mountain Goat

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Heal me and my supported ally 4.
descriptionRaw: Support: Heal me and my supported ally 4.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've healed damaged allies 4+ times.
flavorText: "Healing is, by its very essence, selfless. You need not draw the power from them; they give it willingly. Show them compassion, and you will see how they shine."
name: Soraka

description:
Each round, the first time you heal a damaged ally, draw 1.
<link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Fully heal me and my supported ally.
descriptionRaw:
Each round, the first time you heal a damaged ally, draw 1.
Support: Fully heal me and my supported ally.
flavorText: "What you give of yourself to help others will be returned to you a hundredfold. This is the power of giving. Generosity is a gift that heals the giver as well, in mind, body, and spirit."
name: Soraka

description:
Fully heal damaged allies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Soraka</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Fully heal damaged allies.
Create a Soraka in your deck.
flavorText: "For life!" - Soraka
name: Soraka's Wish

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Gem in hand.
flavorText: "They say the Protector blessed these gems. Wear them, and he shall be with you in spirit."
name: Gift Giver

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Invoke.
flavorText: "Look at all our friends out in the sky tonight! See that extra bright star? That's the Messenger's eye staring down at us! That dim cluster way out there? It is the Trickster hiding behind clouds! And that one over--KULUN, SHH! You cannot paw those down...!"
name: Moondreamer

description: Each round, when an ally with <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> kills an enemy for the first time, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
