descriptionRaw: Each round, when an ally with Fury kills an enemy for the first time, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
flavorText: "Look to the heavens, and see as I do! First the signals, for by night they shine. Then the fury, for by day all burns. You will see! We will all see!" - Herald of Dragons
name: Inviolus Vox

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Stun the strongest enemy.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've activated Daybreak 4+ times.
flavorText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in crimson and gold, her eyes like embers. As the rising sun crowned her head in light, each Solari present lowered their eyes, not in shame, but in deference to their shining leader.
name: Leona

description:
Give allies +1|+1 this round.
Activate an ally's <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> effect.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Leona</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give allies +1|+1 this round.
Activate an ally's Daybreak effect.
Create a Leona in your deck.
flavorText:
"She is our unflinching leader in the heavens, the blinding flash of our weapons at noon, and the unquenchable fire that burns in our hearts." 
- Solari Priestess
name: Leona's Morning Light

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: "The closer they stretch toward the heavens, the more the sun will burn them." - Leona
name: Solar Flare

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy and give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak or when you activate another Daybreak: Stun the strongest enemy and give me Barrier this round.
flavorText: This was what Leona had prepared for. She knew she would find Diana fleeing down the mountain, retreating before the light of the sun. She breathed deeply to still her fluttering heartbeat, willing it silent with grim resolve. This time upon their meeting, she had the upper hand; this time, she would face her old friend head-on.
name: Leona

description: Dragon allies cost 1 less.
descriptionRaw: Dragon allies cost 1 less.
flavorText: The clouds twisted around their massive forms, and the sky itself seemed to shake with their keening wails. She knew what was to come, and yet felt not fear but the warm embrace of destiny.
name: Herald of Dragons

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give me and my supported ally <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> this round. Copy the last spell you played on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
descriptionRaw: Support: Give me and my supported ally Tough this round. Copy the last spell you played on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
levelupDescription: I've seen you target or <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>support</style></link> allies 7+ times.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you target or support allies 7+ times.
flavorText: "Taric's gentle kindness inspires all who meet him, galvanizing them to find the warmth within to bolster themselves on even the coldest of nights." - Mountain Scryer
name: Taric

description: Grant an ally +0|+2.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +0|+2.
flavorText: "Our shield is our conviction, our resolve, our trust in the light!" - Solari Shieldbearer
name: Sunblessed Vigor

flavorText: "Hope is a delicate thing that flies ever higher, and should never be caught." - Lunari Priestess
name: Sparklefly

description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a unit this round.
descriptionRaw: Silence a unit this round.
flavorText: "They will know serenity." - Soraka
name: Hush

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> enemies with 2 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Stun enemies with 2 or less Power.
flavorText: "Hahahaha, lookit 'em GO!  They're just. So. Fast! Is your head spinning too?!" - Zoe
name: Mischief

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's a follower, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start.
flavorText:
"Mother Moon, our night is set,
May we halt those who would harm us,
And teach them regret."
- Lunari Prayer
name: The Cloven Way

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Invoke.
flavorText: "Oh, stars above, journeying like many pilgrims through the night's expanse--stay with us a moment, tell us what you've seen." - The Paeans of Evening
name: Lunari Priestess

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Heal an ally and your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Play: Heal an ally and your Nexus 3.
flavorText: "See that star moving across the night sky? That's a grown stellacorn. While the young ones lend us their healing magic until they can be returned to the sky, grown stellacorns can wield that power on their own. It is considered very lucky to see one and know it for what it is. Luckier still to care for one." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars
name: Resplendent Stellacorn

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +0|+2.
descriptionRaw: Support: Grant my supported ally +0|+2.
flavorText: In traveling, you must be open to the journey, which will inevitably change you. In traveling, you take something new with you... and you leave something of your old self behind.
name: Tyari the Traveler

description: I cost 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have. Deal 15 to all enemies.
descriptionRaw: I cost 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have. Deal 15 to all enemies.
flavorText: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol
name: The Skies Descend

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Supercool Starchart</style></link> in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a Supercool Starchart in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
levelupDescription: I've seen you play 10 cards with different names.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you play 10 cards with different names.
flavorText: "Hey hiiiiiii! Whatcha doin'? Is that a CARD GAME? Can I play too? What?! I'M in YOUR game? Ha! What a silly dimension..."
name: Zoe

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Paddle Star</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Zoe</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy. Create a Fleeting Paddle Star in hand.
Create a Zoe in your deck.
flavorText: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe
name: Zoe's Sleepy Trouble Bubble

description:
When I level up, grant your Nexus "When you summon an ally, grant its keywords to all allies."
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Behold the Infinite</style></link> that costs 0 in hand.
descriptionRaw:
When I level up, grant your Nexus "When you summon an ally, grant its keywords to all allies."
Nexus Strike: Create a Behold the Infinite that costs 0 in hand.
flavorText: "Ah, the vastness of space and a myriad realities stretched, squished, and squeezed out before us! Maaaaaybe we'll even see my favorite space doggy!"
name: Zoe

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: "This one's my favorite! I call it 'Metaphysical Identity of the Conscious Psyche'. Unless you tilt your head like this... then it kinda looks like two spoons."
name: Spacey Sketcher

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
Round Start: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
levelupDescription: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Your allies have 20+ total Power.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Round End: Your allies have 20+ total Power.
flavorText: "I don't care what you write about me, you middling creature! Just make sure I'm described as handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very intelligent. Can you spell that?"
name: Aurelion Sol

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
Your Celestial cards cost 0.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
Round Start: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
Your Celestial cards cost 0.
flavorText: Aurelion Sol is handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very inteligent.
name: Aurelion Sol

description:
I cost 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have. Deal 15 to all enemies.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aurelion Sol</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
I cost 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have. Deal 15 to all enemies.
Create an Aurelion Sol in your deck.
flavorText: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol
name: Aurelion Sol's The Skies Descend

description: Grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+1 and SpellShield.
flavorText: "Honor the mountain." - Taric
name: Bastion

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Draw 1 and shuffle me into the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Draw 1 and shuffle me into the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText:
"Mother Moon, gift me confidence,
Fill me with The Flight's conviction,
Set me on my path."
- Lunari Prayer
name: The Flight

description:
<link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> 2 enemy units this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: They can't block this round.
descriptionRaw:
Silence 2 enemy units this round.
Nightfall: They can't block this round.
flavorText: "Those unaccustomed to the moonlight must learn to see by it, or they will see nothing at all." - Diana
name: Moonlight Affliction

description: Fully heal damaged allies.
descriptionRaw: Fully heal damaged allies.
flavorText: "For life!" - Soraka
name: Wish

description:
Deal 6 to a unit.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Instead, <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it this round and deal 6 to it.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 6 to a unit.
Daybreak: Instead, Silence it this round and deal 6 to it.
flavorText: Few things survive a gaze as unflinching as the sun's.
name: Sunburst

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 4, 5, or 6.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 4, 5, or 6.
flavorText: The Solari look to the stars for guidance as much as any other Targonian, for the star dearest to their faith is the sun.
name: Solari Priestess

description: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
flavorText: "You thought you'd beaten us? Ha! We're just getting started." - Broadbacked Protector
name: Astral Protection

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.spell><style=AssociatedCard>Spring Gifts</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Spring Gifts in hand.
flavorText: "Mostly, I mind the springs, but a shepherd's responsibility is first and foremost to their flock. Priorities have been known to collide."
name: Spring Guardian

description: Fully heal an ally.
descriptionRaw: Fully heal an ally.
flavorText: "Let the springs soothe that which ails you." - Spring Guardian
name: Spring Gifts

description: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> an enemy spell played this game.
descriptionRaw: Manifest an enemy spell played this game.
flavorText: "Oh, that was uh-MAZING! But how much better would it be if I did it instead? 'Kaythanksbyeeee!" - Zoe
name: Spell Thief

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me Lifesteal this round.
flavorText: The Sunforger held up his focus as light streamed into the room. The Solari artifact harnessed the sun's brilliant rays into a powerful enchantment for his weapon.
name: Solari Sunforger

description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: "And these three EXTRA sparkly stars I call... 'The Celestial Jump Rope'! Or is it more of an upside down happy face?" - Zoe
name: Supercool Starchart

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak or when you activate another Daybreak: Grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: "Shining guardian, your wrath burns like the noonday sun. Come forth and punish those who would trespass on this sacred place." - Sun Guardian's inscription
name: Sun Guardian

description:
<link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+2.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create 3 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gems</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2.
Last Breath: Create 3 Gems in hand.
flavorText:
"Did you catch anything he said in there?"
"Not a word. Seemed nice, though."
- Emir and Haley, Mountain Sojourners
name: Mentor of the Stones

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +0|+4 this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me +0|+4 this round.
flavorText:
"Foolish, not to come under the cover of night." The Shieldbearer straightened. "Lay down your arms, and come peacefully."
The Lunari crouched in silence, readying her curved blades once more. 
So be it. 
The Solari readied herself in turn, lifting her shield to reflect the rays of the rising sun.
name: Solari Shieldbearer

flavorText: Countless challenges await those climbing Mount Targon. Some, like the endless ascent, slowly sap the aspirants' strength. Others are much more immediate.
name: Fused Firebrand

description: Fill your hand with <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gems</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Fill your hand with Gems.
flavorText: "Turn a gem just so, and it glimmers in the light. Like mortal lives, each has its own inner fire." - Taric
name: Shards of the Mountain

description: Create 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>The Messengers</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Create 5 The Messengers in your deck.
flavorText: "Time passes, skies turn--the Serpent moves aside and the Messenger takes its place overhead. A season of abundance awaits..." - Lunari Priestess
name: Messenger's Sigil

description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2. Draw 1.
flavorText: Stellacorns shine brightest when they are happy.
name: Guiding Touch

description: I cost 1 less for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
descriptionRaw: I cost 1 less for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
flavorText: The Arbiter is the mountain's final test, for only the guardian sees beyond the climber's deeds, and into their spirit.
name: Arbiter of the Peak

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Grant me Elusive.
flavorText: "Let us cast our eyes toward the heavens, toward the sun, toward our lady's li-- Wait... What...? What is that...?" - Solari Priest
name: Lunari Shadestalker

description:
Your Celestial cards cost 1 less.
<link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Your Celestial cards cost 1 less.
Allegiance: Invoke.
flavorText: "There is much to learn from the stars, from their guidance. For us, they are a constant, a way to chart our path."
name: Mountain Scryer

description: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
descriptionRaw: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
flavorText: "Reach out, Aphelios..." - Alune
name: Gifts From Beyond

description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: The next Dragon or Celestial unit you play costs 2 less.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random Dragon and Celestial follower in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Daybreak: The next Dragon or Celestial unit you play costs 2 less.
Nightfall: Create a random Dragon and Celestial follower in hand.
flavorText:
Dragon scale (Eclipse Dragon, Draco Obscuratus)
Notes: Scale has incredible optical properties. Highly reflective under direct sunlight.
Scribbled: IT ALSO GLOWS AT NIGHT!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
name: Eclipse Dragon

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: My supported ally and I can't take damage or die this round. Copy the last spell you played on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
descriptionRaw: Support: My supported ally and I can't take damage or die this round. Copy the last spell you played on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
flavorText: "Why should Taric show his fellow man kindness? Well, he came to Targon a broken man, intent on climbing the mountain to atone for his sins... and he succeeded. Nobody knows better that all broken things can be made beautiful again." - Mountain Scryer
name: Taric

description:
Grant an ally +3|+3.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Taric</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +3|+3.
Create a Taric in your deck.
flavorText: "A little something from Targon." - Taric
name: Taric's Blessing of Targon

description: When you heal a damaged ally, grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you heal a damaged ally, grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: "Ever since I first saw one streak across the night sky, I've loved stellacorns. If only I'd known then that I'd meet so many!"
name: Star Shepherd

description: Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, refill 2 mana and grant your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +1|+0. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, refill 2 mana and grant your strongest ally +1|+0.
flavorText: It is here, in the Spirit Realm, that Alune communes with her brother Aphelios. It is she who speaks words of comfort to the silent assassin, and who reaches through the veil to hand him his weapons of retribution.
name: The Veiled Temple

description: Heal an ally 1 and grant it +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally 1 and grant it +1|+0.
flavorText: "You don't need to see to believe. Just have a little faith." - Tyari the Traveler
name: Gem

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: If you Behold a Celestial card, grant an ally +1|+1 and SpellShield.
flavorText: "...and then a sparklefly is like stardust that falls down to the ground and then flies back up and they're amazing and I saw one last night that was so pretty and I'm hungry and it flew up all the way to the STARS and then..."
name: Giddy Sparkleologist

description:
Give allies +1|+1 this round.
Activate an ally's <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> effect.
descriptionRaw:
Give allies +1|+1 this round.
Activate an ally's Daybreak effect.
flavorText: "We rise with the dawn! March into the light!" - Leona
name: Morning Light

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me and an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Give me and an ally Elusive this round.
flavorText: The Lunari waited for nightfall and the safety it assured. The path ahead seemed deserted, but Cygnus knew the Solari camp lay just beyond. He gestured, and the others quietly fell in line behind him.
name: Cygnus the Moonstalker

flavorText: It was the children of Targon who first befriended the younger, more peaceful dragons. Perhaps these juvenile creatures could sense the children's innocent curiosity, and chose, instead of causing them harm, to offer them protection.
name: Whiteflame Protector

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
descriptionRaw: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has Support, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
flavorText: Every person who braves Mount Targon has their reason to climb. Some do it to prove themselves in the eyes of their peers. Others, to prove something to themselves.
name: Mountain Sojourners

flavorText: "Like any fledgling, young stellacorns must eventually take their first faltering flight. In this, they are just like other stars in the night sky, for they fall just as readily. Luckily, we are here to catch them, and when they are ready, return them." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars
name: Fledgling Stellacorn

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's a follower, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start.
flavorText: The Solari did not believe that another light could blind--a lesson the Lunari would readily teach.
name: Sky Charge

description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana if you Behold a Nightfall card.
flavorText:
"Mother Moon, allow me to remember,
That though I stand in solitude,
Your children dance above,
And I am not alone."
- Lunari Prayer
name: The Sky Shadows

description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Create a random <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
descriptionRaw:
Daybreak: Create a random Daybreak card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
flavorText: "Keep your faith, Ra-Horak, and our light shall never falter!"
name: Rahvun, Daylight's Spear

description: Deal 5 to an enemy that attacked this round or is <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 5 to an enemy that attacked this round or is Stunned.
flavorText: "KaBOOMey!" - Zoe
name: Paddle Star

description: For the rest of the game, allied buffs (except Barrier) are permanent. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: For the rest of the game, allied buffs (except Barrier) are permanent. Draw 1.
flavorText:
"You know I mean everything that I say
When you see me coming get out of the way
I came to slay I came to slay
Back and I’m better and ready to stay."
- Kai'Sa, 'THE BADDEST'
name: Out Of The Way

description: Draw 2 different Dragons or grant Dragon allies +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Draw 2 different Dragons or grant Dragon allies +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
flavorText: "Their cry sounds like a raspy cat. If you ever hear it, you're to turn tail, and find the nearest guard. You hear? Because where there's dragon eggs, there's dragons." - Targonian forager
name: Dragon's Clutch

description: When you heal a damaged ally, give it <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When you heal a damaged ally, give it Elusive this round.
flavorText: "Stars stay with us for only so long. Once they have been tended to, I return them to the sky in a sudden blaze of starlight... and flailing hooves."
name: Stargazer

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give me +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: As the sun warmed him, he stood watch at the heretic's prison, ignoring the soft pleas that quickly turned to bitter silence.
name: Solari Soldier

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: "Stoic guardian, the gentle touch of the full moon restores your strength. Awaken and safeguard us from those who would trespass upon this sacred place." - Crescent Guardian's inscription
name: Crescent Guardian

description:
Grant an ally +1|+2. Give it <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Zenith Blade</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +1|+2. Give it Overwhelm this round.
Daybreak: Draw a Zenith Blade.
flavorText: "Let the sun imbue you with Her strength!" - Solari Priest
name: Zenith Blade

description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial, create <link=card.behold><style=AssociatedCard>The Messenger</style></link> in your deck and grant Celestial allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: If you Behold a Celestial, create The Messenger in your deck and grant Celestial allies everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText:
"May the Messenger play,
And with his joy,
Light the stars."
- Lunari Prayer
name: Starbone

description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more, then heal an ally or your Nexus 5.
descriptionRaw: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more, then heal an ally or your Nexus 5.
flavorText: "Look to the stars. If you're lucky, I'll look back." - Aurelion Sol
name: Starshaping

flavorText: "Aww, big Stomper don't wanna go through the wittle portal? That's okay, we can-- HAHAHAHA! Just kidding. OUTYOUGO!" - Zoe
name: Startled Stomper

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Paddle Star</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. Create a Fleeting Paddle Star in hand.
flavorText: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe
name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble

description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Draw 1.
flavorText: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana
name: Pale Cascade

description: Draw 2 different Dragons.
descriptionRaw: Draw 2 different Dragons.
flavorText:
Dragon egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco murmurationis)
Notes: Shell weakened on last turning. Increased movement inside. Cracks on surface superficial?
Scribbled Notes: EGG HATCHING!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
name: Hatched Egg

description: Grant Dragon allies +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant Dragon allies +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
flavorText:
Dragon egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco murmurationis)
Notes: Shell weakened on last turning. Increased movement inside. Cracks on surface superficial?
Scribbled Notes: EGG HATCHING!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
name: Crushed Egg

description: Grant an ally +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +3|+3.
flavorText: "A little something from Targon." - Taric
name: Blessing of Targon

flavorText: In space, no one can hear you squee.
name: Porofly

description: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
descriptionRaw: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
flavorText: It's not quite as cuddly as the real thing, but it IS just as cute.
name: Patched Porobot

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ignition</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create an Ignition in hand.
flavorText:
Subject requested that we keep only his mind intact, stating "That's where I've stored all my grudges."
- Augmentor's log, entry 1011
name: Ballistic Bot

description: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Death Ray - Mk 2</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 2 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations
name: Death Ray - Mk 1

description: Deal 3 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to a unit.
flavorText:
"The beam melts flesh and metal alike with exceptional speed! I have since eagerly integrated it onto my machine body. To see, feel, and dissect the world with such CLARITY... This is the great potential of the human mind unburdened by flesh! A truly glorious evolution!" 
- Viktor's design annotations
name: Death Ray - Mk 3

description: Deal 2 to a unit. Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Death Ray - Mk 3</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 3 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText:
"Altered beam transmission medium, adjusted lenses to optimal focal distances, internal mirrors polished and positioned. Intensity increased tenfold. But it must improve. I MUST IMPROVE!"
- Viktor's design annotations
name: Death Ray - Mk 2

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Hex Core Upgrade</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Hex Core Upgrade in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played 7+ created cards.
flavorText: "Zaun, you have seen your share of tragedies, and the time has come for change. And, as with all great advancements, it must start within you."
name: Viktor

description:
Your created cards cost 1 less.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Hex Core Upgrade</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Your created cards cost 1 less.
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Hex Core Upgrade in hand.
flavorText: "Ah, Piltover. As a boy, I looked up to you, the shining 'City of Progress'. But as a man, I see its corrupt foundations, built atop the suffering of our home, Zaun. Today, we herald a new era of Zaunite innovation--and you will be the first to witness our rise!"
name: Viktor

description:
Deal 1 to a unit. Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Death Ray - Mk 2</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Viktor</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 2 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
Create a Viktor in your deck.
flavorText:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations
name: Viktor's Death Ray - Mk 1

description: Grant <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Viktor</style></link> a random keyword.
descriptionRaw: Grant Viktor a random keyword.
flavorText: Humanity is destined to break free from the confines of flesh. We must become more. We must augment. We must evolve!" - Viktor
name: Hex Core Upgrade

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me all keywords on allies.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant me all keywords on allies.
flavorText: "I'm just like you, only better."
name: Mechanized Mimic

description:
Grow all allies' Power and Health to the highest Power or Health among allies.
Grant all allies allied keywords.
descriptionRaw:
Grow all allies' Power and Health to the highest Power or Health among allies.
Grant all allies allied keywords.
flavorText:
"I know I know
You want some more
If you ready let’s go
Giving it all"
- Seraphine, 'MORE'
name: Give It All

description: Create an <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Armed Gearhead</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Ballistic Bot</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Nyandroid</style></link> in hand and grant it +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Create an Armed Gearhead, Ballistic Bot, or Nyandroid in hand and grant it +1|+1.
flavorText: "Rationality and choice separate humanity from its base animal instincts." - Viktor
name: Calculated Creations

description: Pick a follower. Create a copy of it in hand with +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Pick a follower. Create a copy of it in hand with +1|+1.
flavorText: "Self-improvement is a game where you are the hero and the villain. You will struggle. You may even think you've won. But in the end, you will always be left standing in your own way." - Mechanized Mimic
name: Iterative Improvement

description: Remove <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> from all cards in hand. When I'm discarded, draw 1 <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Remove Fleeting from all cards in hand. When I'm discarded, draw 1 Fleeting.
flavorText: "It's simple stuff, really. I replaced the steel frame with a more durable alloy I invented, and rerouted the circuitry away from the hinges to stop the systems from shorting out. Easy peasy." - Chief Mechanist Zevi
name: Stress Testing

flavorText: "Alright! New arm! Always wanted one of those. What've we got next? Gravwheels for legs? Electrobelts? METAL TEETH? Actually, leave my face. I like my face."
name: Armed Gearhead

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: ALL players draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: ALL players draw 1.
flavorText: "Let them say what they will about my methods. They cannot deny progress--the light of my knowledge is shining like a beacon through the darkness of ignorance!" - Viktor
name: Hexcore Foundry

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText:
"If they do not choose to add metal to their bodies, I will deliver metal to them instead. That was a humorous remark. Ha."
- Ballistic Bot
name: Ignition

flavorText: "I clawed my way through years of Piltovan academia only to have my technologies deemed 'too dangerous' and my very presence dismissed as 'too cute'! Meow to Zaun, where I know at least one great mind shares my ambitions..."
name: Nyandroid

description: Deal 3 to a unit or destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to a unit or destroy a landmark.
flavorText: "This ray of light will guide our march to Piltover. Nothing will stand in the way of our Glorious Evolution!" - Viktor
name: Aftershock

description: Deal 1 to a unit. Summon a random <style=Variable>1</style> cost follower. While I'm in hand, increase both by 1 when you play a 3 cost card.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit. Summon a random 1 cost follower. While I'm in hand, increase both by 1 when you play a 3 cost card.
flavorText: "...and in one, two, and THREE!!! Oh. Oh, my word... Yet another unforeseen outcome?!" - Heimerdinger
name: Tri-beam Improbulator

description:
To play, discard 1.
Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Daring Poros</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
Create 2 Daring Poros in hand.
flavorText: Two downy shapes arced gracefully over the adoring crowd, leaving a cloud of fluff and the faint scent of baked goods in their wake.
name: Poro Cannon

description:
Pick a follower from the top 4 cards in your deck.
Draw it, place the rest into your deck, then create an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Pick a follower from the top 4 cards in your deck.
Draw it, place the rest into your deck, then create an exact Ephemeral copy in hand.
flavorText: "Go... surround them..." - Nocturne
name: Stalking Shadows

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a copy of me in hand.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Create a copy of me in hand.
flavorText: "It was just a pair of eyes at first, and a lone voice chittering in the shadows. More every time I looked back. Angrier. Louder. Soon as I saw the Tooth, I ran." - Whale's Tooth looter
name: Evershade Stalker

description: Kill an ally with <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link> to summon a follower from your deck that costs 1 more.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally with Last Breath to summon a follower from your deck that costs 1 more.
flavorText: "SUPPAH TIIIIME!" - Ravenous Butcher
name: Gluttony

description: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> all units that were summoned, but not played, this round.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate all units that were summoned, but not played, this round.
flavorText:
"Of course, death is present in Demacia. We see it take our loved ones and know that, someday, it will come for us. But on these isles... I can almost taste death. I feel it in my lungs as I breathe, I hear it whisper in my ear. It is not some abstract notion. It sits with me here. Now. And it will have us all."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
name: Passage Unearned

description: Grant ALL allies in deck and hand +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant ALL allies in deck and hand +2|+2 and Ephemeral.
flavorText:
"Mind or body, I fear that the nightmares of the Shadow Isles will break us all eventually, and insanity will reign forever."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
name: Encroaching Shadows

description:
<link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from a unit.
Create 2 copies of <link=card.gohard><style=AssociatedCard>Go Hard</style></link> in your deck. Every third time this happens, transform all copies of me <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Pack Your Bags</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Drain 1 from a unit.
Create 2 copies of Go Hard in your deck. Every third time this happens, transform all copies of me everywhere into Pack Your Bags.
flavorText:
"We go hard, 'til we get it, get it
We go hard, we so in it, in it
We Pop Stars (Pop Stars), only winning, winning now
Ain't nobody bringing us down, down, down, down"
- Evelynn, 'POP/STARS'
name: Go Hard

description: Deal 5 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus. Transform all copies of me <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> back to <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Go Hard</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 5 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus. Transform all copies of me everywhere back to Go Hard.
flavorText:
"Sorry for the bad news sorry I’m so bad
Only took a minute for me to get all you had
Sorry for the bad news know it makes you sad
I’ll be here for a minute baby you should pack your bags"
- Evelynn, 'THE BADDEST'
name: Pack Your Bags

description: The next time you summon an ally this round, give it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: The next time you summon an ally this round, give it +1|+0 and SpellShield this round.
flavorText: "Soon as you step outside the Tooth, you'll feel 'em. Fingertips on your nape, light as rain. Them creatures don't budge when you come at 'em, neither. Ain't afraid of my blade or my torch. Nothin'. Awful things." - Whale's Tooth looter
name: Shroud of Darkness

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraith</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Mistwraith.
flavorText: The mistwraiths move through planes unseen by mortal eyes, appear without warning, and inflict misery on all they encounter.
name: Risen Mists

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and give enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and give enemies -1|-0 this round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've attacked with 5+ Nightfall or Fearsome allies.
flavorText:
"It appears that, once enough souls have been shaken, it breaches our world. Only hope can send the monstrosity back to its realm... but hope died here long ago, on a queen's final breath, and with a king's eternal scream."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
name: Nocturne

description:
<link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from anything. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nocturne</style></link> in your deck.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Drain 1 from anything. Create a Nocturne in your deck.
Nightfall: Create a random Nightfall card in hand.
flavorText:
"Every passing day saps my spirit, pulls from me the vigor that compelled me to find this place. The Whale's Tooth is full of haggard folk, seemingly lost to all endeavor, and I fear the longer I stay, the more like them I become."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
name: Nocturne's Unspeakable Horror

description:
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and give enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
Other allies have <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>.
When you summon a unit, give enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw:
Nightfall: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and give enemies -1|-0 this round.
Other allies have Fearsome.
When you summon a unit, give enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavorText:
"My dreams grow more vivid with each passing night. I see a creature of pure evil, writhing in the dark, twisting its way toward me. Though I was to be stationed here for another week, I have just paid for transport to Fossbarrow this evening. Plainly, I cannot stand this place."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
name: Nocturne

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: With each passing night, the travelers grew more weary. Their slumber was restless, and their dreams vivid. Sleep no longer gave respite, and instead pulled the life from their bones.
name: Doombeast

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create 2 copies of me in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create 2 copies of me in the enemy deck.
flavorText: Most of the spirits on the Shadow Isles are utterly terrifying and morbid creatures. A small handful are... well... just really, really annoying.
name: Pesky Specter

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: What knows you better than your own mind? What can torment you more exquisitely than your own dreams?
name: Torment

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Give me +2|+0 and Fearsome this round.
flavorText: As the sun melts into pitch, the terrors of this place wake, watch, and wait.
name: Stygian Onlooker

description:
<link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from anything.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Drain 1 from anything.
Nightfall: Create a random Nightfall card in hand.
flavorText:
"Every passing day saps my spirit, pulls from me the vigor that compelled me to find this place. The Whale's Tooth is full of haggard folk, seemingly lost to all endeavor, and I fear the longer I stay, the more like them I become."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
name: Unspeakable Horror

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me +1|+0 for each time we've activated <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Grant me +1|+0 for each time we've activated Nightfall this game.
flavorText: With every setting sun, the night unfurls its dark wings, and blots out the day's last remnants of hope.
name: Duskrider

description: Grant an ally +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>. If it already has it, grant it <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link> instead.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+0 and Quick Attack. If it already has it, grant it Double Attack instead.
flavorText: "Hit often, hit fast, and hit hard." - Horns of the Dragon
name: Flurry of Fists

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +2|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally +2|+1 this round.
flavorText:
"Pix is AWESOME, he's small and cool and wholesome,
His favorite things are possums, and he likes to... hrmhmhmhrmthrossom!" - Lulu
name: Pix!

description: Transform a follower into a 1|1 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Squirrel</style></link> and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it this round.
descriptionRaw: Transform a follower into a 1|1 Squirrel and Silence it this round.
flavorText: "Adoribus!" - Lulu
name: Whimsy!

flavorText: A fae flash knocked him to the floor! Newly keen ears heard a yordle's fading laughter, and he looked down to see furry paws, attached to furry arms...
name: Squirrel

description: When I'm supported, grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm supported, grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: Everyone wants a familiar, but no one's prepared for the responsibility. You've gotta take them on walkies, make sure they're eating a balanced diet... house-train them. It's a lot of work.
name: Flower Child

description: Pick an ally. <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> ALL other units and landmarks.
descriptionRaw: Pick an ally. Recall ALL other units and landmarks.
flavorText: "I walk my path alone." - Solitary Monk
name: Singular Will

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: My supported ally grows up to 4|4 this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: My supported ally grows up to 4|4 this round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Allies have been supported 3+ times.
flavorText: "Don't you worry, Pix! We're gonna get outta the Glade, and we're gonna adoribus ALL THE THINGS! Are you ready?!"
name: Lulu

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> or an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Barrier or an enemy Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: Pix protec... or Pix attac...?
name: Help, Pix!

description: Transform a follower into a 1|1 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Squirrel</style></link> and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it this round. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lulu</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Transform a follower into a 1|1 Squirrel and Silence it this round. Create a Lulu in your deck.
flavorText: "Adoribus!" - Lulu
name: Lulu's Whimsy!

description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Help, Pix!</style></link> in hand.
<link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: My supported ally grows up to 5|5 this round.
descriptionRaw:
Round Start: Create a Fleeting Help, Pix! in hand.
Support: My supported ally grows up to 5|5 this round.
flavorText: "Oooh! Look, Pix! It's a whole different world out here! Now let's give it lots of colors!"
name: Lulu

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Double my Power.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Double my Power.
flavorText: His secret is acorn powder shakes, four times a day.
name: Swole Squirrel

flavorText: Energy: 104kJ (25 kcal), Carbohydrates: 5.88g, Sugars: 3.53g, Dietary Fiber: 3g, Fat: 0.18g, Protein: 0.98g, Water: 92g...
name: Tasty Faefolk

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally Elusive.
flavorText: "Shh! This way! We've gotta make a sharp left after the walking treehouse, then go straight past the talking flowers. Lu, you listening to me? Lu? Lu! LULU! Do. NOT. Feed them. Do not do that."
name: Fae Guide

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Create an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mumblesprite</style></link> with my supported ally's stats.
descriptionRaw: Support: Create an attacking Mumblesprite with my supported ally's stats.
flavorText: You're supposed to follow your dreams, not manifest them through inadvertent muttered conjuration as you sleep-float through an ancient magical forest. I mean SHEESH.
name: Trevor Snoozebottom

flavorText: Another mumblesprite burst out, its eyes full of devilish mischief. "No more cheese for Trevor!" Bri announced. The others all nodded.
name: Mumblesprite

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> and +1|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack and +1|+0 this round.
flavorText: Sir Ribery Montague left home hoping to complete some great quest or curry favor with a notable house. But fate led him to a hidden bandlewood, where young Bri quickly transformed Sir Ribery into a frog, and yanked him off on HER adventures. Poor Rib!
name: Young Witch

description: Stop a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> or <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Stop a Fast or Slow spell that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: "Don't do that, you silly smufflefloof! You might hurt the antylopes!" - Lulu
name: Nopeify!

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy in its place. Reduce its cost to 0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to summon an exact Ephemeral copy in its place. Reduce its cost to 0 this round.
flavorText:
"More
Know I got it,
So here you go,
You look like you could use some more."
- Akali, 'MORE'
name: Go Get It

description:
When I'm supported, give me +0|+3 this round.
<link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +3|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm supported, give me +0|+3 this round.
Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 this round.
flavorText: The purple faefolk are sweet little creatures, and cared for by all those who encounter them. Well, almost all.
name: Fuzzy Caretaker

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Dragon, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, grant me Challenger.
flavorText: "When I lost my comrades in arms at Wrenwall, I thought I had also lost my resolve... but it turns out there is nothing that a fight can't stir up in an old soldier."
name: Dragonguard Lieutenant

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Challenger.
flavorText: "None shall escape us!" - Shyvana
name: Confront

description: ALL spells cost 1 more.
descriptionRaw: ALL spells cost 1 more.
flavorText: What begins as a shapeless, rough-hewn block of petricite quickly becomes something more under the clever hands of its sculptor. That is when a piece truly starts to come to life.
name: Stony Suppressor

flavorText: All creatures are fiercely protective of their young, but few are as well equipped to deal with would-be threats as a dragon.
name: Screeching Dragon

description: An ally with <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> the 2 <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemies one after another.
descriptionRaw: An ally with Fury strikes the 2 weakest enemies one after another.
flavorText: For centuries, the Demacians only knew of a dragon's fury through legend. Wrenwall changed that.
name: Molten Breath

description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other. Then, if the ally is a Dragon, heal it 2.
descriptionRaw: An ally and an enemy strike each other. Then, if the ally is a Dragon, heal it 2.
flavorText: When knight and dragon separated, panting and wounded, the latter seemed reinvigorated. It smelled blood, and was eager for more.
name: Strafing Strike

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give me +1|+1 this round.
levelupDescription: Dragon allies have dealt 16+ damage this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Dragon allies have dealt 16+ damage this game.
flavorText:
"On the one hand, she is, by her very nature, our most hated foe, her kind having historically brought only anguish to Demacia. On the other, she is trusted by the Prince, and seems to have all the makings of a determined soldier and valuable ally. I only hope that she does not betray the trust we have placed in her."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall
name: Shyvana

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +2|+2 this round and create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> 2 cost <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Strafing Strike</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give me +2|+2 this round and create a Fleeting 2 cost Strafing Strike in hand.
flavorText:
"The first time I witnessed her transformation, I beheld her with revulsion. There was Yvva, replete in fire and fury! If only I had known then what I know now--that she would become our sister in arms, an exemplary soldier... and my dear, dear friend."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall
name: Dragon Shyvana

description:
Grant an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Shyvana</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally Challenger.
Create a Shyvana in your deck.
flavorText: "None shall escape us!" - Shyvana
name: Shyvana's Confront

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Dragon, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, Rally.
flavorText:
"There in the distance! Is that...?"
"Looks like it."
"How can you be sure?"
"Oh, there's no mistaking them. Cover your ears. This will be loud." - Anden and Yessenia
name: Dragonguard Lookout

flavorText: "Careful, soldiers! If we tread carefully and don't disturb the nest, we can keep the mother dragon on the defensive. If we rile her up any further... Well, you'll want to be ready to run." - Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
name: Stalking Broodmother

description: When I'm summoned, create a random Dragon in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random Dragon in hand.
flavorText:
Dragon Egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco Murmurationis) 
Location: Recovered by researcher Anden Mayne on Expedition. 
Notes: Gestation period unknown. Incubation continued. Recent movement observed within shell. Egg responds to heat, light, hammer. Current studies inconclusive. 
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
name: Egghead Researcher

description: When I'm summoned, grant other Dragon allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other Dragon allies everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: When Demacia underwent a sudden spate of dragon attacks, Shyvana knew that Kadregrin the Infernal was to blame. Other dragons, inspired by his bold nature and powerful flame, drove the Demacians to fear.
name: Kadregrin the Infernal

description:
When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
For each ally that died this round, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguard</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
For each ally that died this round, summon a Dauntless Vanguard.
flavorText: "If a soldier falls, another must take their place. Our banner must never fall." - Garen
name: For The Fallen

description: Give an ally +1|+2 and "I can block units with <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>" this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +1|+2 and "I can block units with Elusive" this round.
flavorText: Any who would dare breach Demacia's walls will find a full company awaiting them--forewarned and heavily armed.
name: Sharpsight

description: When an ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When an ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0 and Tough.
flavorText: There are many places of honor among the Winter's Claw, but one of the greatest is The Scargrounds, where damaged war vessels that have returned from raids are repurposed as gathering halls for warriors and their kin. These ships embody the tribe that built them--resilient and adaptable.
name: The Scargrounds

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, grant me +3|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant me +3|+0.
flavorText:
The scout knelt by a tattered edge of cloth hidden in the snow, where the scent of human sweat and fire smoke lingered in the cold air.
He pulled the material free and saw at one end, a talisman dangled, dull under the stormy sky. Avarosan.
name: Troll Scavenger

description:
Pick a unit in your hand to reveal. Heal your Nexus equal to its Power.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Reduce its cost to 0.
descriptionRaw:
Pick a unit in your hand to reveal. Heal your Nexus equal to its Power.
Enlightened: Reduce its cost to 0.
flavorText: "Fully grown trolls have thick hides and dense bones that heal quickly, making them terrible, tenacious foes. Cut them down quickly, lest they recover to fight again another day." - Avarosan Marksman
name: Revitalizing Roar

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, grant an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> and <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: If you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant an ally Overwhelm and Regeneration.
flavorText: It is said that very few trolls are taught the chants of the Old Ones, and that those who know them can call on their forebears to imbue their brethren with exceptional strength.
name: Augur of the Old Ones

description: When I'm summoned, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ice Pillar</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create an Ice Pillar in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you play Ice Pillar.
flavorText:
One by one, torches lit along the pass, throwing the scene into sharp relief. There were dozens of trolls, maybe hundreds, each one hulking, massive, and deadly.
"I'll ask one more time," Trundle snarled, hefting Boneshiver over one shoulder. "Are you gonna give up, or am I gonna have to break your skulls?"
name: Trundle

description:
When I'm summoned, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ice Pillar</style></link> in hand.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +1|+0 for each 8+ cost card you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, create an Ice Pillar in hand.
Attack: Grant me +1|+0 for each 8+ cost card you Behold.
flavorText: The Avarosans refused. Trundle gestured, and, like an avalanche, the trolls descended with such momentum that it carried them on for miles afterward, deep into the Avarosan tribelands, battering and breaking everything in their path without reserve.
name: Trundle

description:
Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Trundle</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
Create a Trundle in your deck.
flavorText: "Bury 'em alive!" - Trundle
name: Trundle's Icequake

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Refill 8 mana.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> and <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Give the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Refill 8 mana.
Play and Round Start: Give the strongest enemy Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: "Haha! You didn't see that coming!" - Trundle
name: Ice Pillar

description: Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
descriptionRaw: Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
flavorText: "Bury 'em alive!" - Trundle
name: Icequake

description: Give an ally +0|+2 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +0|+2 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: Troll chants are highly varied. They differ from group to group, and are often incomprehensible. They are all, however, terrifying to witness.
name: Troll Chant

flavorText:
They felt it before they heard it, the ground trembling beneath their feet, but it quickly became audible, like distant thunder drawing closer.
Meyrick lifted his head, eyes wide, listening.
"What is it?" Anya whispered urgently, drawing her bow, but Meyrick was already sprinting back toward the path. 
"RUN!"
name: Uzgar the Ancient

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, grant me <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant me Regeneration.
flavorText: Once they were among the Avarosan huts, they called Hgar forward. With a laugh, she raised Snowsunder, ready to use the weapon to batter the wooden homes into little more than splinters.
name: Troll Ravager

description: For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each Yeti, Poro, and Elnuk. Then place the rest into your deck.
descriptionRaw: For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each Yeti, Poro, and Elnuk. Then place the rest into your deck.
flavorText: "...an' then a BIIIIG HUUUGE ELNUK came FLYIN' out of the trees with a teeny lil' poro on his back an' there was a FRIENDLY YETI as well because he wanted to play with his friends an' they all ran down the mountain goin' RAAAAAWRRRR an' then..." - Ingvar the Younger
name: Call the Wild

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, get an extra mana gem this round.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you Behold an 8+ cost card, get an extra mana gem this round.
flavorText:
"Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Rule of ice, break the sky.
Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Bring us strength, them demise."
- Troll chant
name: Faces of the Old Ones

description:
Get 2 empty mana gems.
For the top 5 cards in your deck, draw each card that costs 8+. Then place the rest into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Get 2 empty mana gems.
For the top 5 cards in your deck, draw each card that costs 8+. Then place the rest into your deck.
flavorText: For generations, Avarosan settlers heard strange, inexplicable sounds within the tumult of winter storms. Eventually, when they ventured much farther north, they finally discovered the source--ancient troll monoliths whispering in long-lost tongues as the wind swept through their yawning maws.
name: Voices of the Old Ones

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>. If they already have it, grant them +2|+2 instead.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Regeneration. If they already have it, grant them +2|+2 instead.
flavorText: Pity those who see the promise of victory in a troll's blood.
name: Troll Gifts

description: Summon 2 different, random champions from your hand and deck. Grow their stats up to 10|10.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 different, random champions from your hand and deck. Grow their stats up to 10|10.
flavorText:
"We got it all in our hands now
So can you handle what we're all about?"
- Ahri, 'POP/STARS'
name: Feel The Rush

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time Trick</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Fleeting Time Trick in hand.
levelupDescription: You've <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predicted</style></link> 4+ times.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, create 3 <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Chronobreaks</style></link> in your deck.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've Predicted 4+ times. When I level up, create 3 Chronobreaks in your deck.
flavorText: It's not about how much time you have, it's about how you spend it.
name: Ekko

description: Revive all allies that died this round, then <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Revive all allies that died this round, then Rally.
flavorText: "Once more, for the first time." - Ekko
name: Chronobreak

description:
Draw 1.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Parallel Convergence</style></link> in your deck.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ekko</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 1.
Create a Parallel Convergence in your deck.
Create an Ekko in your deck.
flavorText: "Splitting the timelines..." - Ekko
name: Ekko's Called Shot

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> 0 cost <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time Trick</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Fleeting 0 cost Time Trick in hand.
flavorText: Ekko can't fix everyone's mistakes, but that'll never stop him from trying again, and again, and again, and...
name: Ekko

description: When you summon another <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Chirean Sumpworker</style></link>, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> me and transform allied <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Chirean Sumpworkers</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Sumpworks Posses</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another Chirean Sumpworker, Obliterate me and transform allied Chirean Sumpworkers everywhere into Sumpworks Posses.
flavorText: The first Zaunite miners to discover the chirean thought them timid, simple creatures. But as the years passed, and as they grew comfortable with humans, they slowly revealed their close societal bonds, and their seemingly native understanding of technology.
name: Chirean Sumpworker

description: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: It takes a lot to upset a group of chirean, but when they get mad, everyone's gonna know about it.
name: Circuit Breaker

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "They're sweet enough on their own, sure, but get a bunch of 'em together, and before you know it, they've built some madcap machine and are off knockin' down some part of the Lanes." - Zaunite machinist
name: Sumpworks Posse

description: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
descriptionRaw: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
flavorText: "Not enough resources?! I built my first mechanized contraption with discarded clockwork parts and a rusted thermal capacitor. One must do what one can with what one has!" - Heimerdinger
name: Production Surge

description:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
flavorText: "Look out!" - Ekko
name: Timewinder

description:
Draw 1.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Parallel Convergence</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 1.
Create a Parallel Convergence in your deck.
flavorText: "Splitting the timelines..." - Ekko
name: Called Shot

description: Start a free attack with an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of each ally.
descriptionRaw: Start a free attack with an exact Ephemeral copy of each ally.
flavorText: "Converging!" - Ekko
name: Parallel Convergence

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Hexite Crystal</style></link> in the bottom 10 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Hexite Crystal in the bottom 10 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "BUT MY PLAAAANNN--MEEEOOOOOW!"
name: Fallen Feline

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Swap my stats with another unit.
descriptionRaw: Play: Swap my stats with another unit.
flavorText:
"A new slotbot? Didn't they shut down the plant that made these years ago?"
"I thought so. Something about 'rolling bombs' and 'unintended conflagration."
"Huh."
"...Wanna play?"
"Absolutely yes."
- Zaunite patrons
name: Defective Swapbot

description: When I'm summoned, create a random Elnuk in the top 6 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random Elnuk in the top 6 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "OKAY, LITTLE BUDDY, YOU JUST SIT STILL WHILE I FLIP THIS SWITCHAROO OVER HEEERE AND BOOM! HA! ELNUKS FOREVER! We're totally gonna need more grass. And room." - Practical Perfectionist
name: Volunteer Elnuk

description:
If you see me in a <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Prediction</style></link>, draw me.
Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
If you see me in a Prediction, draw me.
Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Strange how such a small thing could change the world so fundamentally. Strange, too, how that cat seems so intent on getting his paws on a sample. I suspect he enjoys the way light bounces through the crystal!" - Hextech researcher
name: Hexite Crystal

description: For the rest of the game, the first time you play a follower each round, pick 1 of 3 followers with the same cost to transform it into.
descriptionRaw: For the rest of the game, the first time you play a follower each round, pick 1 of 3 followers with the same cost to transform it into.
flavorText: "We're playing by MY rules." - Ekko
name: Concurrent Timelines

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flame Chompers!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Flame Chompers! in hand.
flavorText: Jinx had a more conventional supplier once, but the two of them had a small falling out. By which we mean, the supplier fell out of a window. By which we mean, the supplier was blown out of a window. By Jinx.
name: Boom Baboon

description: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>, then draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Predict, then draw 1.
flavorText: "The future's what I make it..." - Ekko
name: Time Trick

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>. Create 3 copies of the chosen card in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict. Create 3 copies of the chosen card in your deck.
flavorText: "Kay's awesome. She's got that whole 'practice makes perfect' mentality, you know? And boyyy does she practice." - Shomi
name: Practical Perfectionist

description: Swap my Power and Health with that of another unit.
descriptionRaw: Swap my Power and Health with that of another unit.
flavorText: "Dealer's choice!" - Defective Swapbot
name: Swapbot's Swap

description: Your cards have -1 cost, <link=keyword.Augment><sprite name=Augment><style=Keyword>Augment</style></link>, are created by <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Glorious Evolution</style></link>, and are now Tech.
descriptionRaw: Your cards have -1 cost, Augment, are created by Glorious Evolution, and are now Tech.
flavorText: "Progress is everything. I will bring the future to this city, whether it is ready or not." - Viktor
name: Glorious Evolution

description: When you summon a Tech, we share keywords.
descriptionRaw: When you summon a Tech, we share keywords.
flavorText: "Ah yes! The Adaptatron 3000! Adaptable, inventive, AND quite the looker! If the fellow could speak, I'm sure we'd have MUCH to share with each other." - Heimerdinger
name: Adaptatron 3000

description: If you see me in a <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Prediction</style></link>, summon me.
descriptionRaw: If you see me in a Prediction, summon me.
flavorText: "Ahh, Shomi's a GENIUS with that hoverboard. I once saw them switch a sumpgrinder into a bottomboard backslide, then catch air with a three-point triple dip! Or something. Look, the point is, they're awesome, okay?" - Practical Perfectionist
name: Dropboarder

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
flavorText: "Little parting gift..." - Pyke
name: Bone Skewer

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Each Lurker ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a random enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Each Lurker ally strikes a random enemy.
flavorText: "Ain't nothin' like a jaull-fish to show you who you can trust, and who you can kill." - Pyke
name: Jaull-fish

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
