descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in hand if you've leveled a champion this game.
flavorText: The giant scarabs were thought to have perished when the Shuriman empire fell. But the Mist's creeping tendrils burrowed deep into the sands, and bound the ancient things to Viego's service.
name: Thrumming Swarm

description: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: "Shred them!" - Renekton
name: Ruthless Predator

description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to draw a champion.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to draw a champion.
flavorText: "A necessary sacrifice." - Nasus
name: Rite of Calling

description: Destroy one of your mana gems to draw a Champion.
descriptionRaw: Destroy one of your mana gems to draw a Champion.
flavorText: "A necessary sacrifice." - Nasus
name: Rite of Calling

description: Kill an ally to draw a Champion.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to draw a Champion.
flavorText: "A necessary sacrifice." - Nasus
name: Rite of Calling

description: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me.
descriptionRaw: If you've slain 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me.
flavorText: "We are where both gods and men find their end." - Sanctum Conservator
name: Conservator's Judgment

description: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a landmark you can afford.
descriptionRaw: Manifest a landmark you can afford.
flavorText: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah
name: Stoneweaving

description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: The Sandcrafters lifted their hands, willing the sand into the familiar shape of armored, faceless soldiers, a tireless army ready to fight for their god-emperor.
name: Emperor's Dais

description: Give enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> and "<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Deal 2 to me" this round.
descriptionRaw: Give enemies -2|-0 and "Round End: Deal 2 to me" this round.
flavorText: "Their spirits will burn." - Nasus
name: Spirit Fire

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavorText:
"Okay, Barb. That's the last of the guards on this floor, but we've still gotta keep a low profile."
"BLARGH-BLAAA!"
"Inside voice, Barbara."
"Blarb."
"That's my girl."
name: Vekauran Bruiser

flavorText:
"Ogh today was fun! We stopped for lunch (skallashi cheese - BLEUGH!) when Kadira spotted a poor rockdoubb asleep in the shade. Of course, she had to tug on its tail, and of course, it got mad. I hope it likes the cheese we left behind!"
- Zaifa's diary
name: Grumpy Rockbear

description:
When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If the <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown</style></link> of any of your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thralls</style></link> is 4 or less, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> them to 0.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
Round End: If the Countdown of any of your Frozen Thralls is 4 or less, advance them to 0.
flavorText: "My lady appears to me in dreams, her voice near a whisper. 'Follow,' she bids me. This command I dare not disobey."
name: Draklorn Inquisitor

description: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> each enemy to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Tomb</style></link> in place with the enemy stored inside.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate each enemy to summon a Frozen Tomb in place with the enemy stored inside.
flavorText: "The cold overcomes all, eventually." - Lissandra
name: Buried in Ice

description:
Grant an ally +1|+2.
<link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Grant +2|+4 instead.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +1|+2.
Plunder: Grant +2|+4 instead.
flavorText: "You Avarosans only grow weak and plump in your fertile fields. So rest tonight, you pitiful weaklings, and while you dream of tomorrow's bounty, we will take it." - Scarmother Vrynna
name: Spoils of War

flavorText: Freed from its icy tomb, the corrupted troll knew one thing, and one thing only - it must do as its dark mistress commanded.
name: Frostguard Thrall

description: Get an empty mana gem and grant an ally +0|+2.
descriptionRaw: Get an empty mana gem and grant an ally +0|+2.
flavorText: "Beware the ice... and more importantly... beware what lies within!" - Scrawled on a Freljord inn wall
name: Cold Resistance

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link> and <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> it 2.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall and advance it 2.
levelupDescription: You've summoned 2+ allies that cost 8+.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, create a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Watcher</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've summoned 2+ allies that cost 8+. When I level up, create a Watcher in hand.
flavorText: "The Watchers lurk just beyond these walls, suspended in ice, frozen in time... and while they wait, I have plans that must be set in motion..."
name: Lissandra

description:
I cost 0 if you've summoned 5+ allies that cost 8+ this game. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> the enemy deck, leaving 3 non-champions.
descriptionRaw:
I cost 0 if you've summoned 5+ allies that cost 8+ this game. 
Attack: Obliterate the enemy deck, leaving 3 non-champions.
flavorText: "This is the end. As it was foretold -- as I promised. Sisters... forgive me." - Lissandra
name: Watcher

description:
Your Nexus is <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link> and <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> it 2.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> 0 cost <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Ice Shard</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Your Nexus is Tough.
When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall and advance it 2.
Round Start: Create a Fleeting 0 cost Ice Shard in hand.
flavorText: Few know what Lissandra sacrificed in order to gain power, her ambitions too great to be stymied by mortal trappings.
name: Lissandra

description:
<link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> a unit and summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Tomb</style></link> in its place.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lissandra</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Obliterate a unit and summon a Frozen Tomb in its place.
Create a Lissandra in your deck.
flavorText: "Kneel, or freeze." - Lissandra
name: Lissandra's Entomb

description:
<link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Frostbite an enemy.
Summon a Frozen Thrall.
flavorText: "The cold elicits many reactions. Let us find out yours." - Lissandra
name: Succumb to the Cold

flavorText: The young wolves were the most nervous, but were quickly emboldened as they saw their mother lunge for the boar's throat, icy fangs flashing.
name: Rimefang Pack

description: <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown 9</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frostguard Thrall</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 9: Summon a Frostguard Thrall.
flavorText: Certainly, there were enough half-witted warriors within the ranks of Trundle's disorderly army to use as front-line fodder, but Lissandra desired something much more loyal, something that served her, and her alone...
name: Frozen Thrall

description: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> a unit to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Tomb</style></link> in place with the unit stored inside.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate a unit to summon a Frozen Tomb in place with the unit stored inside.
flavorText: "Kneel, or freeze." - Lissandra
name: Entomb

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon exact copies of the units and landmarks stored inside.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 2: Summon exact copies of the units and landmarks stored inside.
flavorText: "Our lady will bury this world and all you know in ice." - Draklorn Inquisitor
name: Frozen Tomb

description:
Grant the top ally in your deck +2|+2.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Instead, grant all allies in your deck +2|+2.
descriptionRaw:
Grant the top ally in your deck +2|+2.
Enlightened: Instead, grant all allies in your deck +2|+2.
flavorText: The Freljord's unrelenting cold and punishing storms kill most who enter its barren lands. But those who survive find within themselves an inner strength that spurs them onward through the rest of their lives.
name: Ancestral Boon

description:
When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 2.
<link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Deal 2 to ALL units.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 2.
Countdown 1: Deal 2 to ALL units.
flavorText: Bizarre forms made of dark ice sprout from every surface along the ravine, their outward-facing spikes deterring any would-be intruders.
name: Blighted Ravine

description: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavorText: "I will bury the world in ice." - Lissandra
name: Ice Shard

description: When I'm summoned, grant all ally Poros a random keyword.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant all ally Poros a random keyword.
flavorText: There is one figure said to be legendary to all porokind. It is said that, as he travels, he bestows his deserving furry friends with all manner of magical forged gifts.
name: Fabled Poro

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Rimefang Pack</style></link>. Grant it +1|+1 for each time you've <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbitten</style></link> enemies this game.<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Rimefang Pack. Grant it +1|+1 for each time you've Frostbitten enemies this game.
flavorText: The rimefang wolves circled the drüvask, crouched low, wary. The stench of death clung tightly to it, pungent and overwhelming.
name: Rimefang Denmother

description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you have 2+ Yetis, summon me from hand and create a copy of me in your deck.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a Yeti.
descriptionRaw:
Round Start: If you have 2+ Yetis, summon me from hand and create a copy of me in your deck.
Play: Draw a Yeti.
flavorText: "...and they're sneaky, too! Last time I was out there, I had found shelter in a cave, only to find yearlings in there, fast asleep. Tried to keep my distance, but then one of the big 'uns returned, tall as a mountain, and covered in ice! Now you listen to me, because..." - Babbling Bjerg
name: Abominable Guardian

description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Flash Freeze</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Fury of the North</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Entomb</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting Flash Freeze, Fury of the North, or Entomb in hand.
flavorText: The Freljordian sisters Avarosa, Serylda, and Lissandra bore tremendous power, though chose to wield it in different ways - each one distinctly merciful, martial, or malicious.
name: Three Sisters

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 2. <style=Variable></style>
Draw 2.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 2. 
Draw 2.
flavorText: Before the news, the rumors. Before the rumors, the play. Before the play, the plot.
name: Whispered Words

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.guile><style=AssociatedCard>Guile</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Guile in hand.
flavorText: "Aelana, my dearest friend and colleague! Have you seen Lord Duin about...?  Ah, what a shame. I was very much looking forward to catching up. I do hope he paced himself tonight. I would hate for anything to happen to the old boy..." - Lady Auvray, Black Rose Spy
name: Thorn of the Rose

description: When you target me, grant me +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you target me, grant me +1|+0.
flavorText: After countless battles, Beryn had vowed to never again raise his sword, even if it meant forfeiting his life. But when the strange mists swept through Noxus and overtook Thea, he knew he had to break his promise. He would free her, no matter the cost.
name: Retired Reckoner

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Midnight Raid</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Midnight Raid in hand.
flavorText: When her sentence ended, Thea knew she could never rejoin her people. War - and Noxus - had changed her, made her a killer. She wouldn't know peace. Instead, she put her newfound skills to use for coin in the arenas.
name: Ruined Reckoner

description: An ally starts a free attack.
descriptionRaw: An ally starts a free attack.
flavorText: "Kill or be killed!" - Ruined Reckoner
name: Midnight Raid

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 2. <style=Variable></style>
An ally with 5+ Power <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 2. 
An ally with 5+ Power strikes an enemy.
flavorText: "The greatest threats are the ones that go unseen." - LeBlanc
name: Bloody Business

description: When an enemy blocks me, give me +3|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When an enemy blocks me, give me +3|+0 this round.
flavorText: Surprised by the resilience of the creature they'd found on the shore of Ionia, the young general insisted on taking it back home, eager to find out its true strength.
name: Thrashing Snapper

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 6. <style=Variable></style>
When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 6. 
When I'm summoned, Rally.
flavorText: Within the inner chambers of the Black Rose, Noxian nobles play their pieces, and murder befalls distant victims.
name: Incisive Tactician

description: <link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: When I'm summoned, transform me into an exact copy of the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally that <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> this round. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Reputation: When I'm summoned, transform me into an exact copy of the strongest ally that struck this round.
flavorText: "A secret is only worth the cost of keeping it."
name: Black Rose Spy

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Pick a spell in play or in hand and create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Pick a spell in play or in hand and create a Fleeting copy of it in hand.
flavorText: Imitation is flattery, and flattery can be quite deadly.
name: Mimic

levelupDescription: I've seen you deal 15+ damage.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mirror Image</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you deal 15+ damage. When I level up, create a Mirror Image in hand.
flavorText: "Now now, no need to squabble amongst ourselves. For the moment, we will refrain from any rash action. Let us reconvene once we've heard from our emissary. After all..."
name: LeBlanc

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 2 to anything.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>LeBlanc</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Deal 2 to anything.
Create a LeBlanc in your deck.
flavorText: Once the battle is won, one must not hesitate, but press on, pursue, and annihilate their foe.
name: LeBlanc's Sigil of Malice

description: Summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of an ally with 5+ Power.
descriptionRaw: Summon an exact Ephemeral copy of an ally with 5+ Power.
flavorText: "Seeing double?" - LeBlanc
name: Mirror Image

description: Each time I see you deal 15+ damage, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mirror Image</style></link> in hand. If you already have one, reduce its cost by 1 instead. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Each time I see you deal 15+ damage, create a Mirror Image in hand. If you already have one, reduce its cost by 1 instead.
flavorText: "...we all want the same thing."
name: LeBlanc

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give Spider allies +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give Spider allies +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Go on, my sweet. Let the others hear your call. You know how it excites them. You know it pleases me." - Elise
name: Shrieking Spinner

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Increase my Power by the total Power of all allies.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Increase my Power by the total Power of all allies.
flavorText: A nameless aberration towered above them in the smoke-filled chamber. The mages chanted in discordant chorus, dread their voices reaching a strained, fevered pitch. The monster breathed deep of their mounting fear, and each breath brought it terrible power.
name: Atakhan, Bringer of Ruin

description: The next time you summon another ally, deal 1 to it and grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: The next time you summon another ally, deal 1 to it and grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: "They're rarely kept as pets, you know. Just one little scratch from those claws of theirs can open up a vein... but I don't mind." - Clara, Crimson Disciple
name: Crimson Bloodletter

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 2 to anything.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Deal 2 to anything.
flavorText: Once the battle is won, one must not hesitate, but press on, pursue, and annihilate their foe.
name: Sigil of Malice

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Legion Marauders</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Legion Marauders.
flavorText: Though the soldiers of Noxus rarely leave survivors, the marauders leave even fewer.
name: Strength in Numbers

description: Give an ally +5|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +5|+0 this round.
flavorText: "You will act with grace and courtesy. You will flatter, you will disarm. You will listen. You will learn. And, when it is time, you will strike, and you WILL kill." - LeBlanc
name: Thorned Blade

description:
Each round, the first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit, I mark the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy. 
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Kill units with my mark.
descriptionRaw:
Each round, the first time you slay a unit, I mark the weakest enemy. 
Round End: Kill units with my mark.
levelupDescription: I've seen you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> 2 units with my mark.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you slay 2 units with my mark.
flavorText:
Once there was a lonely man
Who split himself in twain
From one came two, born anew
Never alone again.
name: Kindred

description:
Kill a unit, then revive it.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kindred</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Kill a unit, then revive it.
Create a Kindred in your deck.
flavorText: "This is only an interlude." - Lamb
name: Kindred's Spirit Journey

description:
Each round, the first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit, grant me +2|+2 and I mark the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy. 
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Kill units with my mark.
descriptionRaw:
Each round, the first time you slay a unit, grant me +2|+2 and I mark the weakest enemy. 
Round End: Kill units with my mark.
flavorText:
Death took the form of hunters 
None escape such as they
One cajoles with arrows and bow
One chases down its prey.
name: Kindred

description: Each round, the first time an ally dies, summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Encroaching Mist</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time an ally dies, summon an Encroaching Mist.
levelupDescription: I've seen allies with 20+ total power die.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen allies with 20+ total power die.
flavorText: "There is something that deeply unsettles me about the young king. Something at his heart... a hunger that cannot be satisfied, a desire that goes unfulfilled." - From the record of Nunyo Necrit of Camavor
name: Viego

description:
Pick a unit to <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> your Nexus, then kill it.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Viego</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Pick a unit to strike your Nexus, then kill it.
Create a Viego in your deck.
flavorText: "I have given everything to find her, and yet it is not enough." - Viego
name: Viego's Despair

description:
Each round, the first time a unit dies, summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Encroaching Mist</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Steal the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy this round. If it's a champion, kill it instead.
descriptionRaw:
Each round, the first time a unit dies, summon an Encroaching Mist.
Round Start: Steal the strongest enemy this round. If it's a champion, kill it instead.
flavorText: "It is obvious to me in hindsight that it was not Isolde's death that fueled Viego's delusions, nor his need for fulfillment, but simply that something he desperately wanted was denied him." - From the record of Nunyo Necrit of Camavor
name: Viego

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to draw 2.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to draw 2.
flavorText: In shadow they lurk, waiting for a weary nod or an absent mind. Then claws, a gaping maw, and finally, darkness.
name: Spirit Leech

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
flavorText: "As my time on this place comes to a close, I find myself pondering not my first death, but the second. Who will be the last soul to remember my name? And when they, too, fall to this earth... what will become of me?" - Eminent Benefactor
name: The Etherfiend

description:
Draw 1.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Activate an ally's <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> effect, ignoring any targeted portions.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 1.
Nightfall: Activate an ally's Nightfall effect, ignoring any targeted portions.
flavorText: "Come, child. No need to be afraid." - Mask Mother
name: Unto Dusk

description: Once I've seen 3 <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> or <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> allies attack, destroy me to summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Vilemaw</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Once I've seen 3 Fearsome or Nightfall allies attack, destroy me to summon Vilemaw.
flavorText:
Its altars may lie dormant, its paths may seem untrod,
But in the dark still skitters, the beast that fools forgot.
name: The Twisted Treeline

description:
When another ally dies, or <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 1.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When another ally dies, or Last Breath: Toss 1.
flavorText: "Alright, you lot--haul them traps up! An' remember: if you see one of 'em sea scarabs, you cut rope an' move on. I ain't riskin' the keel for whatever they've half-eaten, y'hear?" - Bilgewater captain
name: Sea Scarab

description: When I'm summoned, grant all allied <link=card.viego><style=AssociatedCard>Viegos</style></link> and other <link=card.mist><style=AssociatedCard>Encroaching Mists</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant all allied Viegos and other Encroaching Mists everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText: Each living creature that beholds the Black Mist sees something unique in it, their own fears manifested and realized in vague, roiling forms.
name: Encroaching Mist

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Play me as <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>First Wave</style></link> or <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Last Wind</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Play me as First Wave or Last Wind.
flavorText: The Kinkou speak of only two gods: the first wave, who cradles life in its warm waters, and the last wind, who snatches life with its final, frigid sighs.
name: The Wings and The Wave

description: To play me, kill an ally.
descriptionRaw: To play me, kill an ally.
flavorText: What is life without death?
name: Last Wind

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Prey</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Prey.
flavorText: What is death without life?
name: First Wave

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link>, <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Lifesteal, Fearsome, and Ephemeral.
flavorText: "Come, child. See as I see, and feel as I feel. Do not fear the darkness." - The Rekindler
name: Song of the Isles

description: When I'm summoned, summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Encroaching Mist</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon an Encroaching Mist.
flavorText: The soldiers of Camavor marched with Viego in life, then again in death, their loyalty unwavering.
name: Camavoran Soldier

description: Give the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> ally "I can't take damage or die" this round.
descriptionRaw: Give the weakest ally "I can't take damage or die" this round.
flavorText: "Shine once more, before the end." - Lamb
name: Lamb's Respite

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from 2 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Drain 2 from 2 enemies.
flavorText: "I will take what I want, and dispense with what I don't." - Viego
name: Withering Mist

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: A handful of Targonian tribes speak of the Fox, a god of death seen as a lone star in the night sky. As the legend goes, the Fox descends upon the mountain with each death, and takes the soul to the skies to create his own dark constellation.
name: Astral Fox

description: Pick a unit to <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> your Nexus, then kill it.
descriptionRaw: Pick a unit to strike your Nexus, then kill it.
flavorText: "I have given everything to find her, and yet it is not enough." - Viego
name: Despair

description: Kill an ally to deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Now you'll truly shine!" - Astral Fox
name: Symmetry In Stars

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> if an ally died this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 and Fearsome if an ally died this round.
flavorText: "Once there was a hapless young man who thought to court a spider, never once suspecting he would end up in her web..."
name: Soulspinner

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to grant me its stats and keywords.
descriptionRaw: Play: Kill an ally to grant me its stats and keywords.
flavorText: They say the Mask Mother created Kindred, just as she created all the incarnations of death. But from whom did she receive her mask, if she didn't craft it herself?
name: Mask Mother

description: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
flavorText: "Eventually all will be forgotten." - The Etherfiend
name: The Second Death

description: To play me, I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> an ally or deal 3 to your Nexus.
descriptionRaw: To play me, I strike an ally or deal 3 to your Nexus.
flavorText: At first, the Demacian soldiers thought they heard dozens of claws skittering across the square's tile. It wasn't until it breached the watchtower that they realized those many limbs belonged to a single creature.
name: Crawling Viperwyrm

description: Kill a unit, then revive it.
descriptionRaw: Kill a unit, then revive it.
flavorText: "This is only an interlude." - Lamb
name: Spirit Journey

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Encroaching Mist</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Summon an Encroaching Mist.
flavorText: Maokai worked tirelessly to cultivate life in the Shadow Isles. The Mist's ambivalence makes its ironies no less cruel.
name: Invasive Hydravine

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Prey</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Prey.
flavorText: Who could forget their own god of death, other than those cursed with immortality? And what greater fear can a god of death have, other than being forgotten?
name: Fading Icon

flavorText: "They flicker through the dark forest, dotting the treeline like stars in the night sky, unaware of their pursuers." - Lamb
name: Prey

description:
To play me, I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> an ally or deal 3 to your Nexus.
When I kill another unit, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
To play me, I strike an ally or deal 3 to your Nexus.
When I kill another unit, drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: For centuries, the Black Mist has sought out creatures all over the world, twisting and warping them; turning them into nightmarish versions of their past selves.
name: Camavoran Dragon

description:
<link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the 2 <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemies.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Summon a copy of me with <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> 2.
descriptionRaw:
Countdown 1: Stun the 2 weakest enemies.
Daybreak: Summon a copy of me with Countdown 2.
flavorText: "Let the sun shed Her light upon us. Those who are weak and unworthy will cower before Her gaze!" - Solari Priestess
name: Eye of the Ra-Horak

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun an enemy.
levelupDescription: You've summoned 10+ mana of landmarks.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, if you have the attack token, create an <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Unstoppable Force</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've summoned 10+ mana of landmarks. When I level up, if you have the attack token, create an Unstoppable Force in hand.
flavorText:
"And here's da last stop on da Chip tour of Targon! It's PAPA! He's da BIGGEST of da Targon giants, an' sings a mean song, too, lemme tell ya. Just don't try to climb him! Da spikes tickle him, and you dun want him sneezin' when you're halfway up no sah!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 6
name: Malphite

description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you have the attack token, create an <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Unstoppable Force</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Stun an enemy.
When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create an Unstoppable Force in hand.
flavorText: "Boom boom boom!"
name: Malphite

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> all enemies.
descriptionRaw: Stun all enemies.
flavorText: "ROCK. SOLID." - Malphite
name: Unstoppable Force

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Deal 3 to it if you've summoned a landmark this game.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Malphite</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy. Deal 3 to it if you've summoned a landmark this game.
Create a Malphite in your deck.
flavorText: "Oop yep dat's just da ground shakin' and not papa doin' nothin' with his hands NOPE OKAY onwards annn' UPWARDS!" - Chip
name: Malphite's Ground Slam

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: "Only place to go is down!" - Malphite
name: Rockslide

description: <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create 2 random Celestial cards that cost 3 or less in hand.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 2: Create 2 random Celestial cards that cost 3 or less in hand.
flavorText: Those who set off to climb Mount Targon are soon rewarded with some of Runeterra's most glorious views. And as the climb steepens, so do its rewards.
name: Startipped Peak

description: Once you've summoned a landmark this game, grant me +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Once you've summoned a landmark this game, grant me +2|+2.
flavorText:
"Okay so hello I'm Chip an' I'm here to show you Targon! It's wowow big an' tall so I hope you got good shoes for da walkin'! Let's GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 1
name: Chip

description: <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown 3</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Seed of Strength</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3: Create a Seed of Strength in hand.
flavorText:
"Here's da first stop on da tour! I call this da leg wobbler because WOWEE are dere a lot steps! Pretty cool view too, an' dat's one of the best things in Targon. Okay let's GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 2
name: Spiral Stairs

description: Grant an ally +3|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +3|+2 and Overwhelm.
flavorText:
"OH I FORGOT. Okay so you're probabab... probababer... problee thinkin' dat your legs are like WOWOW tired right now, but I seen the people who walk around here a lot, an' sooner or later dey get ALL KINDSA muscles! So keep at it, and let's GO! AGAIN!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 2.1
name: Seed of Strength

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 2: Obliterate the weakest enemy.
flavorText:
"Okay so EV-ER-EE-BODY watch out here cuz dis is a BIG DROP an' I've fallen down here a few times and LEMME TELL YOU it's a long way down! An' I'm made of wok so I just bounce, but dat's not true for you guys... so be caref--ooh dere's Cliff! Let's go say hi!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 3
name: Rockfall Path

description: When I'm supported, give me and my supporting ally +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm supported, give me and my supporting ally +1|+1 this round.
flavorText:
"Don't be afraid of the howling gale
As it blows 'cross the mountain and through the dale
Never you worry, you have nothing to fear
My darling, rest, mother is near." - Targonian lullaby
name: Frightened Ibex

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Crest of Insight</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon a Crest of Insight.
flavorText:
"Okay EV-ER-EE-ONE say "HI BLU!" HI BLU! Okay one time I thought he was like "HI BLU!" back, but now dat I think about it might have been my voice bouncin' off da walls. OH WELL he's all magical and stuff and also blue so if you ask me he doesn't even NEED to speak! OKAY BYE BLUE LET'S GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 5
name: Blue Sentinel

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: The Solari believe that it was Targon's sunhawks--brilliant as they are--who caught the Immortal Fire's attention, and who subsequently inspired her cycle of death and rebirth.
name: Solari Sunhawk

description: Once you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant me +3|+0. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Once you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant me +3|+0.
flavorText:
"Okay, so dis is CLIFF! He's a big ol' fella who's been aroun' da block QUITE A FEW times let me tell you. An' I know dat he looks cool and I know dat he seems like a nice guy, but he's got a lotta heavy stuff on his back, and sometimes it falls on people so BE CAREFUL okay? Thank you moving on!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 4
name: Earth Elemental

description: <link=keyword.Countdown><style=Keyword>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Get an extra mana gem this round.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 1: Get an extra mana gem this round.
flavorText: "Dis is Blu's faaaaaavorite place inna whole wide world! He says it's SUPER magical! Oooh, ahhh!" - Chip
name: Crest of Insight

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: If you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, deal 4 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: If you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, deal 4 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: From time to time, the great colossi of Targon awaken from their slumber and trek to new grounds atop the great mountain. These events are never quiet, and seldom safe.
name: Stonebreaker

description:
<link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
If you have a Celestial ally, replace your deck with 20 copies of <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Behold the Infinite</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Invoke.
If you have a Celestial ally, replace your deck with 20 copies of Behold the Infinite.
flavorText: "Look, Kulun! The stars have so many stories to tell! Which should we read tonight, hmm?" - Moondreamer
name: Starlit Epiphany

description: Grant an ally in hand +8|+8.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally in hand +8|+8.
flavorText: "Embrace your destiny, and shine more brilliantly than anyone could have ever known." - Taric
name: Destiny's Call

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Deal 3 to it if you've summoned a landmark this game.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy. Deal 3 to it if you've summoned a landmark this game.
flavorText: "Oop yep dat's just da ground shakin' and not papa doin' nothin' with his hands NOPE OKAY onwards annn' UPWARDS!" - Chip
name: Ground Slam

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun the Strongest enemy.
flavorText: Some Solari claim the sunhawk's brilliant gleam is the bird trying to send a signal to The Immortal Fire herself.
name: Blinding Crest

description: If you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, deal 4 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: If you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, deal 4 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Spike is not a morning person..." - Malphite
name: Shaken Ground

description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Create a random <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card in hand.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> card in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Daybreak: Create a random Nightfall card in hand.
Nightfall: Create a random Daybreak card in hand.
flavorText: So goes the cycle of night and day, one always following the other.
name: Heavens Aligned

description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
flavorText: Though the Noxians had laid their trap well, still no-one knew the woods better than Demacia's scouts. Every snapped branch, every footprint was a clue that led them closer to their prince.
name: Ardent Tracker

description: When you play a Dragon, it <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> me and you draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When you play a Dragon, it strikes me and you draw 1.
flavorText: "That shriek you hear from way up high? That's no bird, my boy. That's the cry of a hunting dragon." - Demacian farmer
name: Dragon Chow

description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: The first time I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
flavorText: After learning of his son's disappearance, King Jarvan III tasked his trusted friend Lord Barrett Buvelle with organizing a search party. The prince returned safe and well. Lord Buvelle, to the king's eternal regret, did not.
name: Honored Lord

description: The next time you play a unit this round, grant it <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link>. It's now an Elite.
descriptionRaw: The next time you play a unit this round, grant it Scout. It's now an Elite.
flavorText: When Demacians' mettle is tested, they rise to the occasion.
name: Field Promotion

description: An ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
flavorText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV
name: Cataclysm

description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally Barrier this round.
Rally.
flavorText: "Once more, soldier of Demacia!" - Jarvan IV
name: Golden Aegis

description: Grant an ally +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+1.
flavorText: "I could teach you a thing or two." - Lord Buvelle
name: Battlefield Prowess

description: The next time you summon an ally this round, grant it <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The next time you summon an ally this round, grant it Challenger.
flavorText: "Form up, on me!" - Silverwing Vanguard
name: Tattered Banner

description: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the strongest enemy.
levelupDescription: Allies have survived 3+ <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> from enemy blockers.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Allies have survived 3+ strikes from enemy blockers.
flavorText: The Noxians knew where Prince Jarvan's hunt would take him. They knew how many Demacians would be by his side, and they knew that his honor wouldn't permit him to flee. The trap was set.
name: Jarvan IV

description:
When you attack, pay my cost to summon me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Cataclysm</style></link> in hand.
When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the strongest enemy.
Round Start: Create a Fleeting Cataclysm in hand.
When I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
flavorText: But the Noxians did fail to account for the young prince's sheer strength and uncompromising will. They paid for this miscalculation in blood.
name: Jarvan IV

description:
An ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jarvan IV</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
Create a Jarvan IV in your deck.
flavorText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV
name: Jarvan IV's Cataclysm

description: When I'm summoned, double other allies' Power and Health and grant them <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, double other allies' Power and Health and grant them Challenger.
flavorText: "Who else could Demacia send to save her prince than the Lady of Clouds herself?" - King Jarvan III
name: Cithria, Lady of Clouds

description: When an ally with <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> kills a unit, grant it an additional +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When an ally with Fury kills a unit, grant it an additional +1|+1.
flavorText: The Mist warped Gregem's mind, forcing him to relive Wrenwall, over and over. Stoked by long-buried bitterness and rage, he turned against the comrades who once stood with him.
name: Ruined Dragonguard

description:
When I'm summoned, draw <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Jarvan IV</style></link>. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> and <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw Jarvan IV. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies Challenger and Scout this round.
flavorText: "What, pray tell, would a father sacrifice to save his son? Better yet, what would a king?" - LeBlanc
name: King Jarvan III

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> and +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally Challenger and +1|+1.
flavorText: Kadregrin sowed chaos and fear long before the Black Mist reached Demacia. Under Viego's command, however, his skills would bolster all of the Ruined King's forces.
name: Kadregrin the Ruined

description: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
descriptionRaw: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
flavorText: The great Stonehorns are reputed to have come from the time the petricite forest was young, their spreading antlers made of a material similar to those now-ancient trees.
name: Towering Stonehorn

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Silverwing Vanguard</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Blinding Assault</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Fleetfeather Tracker</style></link> in hand.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> allies +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Create a Silverwing Vanguard, Blinding Assault, or Fleetfeather Tracker in hand.
Attack: Give other Challenging allies +1|+1 this round.
flavorText: The very sight of the Swiftwing flight inspires Demacian soldiers on fields far below. Upon seeing them descend through the clouds, those on the ground are reinvigorated, and ready to continue the fight.
name: Swiftwing Flight

description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an Elite, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tattered Banner</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an Elite, create a Tattered Banner in hand.
flavorText: Only when she reached the city's walls did her legs finally give way. The Dauntless Vanguard would carry her message to the king, and the king would save the prince. Thus would her wrong be righted, and her honor preserved.
name: Penitent Squire

description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Vanguard Cavalry</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: The first time I Challenge an enemy, transform me into Vanguard Cavalry.
flavorText: Once the call was made, every Demacian soldier was summoned to aid in the search for the prince. Expediency, more than anything, was key.
name: Gallant Rider

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Mark of the Storm</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Mark of the Storm in hand.
levelupDescription: You've summoned the same ally 5+ times this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've summoned the same ally 5+ times this game.
flavorText: Kennen had heard it too, the roar of some unseen... something. Man or monster, it did not matter. The Kinkou would protect their land at any cost.
name: Kennen

description: When allies attack, spend 1 spell mana to summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Short Tooth</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, spend 1 spell mana to summon an attacking Short Tooth.
flavorText: The Trainer's routine is the same each night. Fish 'n ale for supper, a quick puff of his bubblepipe, followed by kisses on snouts and a story for his sharks before bedtime.
name: Shark Trainer

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Refill 1 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Refill 1 spell mana.
flavorText: If there is no greater pain than the papercut, then there is no one who better understands pain than the librarian.
name: Wizened Wizard

description: To play, discard 1. Grant all allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: To play, discard 1. Grant all allies +1|+1.
flavorText: "I can never remember how these things work." - Poppy
name: Spirit Portal

flavorText:
"They say don't bite the hand that feeds--but by Bandle--they bit my hand AND anything else they could reach!" 
- Conchologist Ecological Note, Day 13
name: Short Tooth

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other Yordle ally you have. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other Yordle ally you have.
flavorText: "What's my secret? You'll have to ask the biceps. They do all the talking."
name: Swole Scout

description:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant it +1|+0.
descriptionRaw:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant it +1|+0.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've summoned 4+ multi-region allies.
flavorText: "Okay, Plan A: We blast our way in and start shooting. If that doesn't work, we go to Plan B: Blast our way out and keep shooting. Then, we'll regroup and go to Plan C, which is basically Plan A again..."
name: Tristana

description:
I cost 2 less if you have a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tristana</style></link> or if you've played cards from 4+ regions this game.
Deal 3 to a unit.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tristana</style></link> in your deck. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
I cost 2 less if you have a Tristana or if you've played cards from 4+ regions this game.
Deal 3 to a unit.
Create a Tristana in your deck.
flavorText: In every ka-blam there's a ka-boom waiting to be born.
name: Tristana's Buster Shot

description:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant me and it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant me and it +1|+0 and Impact.
flavorText: "...and whatever happens... JUST. KEEP. SHOOTING."
name: Tristana

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Megatee</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Megatee.
flavorText: Things minitees like: napping on the warm summerstones beside the Nakotak tribal lands. Things minitees do not like: being shoved off said summerstones by cheeky yordles...
name: Minitee

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Transform the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy into a 3|3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mini-Minitee</style></link> and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it. It can't block.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Transform the strongest enemy into a 3|3 Mini-Minitee and Silence it. It can't block.
flavorText: ...but, as they say, yordles gonna yordle!
name: Megatee

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant the unit I'm <link=keyword.Attach><sprite name=Attach><style=Keyword>Attached</style></link> to +1|+1. Otherwise, grant me +1|+1 instead.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to +1|+1. Otherwise, grant me +1|+1 instead.
levelupDescription: I or the unit I'm <link=keyword.Attach><sprite name=Attach><style=Keyword>Attached</style></link> to have attacked 3+ times.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I or the unit I'm Attached to have attacked 3+ times.
flavorText: Yuumi did have to admit that for all her fussing, she did like Book quite a lot. She liked its smell. She liked its illustrations. She even liked jumping through its portals! ...but nothing was as good as just having Norra back home, safe and sound.
name: Yuumi

description: To play, discard 1. Deal 2 to a unit and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: To play, discard 1. Deal 2 to a unit and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Let's give 'em a show!" - Rumble
name: Electro Harpoon

flavorText:
"Though quite small, the grumbleslug has a large appetite and possesses what I can only describe as a 'real attitude problem.'" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 17
name: Grumbleslug

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Pokey Stick</style></link> in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 2.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Pokey Stick in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 2.
levelupDescription: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: You've damaged the enemy Nexus this round.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Round End: You've damaged the enemy Nexus this round.
flavorText: Long ago, Gnar and his kin thrived in the Nakotak Valley. It was an innocent place, untouched by modern trappings. How unfortunate that the passing of time took this place from Gnar. But how fortunate that time doesn't exactly function as expected in Bandle City.
name: Gnar

description:
Deal 1 to an enemy and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it. 
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Gnar</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to an enemy and Stun it. 
Create a Gnar in your deck.
flavorText: "Ahanga!" - Gnar
name: Gnar's Wallop

description:
When I level up, grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If I've seen you start the round with the attack token, transform me back into <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Gnar</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I level up, grant the strongest enemy Vulnerable.
Round End: If I've seen you start the round with the attack token, transform me back into Gnar.
flavorText: The yordles sat on their tree branch and cheered for Gnar as he duked it out with another passing monster. These were rare events, but always awesome to spectate!
name: Mega Gnar

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Double my Power and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Double my Power and Impact.
flavorText:
"They say I'm a joke. That I've got dirt for brains. That I'm all tremble and no quake. Well I've just got one thing to say to my opponents...  I'm gonna rock your world!" 
- Pre-match interview
name: Earthshaker

description: When I’m summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrappy Bomb</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, summon a Scrappy Bomb.
flavorText: Giselle was one of Professor Heimerdinger's best students until she heard of Ziggs' strange experiments down in Zaun. Then it was all "hexplosives" this and "could you recommend me for an internship" that.
name: Inventive Chemist

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon another Yordle follower that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Summon another Yordle follower that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: "Alice here holds two shots: one's a greeting, the other's a farewell. You two wanna meet?"
name: Gruff Grenadier

description: When I'm summoned, if you've dealt damage to the enemy Nexus 4+ times, grant me <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> 4 times. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've dealt damage to the enemy Nexus 4+ times, grant me Impact 4 times.
flavorText: Chewy outside, tough and gritty center.
name: Furious Faefolk

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant the unit I'm <link=keyword.Attach><sprite name=Attach><style=Keyword>Attached</style></link> to <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> and +1|+1. Otherwise, grant me <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> and +1|+1 instead.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to SpellShield and +1|+1. Otherwise, grant me SpellShield and +1|+1 instead.
flavorText: Yet with each new portal came new adventures, and with each new adventure came a chance to make new friends!
name: Yuumi

description:
Grant an ally +1|+0. Deal 1 to an enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Yuumi</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +1|+0. Deal 1 to an enemy.
Create a Yuumi in your deck.
flavorText: "Zoooooom!" - Yuumi
name: Yuumi's Prowling Projectile

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Grant me +1|+1.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've attacked 3+ times.
flavorText: Yuumi did have to admit that for all her fussing, she did like Book quite a lot. She liked its smell. She liked its illustrations. She even liked jumping through its portals! ...but nothing was as good as just having Norra back home, safe and sound.
name: Yuumi

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant the unit I'm <link=keyword.Attach><sprite name=Attach><style=Keyword>Attached</style></link> to <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> and +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to SpellShield and +1|+1.
flavorText: "I go where you go!" - Yuumi
name: Yuumi

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant me <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> and +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Grant me SpellShield and +1|+1.
flavorText: Yet with each new portal came new adventures, and with each new adventure came a chance to make new friends!
name: Yuumi

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant the unit I'm <link=keyword.Attach><sprite name=Attach><style=Keyword>Attached</style></link> to +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to +1|+1.
levelupDescription: The unit I'm <link=keyword.Attach><sprite name=Attach><style=Keyword>Attached</style></link> to has attacked 3+ times<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: The unit I'm Attached to has attacked 3+ times.
flavorText: "I'm sticking with you!" - Yuumi
name: Yuumi

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant me +0|+2 for each card you discarded last round, then shuffle my stats. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Grant me +0|+2 for each card you discarded last round, then shuffle my stats.
flavorText: For obvious reasons, "paddlemarpower" never really took off as a unit of measurement.
name: Salty Spinner

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a copy of me in hand at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create a copy of me in hand at the next Round Start.
flavorText:
"A true supervillain can never have enough minions! Short little fellows who know their place, obey your every word, and always come back for further instruction."
- Excerpt from Ch. 2 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
name: Minion

flavorText: The Rainbowfish was glad to do some aerial reconnaissance, even if it meant taking a bigger leap than she ever had before. She would take any reprieve, however slight, from Yuumi's hungry stare.
name: Rainbowfish

description: Attach me to an ally to give it my stats and keywords while I'm <link=keyword.Attach><sprite name=Attach><style=Keyword>Attached</style></link>. When that ally leaves play, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw: Attach me to an ally to give it my stats and keywords while I'm Attached. When that ally leaves play, Recall me.
flavorText: "Help 'em out, Rainbowfish!" - Yuumi
name: Rainbowfish

flavorText: The Rainbowfish was glad to do some aerial reconnaissance, even if it meant taking a bigger leap than she ever had before. She would take any reprieve, however slight, from Yuumi's hungry stare.
name: Rainbowfish

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Round Start: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've dealt 12+ damage with Darkness.
flavorText:
"This world will fear me. It will wear my scars for all eternity. It will ache under the weight of my power. It will shudder under the shadow of my enormity!"
- Excerpt from Ch. 1 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
name: Veigar

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy and stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Veigar</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy and stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
Create a Veigar in your deck.
flavorText: "Just... stay right there..." - Veigar
name: Veigar's Event Horizon

description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> 1 extra damage.
When you play <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link>, it can target anything.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Round Start: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
When you play Darkness, it can target anything.
flavorText:
"Aha. Muaha. Ahahaha. AHAHA. AHAHAHAHAHA! MUAHAHAHA! MUAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"
- Excerpt from Ch. 12 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
name: Grand Overseer Veigar

flavorText: Yordles haven't quite figured out gravity yet, but then, gravity hasn't quite figured out Bandle City, either.
name: Stone Stackers

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> or <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Barrier or SpellShield this round.
flavorText: "I'll protect you with my wild and furious... meow!" - Yuumi
name: Friendship!

description: Refill your spell mana. Give an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> and +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Refill your spell mana. Give an ally Elusive and +1|+1 this round.
flavorText:
"I SEE them enter the left shell, yet when I CHOOSE that shell, it's empty. I'm beginning to suspect this game might be rigged..."
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 14
name: Shell Game

description: When I'm summoned, if you've played a created card or killed a unit with a spell this game, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Bass of Burden</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've played a created card or killed a unit with a spell this game, summon a Bass of Burden.
flavorText: If Veigar needed help tipping the scales of justice, then none were better suited to the job than these two. They knew all of them. Except the mixolydian one.
name: Tenor of Terror

flavorText: "The show had already run into a number of mishaps by the third piece, when the larger of the two singers--I use the term loosely--either delved into the world of the true avant-garde, or choked on a hairball. I am, even at the time of writing, unsure which." - Max Bliff, Gatekeeper
name: Bass of Burden

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard up to 3 cards to grant allied <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Rumbles</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> for the first, <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> for the second, and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> for the third.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard up to 3 cards to grant allied Rumbles everywhere Impact for the first, Quick Attack for the second, and SpellShield for the third.
levelupDescription: I've seen Mecha-Yordle allies deal 12+ damage.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen Mecha-Yordle allies deal 12+ damage.
flavorText:
"Annnnd that oughta do 'er."
"ERROR."
"WHAT? I just fixed that!"
"SYSTEM FAILURE IMMINENT."
"Turn it off. TURN IT OFF!"
- Rumble and Tristy
name: Rumble

description: When you deal damage to the enemy Nexus, create a random Mecha-Yordle in hand or if you have one, grant all Mecha-Yordles in hand +1|+1 and reduce their cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: When you deal damage to the enemy Nexus, create a random Mecha-Yordle in hand or if you have one, grant all Mecha-Yordles in hand +1|+1 and reduce their cost by 1.
flavorText: "I mean, I know Tristy's already got the flamethrower, the electro-drill, and the giant freakin' mace, but c'mon... I wasn't NOT gonna add rockets. Heh heh."
name: Rumble

description:
Grant an ally +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Rumble</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +2|+0 and Impact.
Create a Rumble in your deck.
flavorText: "If they ain't howlin', it ain't hot enough! Heh heh." - Rumble
name: Rumble's Flamespitter

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give other attacking allies +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "How do I do it? Screamin' matches night after night? Gargle engine oil. Five minutes in the mornin', five at night."
name: Arena Mechacaster

description: Grow an ally to 3|3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Grow an ally to 3|3 this round.
flavorText:
"I used to be like you–couldn't even lift a puffcap. But then, I found "Shake: by Purpleberry." It's got all the right stuff a yordle needs to go from zero to hero. So when you've had a hard workout, fuel up with 'Shake,' and become the buffest of bros, like me!" 
- Printed Advertisement
name: Purpleberry Shake

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy and stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy and stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
flavorText: "Just... stay right there..." - Veigar
name: Event Horizon

description: Pick 1 of 3 units or spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 <link=card.puffcap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on all copies of it.
descriptionRaw: Pick 1 of 3 units or spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on all copies of it.
flavorText: "Rule 986: Traps are NOT toys... but they sure are fun!"
name: Entrapment

description: Pick 1 of 3 spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 <link=card.puffcap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on all copies of it.
descriptionRaw: Pick 1 of 3 spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on all copies of it.
flavorText: "Rule 986: Traps are NOT toys... but they sure are fun!"
name: Entrapment

description: Pick 1 of 3 units from the enemy deck and plant 3 <link=card.puffcap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on all copies of it.
descriptionRaw: Pick 1 of 3 units from the enemy deck and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on all copies of it.
flavorText: "Rule 986: Traps are NOT toys... but they sure are fun!"
name: Entrapment

description:
<link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to deal 2 to anything.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kennen</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Recall an ally to deal 2 to anything.
Create a Kennen in your deck.
flavorText: "First the crack, then the boom!" - Kennen
name: Kennen's Lightning Rush

description: Grant an enemy Mark of the Storm. If they already have it, remove the mark to <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> and deal 2 to them instead.
descriptionRaw: Grant an enemy Mark of the Storm. If they already have it, remove the mark to Stun and deal 2 to them instead.
flavorText: The storm approaches.
name: Mark of the Storm

description: When I'm summoned, blocked, or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Mark of the Storm</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, blocked, or Attack: Create a Mark of the Storm in hand.
flavorText: "We are wind and thunder! We are rain and lightning! This is... TEMPEST!"
name: Kennen

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Mecha-Yordle and reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to Manifest a Mecha-Yordle and reduce its cost by 1.
flavorText: "TICKETS! GET YER TICKETS! NOWWWW HALF OFF! Oh, biscuits, if I don't sell these tickets, the boss'll kill me... literally."
name: Arena Promoter

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally SpellShield this round.
flavorText: "When my friends are happy, I'M happy!" - Yuumi
name: Best Pals

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavorText: "Look, Book! Friends!" - Yuumi
name: Best Buddies

description: When I'm summoned, create a random 1, 2, and 3 cost follower in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random 1, 2, and 3 cost follower in hand.
flavorText: "Somebody get these freakin' hairballs off my desk!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin
name: Professor Von Mech

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: I deal 1 damage to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: I deal 1 damage to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
levelupDescription: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.
flavorText:
"It's IMPORTANT we make a good impression. The new safety inspector is stopping by, and you know what that means!"
"No more explosions?"
"WHAT?! No! It means explode things where he can't see 'em! 'No more explosions'... are you crazy?!" - Ziggs and Otto
name: Ziggs

description:
Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ziggs</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
Create a Ziggs in your deck.
flavorText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs
name: Ziggs' Bouncing Bomb

description: Deal 1 to <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Ziggs</style></link>' blocker and to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to Ziggs' blocker and to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Boom!" - Ziggs
name: Short Fuse

description:
Deal 1 to two enemies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ziggs</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to two enemies.
Create a Ziggs in your deck.
flavorText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs
name: Ziggs' Bouncing Bomb

description:
Deal 2 to a unit.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ziggs</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to a unit.
Create a Ziggs in your deck.
flavorText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs
name: Ziggs' Bouncing Bomb

description:
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: I deal 2 damage to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
When you destroy an allied landmark, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: I deal 2 damage to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
When you destroy an allied landmark, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText:
"We passed?! WE PASSED!"
"Heh, well, 'passed' is a strong word... but hoo-wee, if you didn't put on a heck of a show!" - Ziggs and Wilfred, Safety Inspector
name: Ziggs

description: Deal 2 to <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Ziggs</style></link>' blocker and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to Ziggs' blocker and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Boom!" - Ziggs
name: Short Fuse

description: When you play a created follower, summon an exact copy. When you play a created spell, copy it with the same targets.
descriptionRaw: When you play a created follower, summon an exact copy. When you play a created spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavorText: "Oh yes, she's quite the mirror master. She makes my designs look even more sublime, and with a small trick of the light, even manages to lend a certain someone a touch of much needed verticality..." - Stilted Robemaker
name: Mirror Mage

description: When I’m summoned or you destroy me, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned or you destroy me, Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: "What do you mean, 'this doesn't look safe'?" - Ziggs
name: Hexplosive Minefield

description: To play, discard 1. <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Yordle that costs 3 or less and summon it.
descriptionRaw: To play, discard 1. Manifest a Yordle that costs 3 or less and summon it.
flavorText: "Never leave a gunner behind!" - Tristana
name: Yordle Portal

description: Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
flavorText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs
