"Officer was witnessed pursuing suspect at a high speed into a trap of her own making. Following the arrest, officer proceeded to submit her own speeding citation and fine, claiming (somewhat dramatically) 'Justice is a two-way street.'" 
- Excerpt from a Warden beat report
name: Justice Rider

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick a spell in the top 5 cards of your deck and create an exact <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy in hand, then shuffle those top 5 cards into your deck
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick a spell in the top 5 cards of your deck and create an exact Fleeting copy in hand, then shuffle those top 5 cards into your deck
flavorText: Detectives are nothing without leads. An archivist's job is to collect every scrap of intel and create new possibilities where none previously existed.
name: Station Archivist

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Forge Workers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Forge Workers.
flavorText: "Shift change!" - Forge Chief
name: Assembly Line

description: Pick a player to discard their lowest cost card to draw 3.
descriptionRaw: Pick a player to discard their lowest cost card to draw 3.
flavorText: "Everything has a cost." - Corina Veraza
name: Most Wanted

flavorText: "Yeah so I've been 'elping Jayce an' them lot 'tinker around with this new thing. Powerformative technology, we call it. Truth be told, Jayce said I'll be listed as co-inventor once the documentation's done! Them bigwigs know where the real smarts is, eh?"
name: Forge Worker

description: When I'm summoned, draw <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Jayce</style></link>. <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus. For each 6+ cost spell you've played this game, increase it by 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw Jayce. Attack: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus. For each 6+ cost spell you've played this game, increase it by 1.
flavorText:
"The magnanimous Albus Ferros has once again THRUST himself into the spotlight, dramatically outbidding Clans Cadwalder and Giopara for the rights to sponsor Jayce's Hexgate research. 'A fine day for Ferros is a fine day for Piltover', as the saying goes, and yesterday was a very fine day for Clan Ferros, indeed!"
- Excerpt from a sponsored spread in the Piltover Daily
name: Albus Ferros

description: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "First, the investment. Then, the dividend." - Albus Ferros
name: Ferros' Dividend

description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another.
flavorText: "Firing!" - Jayce
name: Shock Blast

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant me <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> or <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant me Quick Attack or Challenger.
levelupDescription: You've played two 6+ cost spells. <style=Variable></style> When I level up, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Acceleration Gate</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played two 6+ cost spells.  When I level up, create an Acceleration Gate in hand.
flavorText:
"So, Rosa, as you know, this powerformative tech promises to change the world."
"Truly groundbreaking work, Jayce. The way those coinhiberators splice together. It's breathtaking."
"It sure is. All Axel's idea, too! Right, my good man?"
"Well, you know me, mate. Don't like to brag..."
name: Jayce

description: Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavorText: "Cannon's primed, and hammer's engaged. This is going to be one for the history books, folks."
name: Jayce

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant me <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> or <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Grant me Quick Attack or Challenger.
Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavorText: "Cannon's primed, and hammer's engaged. This is going to be one for the history books, folks."
name: Jayce

description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jayce</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another. Create a Jayce in your deck.
flavorText: "Firing!" - Jayce
name: Jayce's Shock Blast

levelupDescription: You've played two 6+ cost spells. <style=Variable></style> When I level up, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Acceleration Gate</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played two 6+ cost spells.  When I level up, create an Acceleration Gate in hand.
flavorText:
"So, Rosa, as you know, this powerformative tech promises to change the world."
"Truly groundbreaking work, Jayce. The way those coinhiberators splice together. It's breathtaking."
"It sure is. All Axel's idea, too! Right, my good man?"
"Well, you know me, mate. Don't like to brag..."
name: Jayce

levelupDescription: You've played two 6+ cost spells. <style=Variable></style> When I level up, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Acceleration Gate</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played two 6+ cost spells.  When I level up, create an Acceleration Gate in hand.
flavorText:
"So, Rosa, as you know, this powerformative tech promises to change the world."
"Truly groundbreaking work, Jayce. The way those coinhiberators splice together. It's breathtaking."
"It sure is. All Axel's idea, too! Right, my good man?"
"Well, you know me, mate. Don't like to brag..."
name: Jayce

description: Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavorText: "Cannon's primed, and hammer's engaged. This is going to be one for the history books, folks."
name: Jayce

description: Give your allies +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round. If they already have it or <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>, give them a random keyword instead.
descriptionRaw: Give your allies +2|+0 and Quick Attack this round. If they already have it or Double Attack, give them a random keyword instead.
flavorText: "Gate is a go." - Jayce
name: Acceleration Gate

description: Deal 2 to a unit. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, deal 3 to it instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, deal 3 to it instead.
flavorText: "Better let 'em air out a minute. Greenies can't take the smell. But lemme tells ya... once you're accustomed, nothin' like it!" - Puffcap Peddler
name: Sump Fumes

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a 6+ cost spell from your regions.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a 6+ cost spell from your regions.
flavorText:
"About the only good part of Ferros financing my work was getting to team up with Reggie. Not only is the man one of the most competent people I've ever worked with, he's a heck of a guy, too."
- Excerpt from Jayce's journal
name: Ferros Financier

description: Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "Here's MY calling card." - Caitlyn
name: Piltover Peacemaker

description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, give it <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, give it Elusive this round.
flavorText: "We'll surround the location while using smokespinners to mask our movements..." - Caitlyn
name: Ambush

description: Plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "On my signal." - Caitlyn
name: Advanced Intel

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly or activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: Plant 5 Flashbomb Traps randomly or activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: Corina smiled as the Piltover Wardens burst down her door, as they trampled her precious flowers underfoot, as they sent up clouds of toxic pollen. All as planned.
name: Corina, Mastermind

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: Plant 5 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "Watch your step..." - Corina Veraza
name: Beguiling Blossom

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: Activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "Right where I want you." - Corina Veraza
name: Volatile Bloom

description: ALL players draw 2.
descriptionRaw: ALL players draw 2.
flavorText: "This a popular case, you know. Just had a chap in here earlier looking at it. Enjoy!" - Station Archivist
name: Insider Knowledge

description: Deal 1 damage to a random ally.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 damage to a random ally.
flavorText: "Boom." - Caitlyn
name: Flashbomb Trap

description: When I am summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Forge Worker</style></link>. When you play a 6+ cost spell, destroy me and refill your spell mana.
descriptionRaw: When I am summoned, summon a Forge Worker. When you play a 6+ cost spell, destroy me and refill your spell mana.
flavorText: If Piltover is a city driven by invention, then its forges are its engines.
name: The Forge Of Tomorrow

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Refill 1 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Refill 1 spell mana.
flavorText: "Takes two things to get an idea off the page and into your hands. Funding's one half of the equation, the other's a good forge. And it's not just the tools or the hardware in the forge; if your chief doesn't have what it takes to run things, well, your idea's staying on paper." - Jayce
name: Forge Chief

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 8 cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards in the enemy deck.
levelupDescription: 5 of your traps have been activated.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: 5 of your traps have been activated.
flavorText: Caitlyn was always a dogged and thorough investigator, a quality that helped propel her fast through the ranks of Piltover enforcement. But when a case concerning a certain 'C' came along, one that countless other enforcers had abandoned, it seemed almost as though Caitlyn had finally met her match. Almost.
name: Caitlyn

description: When I’m summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Most Wanted</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, create a Most Wanted in hand.
flavorText: From unloading silently into the street to prepping the ram, setup didn't take long. It was just a matter of waiting on Caitlyn's cue.
name: Officer Squad

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: Zayne Asako, like all Zaunite kids, had to grow up fast on those violent and dark understreets. After losing his brother to yet another senseless gang crime, he committed himself to Piltover enforcement, hoping reason and law would make his home finally safe.
name: Sting Officer

description: Place an enemy follower into the enemy deck, then your opponent draws 1.
descriptionRaw: Place an enemy follower into the enemy deck, then your opponent draws 1.
flavorText: The grand city of Piltover is home to some of the finest minds in Runeterra. Piltover's jails are also home to some of the finest minds in Runeterra.
name: Coup de Grace

description: When you draw or create me in hand or each <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: while I'm in your hand, transform me into a random 6+ cost spell.
descriptionRaw: When you draw or create me in hand or each Round Start: while I'm in your hand, transform me into a random 6+ cost spell.
flavorText:
"...configuring hextech into a stable state was the most difficult hurdle I faced. Most nights, it felt like the crystals and hexite were actively conspiring to trip me up, and it was only through extensive trial and error that I was able to get the component parts working in harmony..."
- Excerpt from Jayce's journal
name: Hextech Anomaly

description: Grant me +2|+0 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant me +2|+0 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "The people of this city worship at the feet of 'intelligence'. But what good is the greatest mind without the means to express itself? No. I will show Piltover true greatness. It will tower over them. It will blot out the sun. And it will carry my name." - Albus Ferros
name: Ferros Skycruiser

description: Deal 3 to an enemy and 1 to all other enemies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an enemy and 1 to all other enemies.
flavorText: "They're supposed to go up, not EVERYWHERE! Oh, my!" - Heimerdinger
name: Rocket Barrage

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a copy of me in the enemy deck with 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> attached.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create a copy of me in the enemy deck with 2 Poison Puffcaps attached.
flavorText: The stink of a whump in the height of puffcap season is unlike any other. Imagine an open sewer full of week-old fish and rotten eggs, and you're halfway there.
name: Stinky Whump

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Plant 4 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 8 cards in the enemy deck and deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to the number of your traps activated this round. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Strike: Plant 4 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards in the enemy deck and deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to the number of your traps activated this round.
flavorText: She burst in, leveled her rifle at the culprit, and looked down the scope. There, smiling through the looking glass, was a familiar face.
name: Caitlyn

description:
Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Caitlyn</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
Create a Caitlyn in your deck.
flavorText: "Here's MY calling card." - Caitlyn
name: Caitlyn's Piltover Peacemaker

description: Grant Tech allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant Tech allies everywhere +1|+1 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: The Hextech Handler was initially constructed to transport raw materials through Piltover, but as time went on, the locals apparently developed a soft spot for him. Jayce's forge crew nicknamed him Nugget, a Piltovan lord reportedly donated a hat, and passing kids now adorn him with whatever they have to hand.
name: Hextech Handler

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create in hand a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy of a non-<link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> spell you played last round.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create in hand a Fleeting copy of a non-Fleeting spell you played last round.
flavorText: The Blessed Isles forget. The Shadow Isles remember. The Shadow Isles forget. The Blessed Isles remember.
name: Catalogue of Regrets

description: Each round, the first time you kill a unit with a spell, summon an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraith</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you kill a unit with a spell, summon an Ephemeral Mistwraith.
flavorText: The Black Mist traps its victims in endless cycles of self-imposed torment. Through the Mistcatchers, Tek and Kana give those souls a chance to break that cycle for themselves.
name: Mistkeepers

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to Fast.
levelupDescription: I've seen you kill 3+ units with spells or an allied Lucian die.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you kill 3+ units with spells or an allied Lucian die.
flavorText: "To be a Sentinel is to fight. To lose yourself or to lose the ones you love. But more than that? It means to live. For yourself... and for the ones you love."
name: Senna

description: Kill a unit and give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Kill a unit and give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "No shadow without light. No death without life." - Senna
name: Dawning Shadow

description: Each round, the first time you kill a unit with a spell, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you kill a unit with a spell, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Pups is pups." - Wisdom scrawled upon the soul
name: Watcher on the Isles

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one.
flavorText: "I can feel the sun no longer. Even so, I wield its memory--and that is enough."
name: Solari Sentinel

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. When you play your next <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> this round, copy it targeting the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. When you play your next Darkness this round, copy it targeting the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "You asked me, Senna, what brought me to this fight. I have lost nothing to the Mist, it does not threaten my home. It exists, and it should not. I am here to discover why. Do I need sentiment to join your cause?"
name: Ixtali Sentinel

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 5 from a unit.
descriptionRaw: Drain 5 from a unit.
flavorText: "Death is drawn to life." - Senna
name: Piercing Darkness

description: <style=Variable>Deal 2 to an enemy.</style>
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy.
flavorText: There is a little of fear in everything. It lays quietly at the heart of mystery. It is the spark of joy in awe and wonder. It grants life its purpose - death, its power. It is everything. It is nothing.
name: Darkness

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. Your next <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> this round costs 0 and gains “I deal damage to all enemy targets.”
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your next Darkness this round costs 0 and gains “I deal damage to all enemy targets.”
flavorText:
"Another nightmare?"
"Wasn't all bad. You weren't there."
"Dolt. What was the bad part?"
"You weren't there."
name: Dess & Ada

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> and cost 1 less.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to Fast and cost 1 less.
flavorText: "We were wrong. The Black Mist isn't heartless. It's not random. It has a goal. But that means we can track it. Means it can bleed."
name: Senna

description:
Kill a unit and give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Senna</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Kill a unit and give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
Create a Senna in your deck.
flavorText: "No shadow without light. No death without life." - Senna
name: Senna's Dawning Shadow

description: The first time you kill a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
descriptionRaw: The first time you kill a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
flavorText: What must the Mist see when it looks upon Maeve? Exuberance, confidence--irrepressible optimism. How it must long to snuff that taunting flame. For what can death fear, but life?
name: Burgeoning Sentinel

description: The first time you kill a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
descriptionRaw: The first time you kill a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
flavorText: The Buhru and Sentinel philosophy align on a single crucial point: all things must end, and some must be made to end.
name: Buhru Sentinel

description: When I'm summoned, if you've targeted allies in 4 different rounds, grant me <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>Spellshield</style></link>, <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've targeted allies in 4 different rounds, grant me Spellshield, Overwhelm, and Challenger.
flavorText: For centuries, the demon Camphor stalked the lands of Targon, pulling from her victims the very strengths that defined them. From the mighty, she would take strength; from the wise, wisdom. But she had no interest in these boons. Instead, she feasted on the suffering, doubt, and misery she inflicted. Camphor was a monster in every sense of the word.
name: Camphor, the Doubt

flavorText: "Targonians need no further proof of the gods' cruelty. Look at what they have done to us. Look at what they have done to our most cherished companions." - Pantheon
name: Wounded Whiteflame

description: Grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+1 and Stun an enemy.
flavorText: Pantheon was well-versed in warfare. He knew from countless fights that his enemies would always track his spear, and rarely his shield.
name: Shield Vault

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> two enemies.
descriptionRaw: Stun two enemies.
flavorText: "Targon's night sky is a wondrous thing of unimaginable beauty. It is all too easy to lose oneself gazing at that expanse, not knowing how far the stars stretch, and what manner of being might be looking back..." - Targonian climber
name: Celestial Wonder

levelupDescription: You've targeted allies in 5 different rounds.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've targeted allies in 5 different rounds.
flavorText: Here stands Atreus, who had his freedoms stripped from him by the very Aspects he revered. Here stands the embers of War, who left Atreus with gifts few mortals can comprehend. Here stands a man, ready to fight and die for those he cherishes.
name: Pantheon

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>Spellshield</style></link> or <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>. If you don't, grant it to me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally Spellshield or Overwhelm. If you don't, grant it to me.
flavorText: Iula still remembers the burning grief that coursed through her after she learned of her husband's death. When Pantheon came to her, asking if she would help him destroy a creature that feasted on this very pain, her answer was swift.
name: Iula

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>. If you don't, grant it to me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally Overwhelm. If you don't, grant it to me.
name: Iula

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>Spellshield</style></link>. If you don't, grant it to me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally Spellshield. If you don't, grant it to me.
name: Iula

description: Grant 2 allies +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Grant 2 allies +2|+2.
flavorText: Warring against the gods seemed a fool's errand, but through the scars and through the screams, those brave few learned lessons. The gods thought singularly, selfishly, and had lost the gift of camaraderie. This would be their weapon. This would be their armor.
name: Battle Bonds

description: Once a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Pantheon</style></link> has leveled up, grant me a random keyword for each round you've targeted allies this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Once a Pantheon has leveled up, grant me a random keyword for each round you've targeted allies this game.
flavorText: Here stands Pantheon, who took up his spear and swore to drive all gods and demons from this land we call home.
name: Pantheon

description:
Grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Pantheon</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +1|+1 and Stun an enemy.
Create a Pantheon in your deck.
flavorText: Pantheon was well-versed in warfare. He knew from countless fights that his enemies would always track his spear, and rarely his shield.
name: Pantheon's Shield Vault

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> an enemy follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally +1|+1 and Silence an enemy follower.
flavorText: Eshiyme was once a revered oracle who used her Sight to guide those in need. But this gift was stolen from her by Camphor, who intended to feast on her inevitable anguish. How sorely the demon underestimated brave Eshiyme.
name: Blinded Mystic

description: Give 2 allies +1|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give 2 allies +1|+2 this round.
flavorText: "It is in the bonds of kinship that we must find our strength." - Pantheon
name: We Stand Together

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Gem in hand.
flavorText: The colossi are ancient and venerated protectors of Targon's most revered sites. To harm them is to insult the mountain itself. To torture them is a crime no Targonian can forgive.
name: Freed Colossus

description: If your opponent has more units than you, grant an ally +1|+1 for each extra unit they have.
descriptionRaw: If your opponent has more units than you, grant an ally +1|+1 for each extra unit they have.
flavorText: These brave few knew they were stepping into warfare with beings of unimaginable power. They knew death was likely. But still, they stepped.
name: Against the Odds

flavorText: Tor felt his life fading with every heartbeat, but in that grave and looming darkness, where he was expected to embrace dread, he instead found purpose. He would not only face death willingly, but would bring with him the very demon who had dared to cut his life short. This is how he would be remembered. This would be Tor's saga.
name: Saga Seeker

description:
When I'm summoned, swap my Health and your Nexus' Health. 
I can't be blocked by enemies with less Health than me.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, swap my Health and your Nexus' Health. 
I can't be blocked by enemies with less Health than me.
flavorText:
"An honorable tribute to those gone, but never forgotten: When the people of Demacia see the sun's rays shining off his form, they will know hope, and the indomitable spirit that inspired his construction will live on through him." 
- Durand workshop plaque
name: Gorlith the Unscalable

description: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +0|+3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +0|+3.
levelupDescription: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Your allies have 25+ total Health.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Round End: Your allies have 25+ total Health.
flavorText: For many years after his creation, Galio lay dormant, unfeeling, unknowing. It wasn't until magic brought him to life and he experienced the resulting thrill of battle that he knew the joy of being among the living. Now, when he slept, he missed such wonderful things!
name: Galio

description: Grant an ally +0|+3. At the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>, grant it +0|+2. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Galio</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +0|+3. At the next Round Start, grant it +0|+2. Create a Galio in your deck.
flavorText: Even the sight of Galio is enough to inspire the noble hearts of Demacians.
name: Galio's Shield of Durand

description:
When I'm summoned, grant other allies +0|+3. 
Each round, the first time an ally takes damage, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant other allies +0|+3. 
Each round, the first time an ally takes damage, Rally.
flavorText: When he awoke, Galio was overjoyed to find a whole family had been crafted for him, a facsimile of the same family that would carry on the legacy of his maker for years to come. They were just like him - they wouldn't break.
name: Galio

description: Grant an ally +0|+3. At the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>, grant it +0|+2.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +0|+3. At the next Round Start, grant it +0|+2.
flavorText: Even the sight of Galio is enough to inspire the noble hearts of Demacians.
name: Shield of Durand

description: To play, spend all of your mana. Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguard</style></link> and grow its stats to that amount. If 9+ mana was spent, grant other allied Elites +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: To play, spend all of your mana. Summon a Dauntless Vanguard and grow its stats to that amount. If 9+ mana was spent, grant other allied Elites +2|+2.
flavorText: When it seems all hope is lost, the soldiers of Demacia look to the Vanguard.
name: Might of the Vanguard

description: Fully heal an ally. Then, that ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Fully heal an ally. Then, that ally and an enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Let's crack on, then!" - Galio
name: Winds of War

description: When you summon another ally, grant it +0|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally, grant it +0|+1.
flavorText: "It may not be evident to the untrained, but the work of a great artist is in one chip of the chisel to the next."
name: Durand Sculptor

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: I take all damage for my supported ally this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: I take all damage for my supported ally this round.
flavorText: Following the stag-mounted Ranger's lead, the petricite guardian dwarfed the very creature that had inspired its elegant design.
name: Petricite Stag

description: <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> grants me +0|+2 instead of +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Fury grants me +0|+2 instead of +1|+1.
flavorText: The placid mountain drakes are slow to anger despite their appearance, and their stoicism around other mountain beasts makes them natural protectors of otherwise vulnerable flocks.
name: Mountain Drake

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +0|+2 and <link=keyword.Formidable><sprite name=Formidable><style=Keyword>Formidable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally +0|+2 and Formidable this round.
flavorText: "The Ranger Elmheart has brought us grim news," the architect said calmly, focusing on rerolling the parchment to hide how his hands shook. He turned to the waiting sculptors and gave them a stiff nod. "It seems the time has come for Demacia's unseen protectors to come out of hiding."
name: Durand Architect

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally +0|+1 and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally +0|+1 and Tough.
flavorText: Shireen looked up from her work at the sound of pounding hoofbeats. The ranger's haste left her uneasy, but curious. She urged her petricite bird to take flight, and followed in the ranger's wake.
name: Durand Protege

description: When you summon another ally, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally, grant me Challenger.
flavorText: As the Broadwing passed overhead, the battered Demacian soldiers below let out a cheer, inspired by its enduring form.
name: Petricite Broadwing

flavorText: "It's always a joy to see them come to life. You forget how distinct each is, their personalities reflections of the artist who made them." - Durand Sculptor
name: Petricite Hound

description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 2 to an enemy.
Your <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link> have "When I damage a <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> or damaged enemy, kill it."
descriptionRaw:
Play: Deal 2 to an enemy.
Your Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills have "When I damage a Stunned or damaged enemy, kill it."
flavorText: "Act Two: A duplicitous lord with little to his name but a pilfered Kashuri gauntlet charms an audience of Ionians. However, his mask is crude, and easily seen through. He begs for his life, claiming ignorance. The iron hand he sought to rule with lies empty."
name: Lord Broadmane

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies or spend 6 mana to summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Legion General</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Stun 2 enemies or spend 6 mana to summon a Legion General.
flavorText: Assignment is one of the first great decisions that lies before every battle. A good commander knows that the key to victory...
name: Strategic Execution

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Legion General</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Summon a Legion General.
flavorText: ... is a good offense.
name: Strategic Execution

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
descriptionRaw: Stun 2 enemies.
flavorText: ... is a good defense.
name: Strategic Execution

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: I deal 2 to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, I deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw: Attack: I deal 2 to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, I deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
levelupDescription: I've seen you play 6+ <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, create <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tibbers</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you play 6+ Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills. When I level up, create Tibbers in hand.
flavorText: Over a decade ago, Amoline Kiosar fled the Ravenbloom Conservatory with an invaluable and incandescent asset in her control. Ravenbloom's scouts searched for her in every corner of the empire, but none of the rumors they heard led them to Amoline. And so, years later, when news arrived of a lost girl burning with rage in the northern Ironspike Mountains, Fynn Retrick reluctantly gathered his things and left to investigate. He expected to find nothing. How wrong he was.
name: Annie

description:
Pick a unit. The next time it takes 1 or more damage this round, kill it.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Annie</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Pick a unit. The next time it takes 1 or more damage this round, kill it.
Create an Annie in your deck.
flavorText: Headmistress Telsi spoke at length about the Noxian tenets, leaving the children before her increasingly bored and restless. But, while most students largely contained their outbursts, Annie acted. First with smoke, then with fire.
name: Annie's Disintegrate

description: Deal 2 to <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Annie</style></link>'s blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to Annie's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: "Do you wanna play, too?" - Annie
name: Molten Shield

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: I deal 3 to my blocker and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it. If it's dead or gone, I deal 3 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw: Attack: I deal 3 to my blocker and Stun it. If it's dead or gone, I deal 3 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText:
"I've found her. She's Amoline's, no doubt. Same eyes, same giggle. I'll bring her back within the fortnight. Having spoken to the girl, I ask that you be kind to her. I believe there's good in there, along with the dark."
- Excerpt of a letter from Fynn Retrick
name: Annie

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy, then deal 2 to all <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> or damaged enemies.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy, then deal 2 to all Stunned or damaged enemies.
flavorText: "TIBBERS!" - Annie
name: Pyroclastic Arrival

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy, then deal 2 to all <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> or damaged enemies.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun an enemy, then deal 2 to all Stunned or damaged enemies.
flavorText: The demon Tybaulk had infested the minds of countless victims over the centuries. Slowly, inexorably, he would lead them to the fire, and watch his flames feast on scorched flesh. But in young Annie, Tybaulk found a will completely indomitable, and a talent for magic that rivaled even his own.
name: Tibbers

description: Deal 3 and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Annie</style></link>'s blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 3 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 and Stun Annie's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 3 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: "It'll be fun..." - Annie
name: Molten Shield

description: When an ally with 5+ Power dies, create a random follower with 5+ Power in hand.
descriptionRaw: When an ally with 5+ Power dies, create a random follower with 5+ Power in hand.
flavorText:
"Today I found myself thinking back to my small infirmary in Penrose Hill, and the years I spent there trying to unlock the secrets of physiology. Years! I've now been in Lady Noradi's employ for just a few short months, but I know now that I learned nothing. How simple I was. How fortunate."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: The Gray Apothecary

description: When an ally attacks, I attack with it.
descriptionRaw: When an ally attacks, I attack with it.
flavorText: "Drakehounds are a delight, aren't they? So eager to please. So malleable. If only my enemies held the same qualities." - Thorn of the Rose
name: Obedient Drakehound

description: I gain all allied <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> buffs.
descriptionRaw: I gain all allied everywhere buffs.
flavorText: "Act One: An ex-soldier, having abandoned his post following the theft of an ancient Kashuri artifact, hides at a Qayanvi bar, full of arrogance and too much drink. Little does he know, his stolen treasure whispers of all it sees to its true owner! His life pours away like so much wine, Noxian crimson on Ionian gold."
name: Legion Deserter

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy or if it's already <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> deal 2 to it instead.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun an enemy or if it's already Stunned deal 2 to it instead.
flavorText:
"Student: Sydell Kythera
Teacher: J. Willough
Report: I am spiderbit on left forearm. Sydell claims a misunderstanding, but his smirk belies his innocence. He is ordered to two weeks additional chores (refectory)."
- Ravenbloom discipline card
name: Spell Slinger

description: Each round, the first time an ally with 5+ Power attacks, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time an ally with 5+ Power attacks, Rally.
flavorText: "At my command, you will fight! If you kill your sparring partner, find another! If you fall, then die knowing your death made Noxus stronger! Trifarian soldiers... begin!" - Trifarian Assessor
name: Trifarian Training Pits

description:
<link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 11</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tybaulk</style></link> in hand.
I <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> 1 round for each <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link> you've played this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Countdown 11: Create a Tybaulk in hand.
I advance 1 round for each Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill you've played this game.
flavorText:
"...by now, word has no doubt reached you of the Roseguard Academy's dismal failure. I expect you will learn from your sister school's failings. I expect you will manage your facility in a manner that benefits the empire."
- A scorched letter found in the conservatory's rubble
name: Ravenbloom Conservatory

description: When I'm summoned, grant allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0 and for the rest of the game, all of your spells and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link> deal 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant allies everywhere +1|+0 and for the rest of the game, all of your spells and Skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavorText:
"...it burns in me. This dark presence. It whispers to me. Fire. FIRE. In the flames, I see its eyes. Black and unblinking. Staring. Smiling. Urging me to step in. Urging me to join the rest. Silhouettes in the inferno. Reaching out. Come home. Come home."
- Remains of a decrepit Nockmirchian diary
name: Tybaulk

description: Pick a unit. The next time it takes 1 or more damage this round, kill it.
descriptionRaw: Pick a unit. The next time it takes 1 or more damage this round, kill it.
flavorText: Headmistress Telsi spoke at length about the Noxian tenets, leaving the children before her increasingly bored and restless. But, while most students largely contained their outbursts, Annie acted. First with smoke, then with fire.
name: Disintegrate

description: <link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Reputation: I cost 3.
flavorText: The crowd gasped as the two shackled yetis were brought into the Bordent's legendary fighting pit. No one thought the beasts strong enough to break their chains, because none of them had ever faced a yeti's might before.
name: Captive Yeti

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: I deal 3 damage to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, I deal 3 damage to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw: Attack: I deal 3 damage to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, I deal 3 damage to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: "Act Three: A cruel keeper and her pet. The greyback is innocent even in grisly purpose - the artifact it bears forces subservience. The keeper refuses to scream as she is fed to her pet. If only all Noxians were so noble in their demise."
name: Captive Greyback

description: Deal 3 to <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Captive Greyback</style></link>'s blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 3 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to Captive Greyback's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 3 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: "Let that be a lesson. Subjugators live only until the first revolt." - Jhin
name: Obeyed Order

description: Each round, the first time you play a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>, I play <link=card.skill><style=AssociatedCard>Magic Embers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you play a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill, I play Magic Embers.
flavorText: "First time I met Daani must've been a couple years ago. Lovely lad. Lovely family, too. Then, on my last trip, I stopped by his village and found poor Daani sat in the square, alone. Said he was waiting for his family to come home. Poor lad must've been sat there months. Didn't have the heart to tell him what I'd seen down the way..." - Fynn Retrick
name: Manasoul Student

description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Sharpened Resolve</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Whirling Death</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Weapons of the Lost</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting Sharpened Resolve, Whirling Death, or Weapons of the Lost in hand.
flavorText: "Clara darling, you have to clean the blood from the tokens." - Ophelia Noradi, Crimson Aristocrat
name: Noxian Tellstones

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Whoa... I can SEE the magic!" - Manasoul Student
name: Magic Embers

description: When you play a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>, grant me +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you play a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill, grant me +1|+0.
flavorText: "Many of the children are of an age where their natural inclinations lead them to rebel against formal direction. Fortunate, then, that the eldest of them is both favored by the rest, and malleable to our cause. If the students choose to ignore our lessons, then we will teach through her." - Headmistress Telsi
name: The Prefect

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy or if it's already <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> deal 2 to it instead.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy or if it's already Stunned deal 2 to it instead.
flavorText: "Fang's turn..." - Spell Slinger
name: Stiffened Sinews

description: Deal 2 to an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy.
flavorText: Fine tools are wasted on the unsophisticated craftsman.
name: Kashuri Gauntlet

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>Agony's Embrace</style></link>.
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: Agony's Embrace.
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
levelupDescription: When you or an ally kill an allied Husk, give me its positive keywords this round and I level up.
levelupDescriptionRaw: When you or an ally kill an allied Husk, give me its positive keywords this round and I level up.
flavorText: The priestess' pupils were blown wide, and her hand trembled with nervous excitement. She was ready. This was the single moment Evelynn craved more than any other. She grinned, and slowly shed her visage. Then, as always, the screaming began.
name: Evelynn

description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
descriptionRaw: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavorText: "Look me in the eye. Tell me I hurt you." - Solitude
name: Breakneck Husk

description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
descriptionRaw: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavorText: "Figured you were Vora's type..." - Sultur
name: Haunted Husk

description: You may put any cards that summon Husks into your deck during deckbuilding.
descriptionRaw: You may put any cards that summon Husks into your deck during deckbuilding.
flavorText: "I'll eat anything..." - Evelynn
name: Agony's Embrace

description:
When you or an ally kill an allied Husk, give me its positive keywords this round.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Summon a random Husk. If fewer than 6 allies have died this game, transform me back into <nobr><link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Evelynn</style></link>.</nobr> <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
When you or an ally kill an allied Husk, give me its positive keywords this round.
Round End: Summon a random Husk. If fewer than 6 allies have died this game, transform me back into Evelynn.
flavorText: As Evelynn stalked Runeterra, she attracted the attentions of lesser demons, each hoping to destroy the Widowmaker and feast on her power. She butchered most, of course, but a few talented individuals caught her eye. Today, they live on, bound to their mistress, and when the mood strikes, Evelynn lets them out to play.
name: Evelynn

description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
descriptionRaw: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavorText: "Look at you. You are a pathetic, useless worm." - Domination
name: Warded Husk

description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
descriptionRaw: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavorText: "Feed. FEED." - Vora
name: Fading Husk

description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
descriptionRaw: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavorText: "Stings good, doesn't it?" - Steem
name: Thrashing Husk

description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
descriptionRaw: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavorText: "Oh, the look on your face!" - Solitude
name: Scattered Husk

description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
descriptionRaw: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavorText: "Not enough! More." - Vora
name: Desperate Husk

description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
descriptionRaw: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavorText: "I wore you out? Already? Shame." - Evelynn
name: Enraged Husk

description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
descriptionRaw: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavorText: "Told you it'd be a good time. Didn't say whose." - Sultur
name: Hardy Husk

description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
descriptionRaw: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavorText: "Flesh. Bone. Screams. I want it all." - Vora
name: Stubborn Husk

description:
Stop all enemy spells and skills targeting <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Evelynn</style></link> and she <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Evelynn</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Stop all enemy spells and skills targeting Evelynn and she strikes an enemy.
Create an Evelynn in your deck.
flavorText: "We're playing by my rules." - Evelynn
name: Evelynn's Last Caress

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Wandering Caretaker</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Plant 3 <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chimes</style></link> on random cards in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Wandering Caretaker.
Attack: Plant 3 Chimes on random cards in your deck.
levelupDescription: You've increased the total stats of allies in play or hand by <nobr>20+.<style=Variable></style></nobr>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've increased the total stats of allies in play or hand by 20+.
flavorText: "Aye, Old Gaff's seen his share o' strange! First time was the Caretaker 'imself, I reckon. Like a star streamin' 'cross the sky, he was. Felt like the whole world stopped a minute, and it was just me 'n' him…" - Old Gaff’s tale, part 1
name: Bard

description:
Draw a follower, then activate the effects of all boons in the top 3 cards of your deck.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Bard</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Draw a follower, then activate the effects of all boons in the top 3 cards of your deck.
Create a Bard in your deck.
flavorText: Songs tell of Bard hiding chimes amongst the towns of Runeterra, said to raise spirits and inspire spontaneous bouts of joyful dance.
name: Bard's Traveler's Call

description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Plant 6 <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chimes</style></link> on random cards in your deck.
When you activate a <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chime</style></link>, grant +1|+1 to a random ally in play.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Plant 6 Chimes on random cards in your deck.
When you activate a Chime, grant +1|+1 to a random ally in play.
flavorText:
"Sound the horn for the young and old
Sound it loud for all to behold. 
Kings bow down and sing their praise
To The Caretaker and his curious ways." - Runeterran Ballad
name: Bard

description:
You may put any cards that plant <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chimes</style></link> into your deck during deckbuilding. 
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you have 3+ mana gems, plant a <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chime</style></link> in your deck for each Bard that started the game in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
You may put any cards that plant Chimes into your deck during deckbuilding. 
Round Start: If you have 3+ mana gems, plant a Chime in your deck for each Bard that started the game in your deck.
flavorText: A mysterious traveler from beyond the cosmos, Bard is a being of harmony and balance, whose ear is attuned to the symphony of creation and the discord within. Surrounded by a choir of peculiar creatures, known as meeps, the Wandering Caretaker's curious works are celebrated in songs and stories across Runeterra.
name: The Wandering Caretaker

description: Grant a random ally in hand +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Grant a random ally in hand +1|+1.
flavorText: On still windless nights, cast your eyes to the heavens and listen for the soft symphony of tinkling chimes. In that moment you will know that He is watching.
name: Chime

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Virtuoso</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to all <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> enemies.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Virtuoso. 
Attack: Deal 2 to all Stunned enemies.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played 12+ Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills.
flavorText: "Overture: We open on the city of Qayanvi, where an old master summons a young pupil. He is tasked with disposing a group of nefarious villains and recovering stolen sacred artifacts. The actor is keen, but he does not as yet take his place. For now he simply prepares, waiting in the wings."
name: Jhin

description: Deal 4 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to a unit.
flavorText: "...then, the response." - Jhin
name: Second Bounce

description:
<style=Variable></style>
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 4 to all <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 4 to all Stunned enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "And then: the finale."
name: Jhin

description:
If a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jhin</style></link> started in your deck, for every 3 <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link> you play while you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jhin</style></link>, play <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Lotus Trap</style></link>.
You may put any follower that has a <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link> into your deck during deckbuilding.
descriptionRaw:
If a Jhin started in your deck, for every 3 Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills you play while you Behold Jhin, play Lotus Trap.
You may put any follower that has a Skill into your deck during deckbuilding.
flavorText: "The gun, my instrument; the bullet, my song." - Jhin
name: The Virtuoso

description: Deal 4 to all <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to all Stunned enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Your final scene begins." - Jhin
name: Curtain Call

description: Deal 2 to all <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> enemies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to all Stunned enemies.
flavorText: "I like a violent composition." - Jhin
name: Deadly Flourish

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. If <link=card.jhin><style=AssociatedCard>Jhin</style></link> is in play, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. If Jhin is in play, Stun the weakest enemy.
flavorText: "Smile! Everyone is watching!" - Jhin
name: Lotus Trap

description:
Deal 1 to a unit. Create a <link=card.spell2><style=AssociatedCard>Second Bounce</style></link> in hand at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jhin</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Second Bounce in hand at the next Round Start.
Create a Jhin in your deck.
flavorText: "First, the call..." - Jhin
name: Jhin's Dancing Grenade

description: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a <link=card.spell2><style=AssociatedCard>Second Bounce</style></link> in hand at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Second Bounce in hand at the next Round Start.
flavorText: "First, the call..." - Jhin
name: Dancing Grenade

description: Stop all enemy spells and skills targeting <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Evelynn</style></link> and she <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stop all enemy spells and skills targeting Evelynn and she strikes an enemy.
flavorText: "We're playing by my rules." - Evelynn
name: Last Caress

description: Draw a follower, then activate the effects of all boons in the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: Draw a follower, then activate the effects of all boons in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText: Songs tell of Bard hiding chimes amongst the towns of Runeterra, said to raise spirits and inspire spontaneous bouts of joyful dance.
name: Traveler's Call

description:
<link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Rimefang Pack</style></link>. Grant it +1|+1 for each time you've <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbitten</style></link> enemies this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Frostbite an enemy.
Summon a Rimefang Pack. Grant it +1|+1 for each time you've Frostbitten enemies this game.
flavorText: With the cold, so too come the rimefangs, and they don't have to outpace their prey... merely outwait them.
name: Frozen in Fear

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Get an empty mana gem.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Get an empty mana gem.
flavorText: The cycle of life and death looks different in the Freljord. The harsh environment ensures that little goes to waste.
name: Hunting Boar

description:
Deal 3 to ALL units.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Heal your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 3 to ALL units.
Enlightened: Heal your Nexus 3.
flavorText: In the shadow of the great Cryophoenix's wings, her followers rejoiced, and her enemies shuddered.
name: Wings of the Cryophoenix

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link> or <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> all your <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thralls</style></link> 1 round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon a Frozen Thrall or advance all your Frozen Thralls 1 round.
flavorText: The strange, whistling cry of the creature overhead was barely audible, but as it rung off the ravine's stone walls, the scouts felt it vibrate along their bones. Before their very eyes, cracks rapidly formed along the surface of the ice, disproportionate and quick.
name: Harbinger of Thralls

description: Transform an allied follower into an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Alpha Wildclaw</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Transform an allied follower into an Alpha Wildclaw.
flavorText: "Great wildclaw spirit, grant us your power!" - Udyr
name: Wildclaw's Ferocity

description: When I'm summoned, grant units in your deck my stats, then draw a unit with 5+ Power.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant units in your deck my stats, then draw a unit with 5+ Power.
flavorText: Avarosan lorekeepers are often seasoned elders of the tribe, protectors of the people and seasoned storytellers. They keep the tradition of both the hunt and fight alive through story and song.
name: Revna, the Lorekeeper

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Summon a Frozen Thrall.
flavorText:
The ice grows thin at daylight break,
And with the thaw, Her servants wake.
name: Harbinger of Thralls

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>Advance</style></link> all your <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thralls</style></link> 1 round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Advance all your Frozen Thralls 1 round.
flavorText:
The ice grows thin at daylight break,
And with the thaw, Her servants wake.
name: Harbinger of Thralls

description: Grant an enemy "<link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> me at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>."
descriptionRaw: Grant an enemy "Frostbite me at the next Round Start."
flavorText: One must always test the ice before stepping onto it, no matter how thick it may look.
name: Cracking Ice

description: Give allies +1|+1 this round. If they're created, give them +2|+2 instead.
descriptionRaw: Give allies +1|+1 this round. If they're created, give them +2|+2 instead.
flavorText: "HELLO. I MUSHROOM I TALKING I DON'T KNOW WHY OR HOW OR WHAT IS HAPPEN PLEASE LET ME BE MUSHROOM. PLEASE. THANK. BYE." - Mushroom
name: Sneezy Biggledust!

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Yordle.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant Yordle allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Manifest a Yordle.
Attack: Grant Yordle allies +1|+0.
flavorText: "EVERYONE loves Paparo! Every summer, he brings us trinkets from all across the world, and they're always either tasty, pretty, or topsy-turvy! Sometimes, all three!" - Ava Achiever
name: Paparo the Great

description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.spell3><style=AssociatedCard>Electro Harpoon</style></link>, <link=card.spell2><style=AssociatedCard>Heroic Refrain</style></link>, or <link=card.spell1><style=AssociatedCard>Yordle Contraption</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting Electro Harpoon, Heroic Refrain, or Yordle Contraption in hand.
flavorText: Yordles are always down for a game... but don't be surprised if the rules change in the middle of one!
name: Bandle Tellstones

description: Deal 2 to a unit and summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrappy Bomb</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit and summon a Scrappy Bomb.
flavorText: "Well, that's not good," Giselle said quietly, ducking behind cover.
name: Drop the Bomb

description: Deal 2 to an enemy and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> another. Plant 6 <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chimes</style></link> on random cards in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy and Stun another. Plant 6 Chimes on random cards in your deck.
flavorText:
"Mama, where does the Caretaker go?"
"He goes everywhere, love. As far as the eye can reach."
"Why?"
"Ah, my sweet. Do not think on why. Not even our wisest elders can understand the Caretaker's ways..."
- A mother and child
name: Cosmic Binding

description: When I'm summoned, plant a <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chime</style></link> on the top card of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, plant a Chime on the top card of your deck.
flavorText: "..second time was the big 'un. I was sweepin' the floors, when all a sudden I spot me dinner spilt on the table and me pots 'n' pans waddlin' on two legs, hurryin’ out the door! I followed fast as these knees’d go, and I found ‘em at that temple, rummagin’ through the shelves like they was lookin’ for somethin’.” - Old Gaff’s tale, part 2
name: Byrd, The Bellringer

description: Deal 1 to a unit. If one of your traps or boons activated this round, deal 3 to it instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit. If one of your traps or boons activated this round, deal 3 to it instead.
flavorText: "If it starts to glow, it's gonna blow!" - Bandle Scout rule number 463
name: Proximity Puffcap

description: When I'm summoned, plant a <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chime</style></link> on the top card of your deck, then double the boons in your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, plant a Chime on the top card of your deck, then double the boons in your deck.
flavorText:
"Gave me a right fright, it did. Arms sproutin' all over. Teeth big as boulders. Oh, and when that creature ran that mallet 'cross its teeth, made a song so eerie, thought I'd die. Ran for my life, I did. But not before I seen it... holes in the sky! Musta been hundreds of 'em!"
- Old Gaff’s tale, part 4
name: Maduli, The Gatekeeper

description: When an ally with an attachment attacks, grant that attachment +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When an ally with an attachment attacks, grant that attachment +1|+0.
flavorText: The leaves of the papertree shimmer with the same fae magic that created the tree itself. And, just like the birds that inspired their form, they find the allure of shiny things impossible to resist.
name: The Papertree

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit with 3 or less Health.
descriptionRaw: Recall a unit with 3 or less Health.
flavorText: "Artistry cannot be rushed." - Jhin
name: Gruesome Theater

description:
I cost 2 less if you have supported an ally this game.
Give an ally Barrier this round.
descriptionRaw: I cost 2 less if you have supported an ally this game.Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavorText: "Trust the balance. Walk the divide." - Shen
name: Moral Support

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Keeper of Masks</style></link> now or at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Keeper of Masks now or at the next Round Start. Draw 1.
flavorText:
"Old masks let young eyes see clearly."
- Keeper of Masks
name: Kinkou's Call

description: Start a free attack with 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dragonlings</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Start a free attack with 2 Dragonlings.
flavorText:
"Desire made manifest."
- The Dragonmaster
name: Dragon Ambush

description:
For the rest of the game, when you <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link>, summon another attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Blade</style></link>.
<link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw:
For the rest of the game, when you Blade Dance, summon another attacking Blade.
Blade Dance 1.
flavorText: "Lead the dance, and I'll follow!" - Ribbon Dancer
name: Storm of Blades

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit with less Power than me.
descriptionRaw: Play: Recall a unit with less Power than me.
flavorText: "An extraordinary creator, The Maker. A legendary artisan! Her art, peerless! Her execution, flawless! It is a great honor to be in her presence, let alone wield an instrument of her making." - Kashuri Witness
name: The Maker

description:
When I'm summoned, draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Yasuo</style></link> and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
When you gain the attack token, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw a Yasuo and Stun the strongest enemy.
When you gain the attack token, Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: For most, peace is a happy home and the warm quiet found in a loved one's hold. For Yasuo, it is that rare moment when the winds calm and offer promise instead of remembrance.
name: Windswept Hillock

description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Gruesome Theater</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Ritual of Renewal</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Stand United</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting Gruesome Theater, Ritual of Renewal, or Stand United in hand.
flavorText: "Learning to read your opponent is an essential skill, even outside of a fight. But most importantly, the purpose of a game is to have fun. Now, fetch me my footbath!" - Inspiring Mentor
name: Ionian Tellstones

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Keeper of Masks</style></link> at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Keeper of Masks at the next Round Start. Draw 1.
flavorText:
"Old masks let young eyes see clearly."
- Keeper of Masks
name: Kinkou's Call

description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Keeper of Masks</style></link>. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Keeper of Masks. Draw 1.
flavorText:
"Old masks let young eyes see clearly."
- Keeper of Masks
name: Kinkou's Call

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Play: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: "Act Four: A young priestess enters our story. Her tale is one of tragedy, conveyed on the pale lips of those she betrayed. Desperate to repent for her transgression, she carries in her arms a great burden, a gilded gift for the Noxians she welcomed to her land. We are left to wonder: was it sorrow or the bullet that broke her heart?"
name: The Stagehand

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy.
flavorText: "An actor must not shy from the spotlight." - Jhin
name: Stunning Performance

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit with less Power than me.
descriptionRaw: Recall a unit with less Power than me.
flavorText: "Training is a path, and at its end lies perfection." - The Maker
name: Peerless Artistry

description: When another ally gets <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round if I don't have it.
descriptionRaw: When another ally gets Barrier, give me Barrier this round if I don't have it.
flavorText: "Embrace the Balance on every level. Mind, body, spirit. Resist the impetuous urges of youth. Elevate your perspective." - Shen
name: Kinkou Student

description: Pick one of two new 2 cost spells to create in hand and set its cost to 0 this round. Repeat two more times.
descriptionRaw: Pick one of two new 2 cost spells to create in hand and set its cost to 0 this round. Repeat two more times.
flavorText: Zaun's first songspinner was surprisingly reliable. The only downside was that nobody could figure out how to control the volume.
name: Sputtering Songspinner

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck and reduce their costs by 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck and reduce their costs by 1.
flavorText:
"Well, all I'm gonna say about today is that things could have gone better. Gonna leave it at that. Future me... you know what we did."
- Kay's diary
name: Evil Imperfectionist

description:
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it a random keyword.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it a random keyword.
flavorText:
"On my walk home from the Entresol, I saw again that poor vagabond sobbing in a small alleyway. That so many veer around her so pointedly breaks my heart as much as her own palpable dismay. So, tomorrow, should we cross paths again, I will endeavor to help her in any way I can."
- Notes from Lady Sempescu's diary
name: Solitude

description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Aftershock</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Hextech Transmogulator</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Progress Day!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting Aftershock, Hextech Transmogulator, or Progress Day! in hand.
flavorText: "You won't find a finer set of pieces anywhere in the world, good sir. My daughter put her heart into every last detail." - Corin Reveck
name: Piltovan Tellstones
