description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Shady Character</style></link> or <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Chempunk Shredder</style></link> in hand and reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting Shady Character or Chempunk Shredder in hand and reduce its cost by 1.
flavorText: Zaun's best night life is invite-only. If you're not in the band, you've gotta really be somebody to snag a spot. Or find a ticket on the ground.
name: Discreet Invitation

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> and "<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Draw 1."
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Elusive and "Nexus Strike: Draw 1."
flavorText: "You guys won't BELIEVE what I found today!" - Sumpsnipe Scavenger
name: Scavenged Camocloaker

description: To play, discard up to 2 cards. Create that many followers from your regions that cost 1 more and reduce their costs by 1.
descriptionRaw: To play, discard up to 2 cards. Create that many followers from your regions that cost 1 more and reduce their costs by 1.
flavorText: Down in the depths of Zaun, the locals are forced to turn the scraps and the dregs they salvage into workable material. After decades of practice, they've become rather good at it.
name: Salvaged Scrap

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 1, then I gain Power equal to your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Tentacle</style></link>'s Power this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Spawn 1, then I gain Power equal to your strongest Tentacle's Power this round.
levelupDescription: I've seen <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Tentacles</style></link> or I deal 15+ damage. <style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen Tentacles or I deal 15+ damage.
flavorText: The "Eye of Nagakabouros" is merely a name, but Illaoi takes it as a challenge to live as if her god is a constant--and easily-bored--companion.
name: Illaoi

description:
When you <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link>, increase its <nobr>value by 1.</nobr>
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 1, then fully heal your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Tentacle</style></link> and I gain stats equal to its stats this round.
descriptionRaw:
When you Spawn, increase its value by 1.
Attack: Spawn 1, then fully heal your strongest Tentacle and I gain stats equal to its stats this round.
flavorText: A life lesson: If ever you have the chance to leap from the rigging of a fine ship and crash like thunderous repentance upon your foes, do so. It is most invigorating.
name: Illaoi

description:
<link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 2, then your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Tentacle</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Illaoi</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Spawn 2, then your strongest Tentacle and an enemy strike each other.
Create an Illaoi in your deck.
flavorText: "Life is a test. And pain is the teacher more often than we might like." - Illaoi
name: Illaoi's Tentacle Smash

flavorText: There is no greater symbol of what lurks below. Whether it means you harm or not is irrelevant to the fear--the panic that rises in your chest. Nature supplies spectacle, but your mind supplies intent.
name: Tentacle

description: I have +1|+0 for each different round you've damaged the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: I have +1|+0 for each different round you've damaged the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Ain't no place bloodier in Bilgewater than the bay. Just look at them rats. Reared on blood, they are. Can't get enough o' the stuff. Creepy little scrits." - Jagged Butcher
name: Wharf Rat

description:
Once you're <link=keyword.Deep><sprite name=Deep><style=Keyword>Deep</style></link>, heal your allies and Nexus 3. 
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Once you're Deep, heal your allies and Nexus 3.
flavorText:
"What does it want?!"
"It... it's after the oranges!"
"By the Bearded Lady, JUST GIVE IT THE WHOLE BUSHEL!" - Unlucky sailors
name: Megatusk

description:
<link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 2.
Draw 2.
descriptionRaw:
Spawn 2.
Draw 2.
flavorText: Nagakabouros is a god of providence--provided one survives the act of worship.
name: Eye of Nagakabouros

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 2. Then, if your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> <link=card.tentacle><style=AssociatedCard>Tentacle</style></link> has 12+ Power, create a <link=card.spell><style=AssociatedCard>Nagakabouros' Tantrum</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Spawn 2. Then, if your strongest Tentacle has 12+ Power, create a Nagakabouros' Tantrum in hand.
flavorText: "The Mother Serpent. The Great Kraken. The Bearded Lady. Nagakabouros cares little for names, and less for the restless dead." - Illaoi
name: Nagakabouros

description: <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Nagakabouros</style></link> starts a free attack with 4 <link=card.unitRef><style=AssociatedCard>Nagakabouros' Tentacle</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Nagakabouros starts a free attack with 4 Nagakabouros' Tentacle.
flavorText: It is a common Buhru story that the land was once whole, and Nagakabouros shattered it into islands to provide greater challenge for navigators. It's a story, of course. Nagakabouros didn't shatter the land. Nobody questions, however, whether she could if she felt like it.
name: Nagakabouros' Tantrum

description: When I'm summoned, grow my stats to that of your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> <link=card.tentacle><style=AssociatedCard>Tentacle</style></link> and grant me its keywords.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grow my stats to that of your strongest Tentacle and grant me its keywords.
flavorText: "To say you've witnessed Nagakabouros after seeing her tendrils is to say you know the sun after witnessing daylight. Nagakabouros is more than enormous. Nagakabouros is unending." - Falaweh, Buhru Priestess
name: Nagakabouros' Tentacle

description: When I'm summoned, grow my stats to that of your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> <link=card.tentacle><style=AssociatedCard>Tentacle</style></link> and grant me its keywords.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grow my stats to that of your strongest Tentacle and grant me its keywords.
flavorText: "To say you've witnessed Nagakabouros after seeing her tendrils is to say you know the sun after witnessing daylight. Nagakabouros is more than enormous. Nagakabouros is unending." - Falaweh, Buhru Priestess
name: Nagakabouros' Tentacle

description: When I'm summoned, grow my stats to that of your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> <link=card.tentacle><style=AssociatedCard>Tentacle</style></link> and grant me its keywords.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grow my stats to that of your strongest Tentacle and grant me its keywords.
flavorText: "To say you've witnessed Nagakabouros after seeing her tendrils is to say you know the sun after witnessing daylight. Nagakabouros is more than enormous. Nagakabouros is unending." - Falaweh, Buhru Priestess
name: Nagakabouros' Tentacle

description: When I'm summoned, grow my stats to that of your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> <link=card.tentacle><style=AssociatedCard>Tentacle</style></link> and grant me its keywords.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grow my stats to that of your strongest Tentacle and grant me its keywords.
flavorText: "To say you've witnessed Nagakabouros after seeing her tendrils is to say you know the sun after witnessing daylight. Nagakabouros is more than enormous. Nagakabouros is unending." - Falaweh, Buhru Priestess
name: Nagakabouros' Tentacle

description:
Deal 3 to an enemy unit.
<link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 3.
Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 3 to an enemy unit.
Spawn 3.
Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "We learn as children to ride the dangerous waters. To struggle is to die. It is natural that the first trial a priestess must overcome is forgetting this lesson; to battle the undertow with all her might. For a Truth Bearer is not the swimmer--she is the current." - Illaoi
name: Riptide Sermon

description: Deal 1 to anything, then <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to anything, then Rally.
flavorText: Not much keeps the circling sharks of Ripper's Bay away. Once they've had a taste of blood, they're eager for more.
name: Blood in the Water

description: <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 2, then your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Tentacle</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Spawn 2, then your strongest Tentacle and an enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Life is a test. And pain is the teacher more often than we might like." - Illaoi
name: Tentacle Smash

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 1 and give your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Tentacle</style></link> <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Spawn 1 and give your strongest Tentacle Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: Summoning Nagakabouros involves little in the way of ritual or rite. She answers the call of those whose soul can rise to match the ocean's, every swell, every thrash. It is a battle few can withstand.
name: The Sea's Voice

description: <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 2, or spend 5 mana to <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 4 instead.
descriptionRaw: Spawn 2, or spend 5 mana to Spawn 4 instead.
flavorText: Prayer to Nagakabouros is not about supplication, nor about asking and receiving. Hers is a blessing not unlike life: strive, struggle, push, and occasionally, reward will find you.
name: Answered Prayer

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 2 to me and <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 1.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Deal 2 to me and Spawn 1.
flavorText: When terrors swarm out from the Shadow Isles, the idol glows bright--a blazing beacon on the horizon.
name: Watchful Idol

description: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a follower you can afford.
descriptionRaw: Manifest a follower you can afford.
flavorText:
"Alright, Baz. You sure you wanna try again?"
"Third time's a charm, Gav. Besides, I reckon we've fought everything this stinkin' city's got goin' for it."
"Fought, and lost, Baz." - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
name: Ransom Riches

description: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a non-champion card from the opponent's hand. <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: I cost 1 less.
descriptionRaw: Manifest a non-champion card from the opponent's hand. Plunder: I cost 1 less.
flavorText: "FIVE aces? Looks like I win again!" - Pool Shark
name: Swindle

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Spawn 3.
flavorText: Life is sweetest in simplicity. Salt spray in your face, birdsong in your ears... and an uncomplicated foe on the horizon.
name: Buhru Lookout

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: A 1 cost ally starts a free attack.
descriptionRaw: Play: A 1 cost ally starts a free attack.
flavorText: "Recall the ocean's wisdom! If you do not move, you will be moved! Follow my voice if you've lost your way--for your foe surely knows their own."
name: Buhru Leader

description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.cardA><style=AssociatedCard>More Powder!</style></link>, <link=card.cardB><style=AssociatedCard>Playful Trickster</style></link>, or <link=card.cardC><style=AssociatedCard>Chum the Waters</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting More Powder!, Playful Trickster, or Chum the Waters in hand.
flavorText: "Don't try to catch someone bluffin' in a match of 'stones. Bilgewater's full of good liars. If you really wanna win, you gotta watch the hands." - Twisted Fate
name: Bilgewater Tellstones

description: When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
flavorText: Evelynn's first encounter with Steem was a violent, thrilling affair. Evelynn remembered how he smiled with unbridled pleasure as she flayed him, and how he returned the suffering just as eagerly when it was his turn. After finally overpowering Steem, Evelynn chose then not to destroy the lesser demon, but to bind him to her forever. Perhaps, she thought, they could share their mutual love for butchery with the world.
name: Steem

description: <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 2.
descriptionRaw: Spawn 2.
flavorText: Prayer to Nagakabouros is not about supplication, nor about asking and receiving. Hers is a blessing not unlike life: strive, struggle, push, and occasionally, reward will find you.
name: Answered Prayer

description: <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 4.
descriptionRaw: Spawn 4.
flavorText: Prayer to Nagakabouros is not about supplication, nor about asking and receiving. Hers is a blessing not unlike life: strive, struggle, push, and occasionally, reward will find you.
name: Answered Prayer

description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give other allies +0|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Daybreak: Give other allies +0|+2 this round.
flavorText: Stellacorns are born of stars, with some burning hotter than others.
name: Solari Stellacorn

description: Fully heal an ally, then grow its Power to equal its Health.
descriptionRaw: Fully heal an ally, then grow its Power to equal its Health.
flavorText: "We must show ourselves compassion first of all. The rest will follow." - Soraka
name: Consult the Heavens

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 3</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Inviolus Vox</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3: Summon Inviolus Vox.
flavorText: "It is said the celestial dragons are born from the nebulae themselves, springing forth fully formed from hazy cosmic dust. But how would we mere mortals know? From far away, all we see is their light." - Herald of Dragons
name: Dragon Roost

description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a low, medium, and high cost Celestial card.
descriptionRaw: Invoke a low, medium, and high cost Celestial card.
flavorText: "The stars, they are foretelling great potential. Something is coming. What shape will they take? It is not for me to know! What do you think, Kulun?" - Moondreamer
name: Celestial Trifecta

description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.spell1><style=AssociatedCard>Wish</style></link>, <link=card.spell2><style=AssociatedCard>Paddle Star</style></link>, or <link=card.spell3><style=AssociatedCard>Blessing of Targon</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting Wish, Paddle Star, or Blessing of Targon in hand.
flavorText: "It's the strangest thing, Shorin... Even without turning the stone over, I know exactly what constellation is painted on it." - Tyari the Traveler
name: Targonian Tellstones

description:
When I'm summoned, plant a <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chime</style></link> on the top card of your deck.
<link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +1|+1.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, plant a Chime on the top card of your deck.
Support: Grant my supported ally +1|+1.
flavorText:
"...but I heard Esmus was created by the Caretaker himself, and with her birth, sound came to the world!"
"I say lies! It is known that Esmus bears the face of an old singer who had the heart of an angel but the voice of the dead... until Bard himself granted her a voice of pure beauty!"
"I say lies! Esmus is..."
- An instance of the Birth of Esmus, a popular bard's game
name: Esmus, Breath of the World

description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give other allies +2|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Nightfall: Give other allies +2|+1 and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText:
"Mother Moon, lend us your strength,
Though darkness surrounds us,
With your light, we shall overcome."
- Lunari prayer
name: The Winding Light

description: When I'm summoned or when I count down, plant 3 <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chimes</style></link> on random cards in your deck. <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or when I count down, plant 3 Chimes on random cards in your deck. Countdown 2: Draw 1.
flavorText: "Then I seen it--thousands of 'em, all singin' and dancin' this way and that-un. Next thing I know, I seen a flash o' light, and they’re all gone, the temple with 'em–not a stone to see. And in me hands? Well Old Gaff was left there holdin' a chime." - Old Gaff’s tale, part 3
name: Mystic Vortex

description: My <link=keyword.Fated><sprite name=Fated><style=Keyword>Fated</style></link> buffs are granted to allied <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Starhound Packs</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: My Fated buffs are granted to allied Starhound Packs everywhere.
flavorText: The starhounds could not be beckoned or persuaded by climbers on their journey. They were aloof, seemingly inured to the mountain's magics.
name: Starhound Pack

description: Grant an ally +1|+2 and remove all negative keywords from it.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+2 and remove all negative keywords from it.
flavorText: Those that hear the bell ring are struck by the purity of its tone.
name: Mikhael's Blessing

description:
When I'm summoned, grant me all positive keywords allies have had this game.
When I see an ally with a new positive keyword, grant it to me. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant me all positive keywords allies have had this game.
When I see an ally with a new positive keyword, grant it to me.
flavorText: "We had heard tales of Void breaches before, and the devastation that came with them. But to see it myself... I don't know that I will ever rid my eyes of that sight, or my heart of that horror." - Belveth survivor
name: Void Abomination

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant a unit and me each other's positive keywords.  <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant a unit and me each other's positive keywords.
flavorText: "It spoke to me as... as if it knew me. Like it wanted me to meet... something..." - Kai'Sa
name: Hive Herald

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you have the attack token, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Second Skin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Second Skin in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've Evolved.
flavorText: Just a few days prior, Kai'Sa noticed her second skin bristling with new excitement, pulling her with ever-increasing vigor toward the Shuriman coast. Something was wrong, and as Kai'Sa neared Belveth, she soon realized the scale of the horror unfolding before her.
name: Kai'Sa

description: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> an allied landmark that has been destroyed this game and summon it.
descriptionRaw: Manifest an allied landmark that has been destroyed this game and summon it.
flavorText: “A moment in time, preserved.” - Zilean
name: Rite of Passage

description: When an enemy is <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenged</style></link>, give it -2|-0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When an enemy is Challenged, give it -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: Their sanity withered away like dunes in the wind--and in its place, a seed of anger flourished into a fury no desert waters could quench.
name: Baccai Witherclaw

description: <style=Variable></style>
flavorText: Shalatai reeled at the horror before her. There lay Ferai, the kind butcher's daughter, crushed to death. Beside her was Gorrub, the fisherman's son, still reaching toward his love with lifeless hands. So many memories gone. So many lives lost. With a grimace, Shalatai turned to the evil, ready to give her life to save the rest of her people.
name: Belvethi Elder

description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Ruthless Predator</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Weight of Judgment</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Spirit Fire</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting Ruthless Predator, Weight of Judgment, or Spirit Fire in hand.
flavorText: "A game of Tellstones is never about who wins--it's about how great you look while playing!" - Akshan
name: Shuriman Tellstones

description: Deal 1 for each positive keyword <link=card.level2><style=AssociatedCard>Kai'Sa</style></link> has to enemies or the enemy Nexus  (lowest health first).
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 for each positive keyword Kai'Sa has to enemies or the enemy Nexus  (lowest health first).
flavorText: "Hit and move!" - Kai'Sa
name: Icathian Rain

description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you have the attack token, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Second Skin</style></link> in hand.
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 for each positive keyword I have to enemies or the enemy Nexus (lowest health first).
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Second Skin in hand.
Attack: Deal 1 for each positive keyword I have to enemies or the enemy Nexus (lowest health first).
flavorText: Kai'Sa worked as fast as she could. Another salvo tore through another abomination, sending it crashing to the ground. She had learned how to fight the Void long ago, but these creatures... they were different.
name: Kai'Sa

description: Grant allied <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kai'Sas</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> another ally's positive keywords.
descriptionRaw: Grant allied Kai'Sas everywhere another ally's positive keywords.
flavorText: "I'm learning." - Kai'Sa
name: Second Skin

description:
Grant an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kai'Sa</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally Overwhelm and SpellShield.
Create a Kai'Sa in your deck.
flavorText: "I'll show you how to fight." - Kai'Sa
name: Kai'Sa's Supercharge

description: Give enemies -2|-0 this round. Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Instant Century</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Give enemies -2|-0 this round. Create a Fleeting Instant Century in hand.
flavorText: The sands of time flow without thought or consideration. Theirs is a scheme of cruel indifference, but not all are slave to its callous machinations...
name: Sands of Time

description:
I cost 2 less for each different Ascended ally you've played this game.
<link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a card from the Emperor's Deck with cost 9 or less.
descriptionRaw:
I cost 2 less for each different Ascended ally you've played this game.
Manifest a card from the Emperor's Deck with cost 9 or less.
flavorText: “Look upon our work--look what we have built!” - Azir
name: Glory's Call

description: When you summon a champion, destroy me to grant it +2|+1 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you summon a champion, destroy me to grant it +2|+1 and SpellShield.
flavorText: Nasus emerged from the sarcophagus, his mind clear and his wounds fully healed. He scribbled a few notes and peered at the sarcophagi hanging high above, pondering the mental state of the beastly aberrations resting within. Time would tell if this magic could bring the baccai back from their insanity, a magic the other Ascended had once protested. But they were gone now and Renekton and his madness were not. Nasus scribbled a few more words, hoping he had finally found a way to save his brother.
name: Chamber of Renewal

description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally Overwhelm and SpellShield.
flavorText: "I'll show you how to fight." - Kai'Sa
name: Supercharge

description: Deal 1 to a follower. If you've <link=keyword.Evolve><sprite name=Evolve><style=Keyword>Evolved</style></link>, deal  3 to a unit instead.  <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a follower. If you've Evolved, deal  3 to a unit instead.
flavorText: "Hurts, doesn't it?" - Kai'Sa
name: Void Seeker

description:
While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
flavorText: Dharna remembered throwing open the windows that morning and smelling the freshly baked loaves. Down the way, fishermen had already began hauling the day's catch up to the noon markets. She remembered smiling, thinking it would be a fine day.
name: Voidling

description: <style=Variable></style>
flavorText: The Void eruption in the city of Belveth was both sudden and terrifying. Most of the civilians were terrified by the chaos that quickly enveloped the city, and fled for safety as fast as they were able. Most, but not Koyemi.
name: Void Blaster

description:
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +1|+0.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +1|+0.
flavorText: Sometimes, all the powerful want is to feel powerless.
name: Domination

description: Grant allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Grant allies +1|+1.
flavorText: "No more hiding! Step into the light, and shine brightly with me!" - Lux
name: Inspiring Light

description: Other allies and your Nexus have <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Other allies and your Nexus have Tough.
flavorText: "I couldn't help but overhear your fervent whispering, dear wife. I advise you to exercise more caution when discussing family matters in so public a place. You can never be certain who might be listening."
name: Lord Eldred, Mageseeker Leader

description: Give an ally +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round or summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Honored Lord</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+2 and Challenger this round or summon an Honored Lord.
flavorText: "At once, King Jarvan. We shall see it done at any cost." - Barrett Buvelle, Honored Lord
name: Royal Decree

description:
ALL spells cost 2 more.
<link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>.
descriptionRaw:
ALL spells cost 2 more.
Countdown 2.
flavorText: Mageseekers place towering petricite obelisks throughout their compounds, ensuring that even the strongest mages are rendered completely powerless.
name: Petricite Pillar

description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Prismatic Barrier</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Detain</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>For Demacia!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting Prismatic Barrier, Detain, or For Demacia! in hand.
flavorText: "Why do they call it 'King's Gambit'? Queens take risks, too!" - Cithria of Cloudfield
name: Demacian Tellstones

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Draw a unit. If it's a Dragon, summon it attacking.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Draw a unit. If it's a Dragon, summon it attacking.
flavorText: "Luckily, my research suggests that broodfathers spend most of their time hunting a good distance from their young. It goes without saying that if the male should return, we would all be dragon food! Ha ha!" - Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
name: Protective Broodfather

description: Give an ally +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+2 and Challenger this round.
flavorText: "At once, King Jarvan. We shall see it done at any cost." - Barrett Buvelle, Honored Lord
name: Royal Decree

description: Summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Honored Lord</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon an Honored Lord.
flavorText: "At once, King Jarvan. We shall see it done at any cost." - Barrett Buvelle, Honored Lord
name: Royal Decree

description: Summon a random Husk and grant it +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Summon a random Husk and grant it +1|+0.
levelupDescriptionRaw: Missing Translation
flavorText: "Closer, love..." - Evelynn
name: Allure

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: When another ally gains Power from <link=keyword.Hallowed><sprite name=Hallowed><style=Keyword>Hallowed</style></link>, so do I. <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: When another ally gains Power from Hallowed, so do I. Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I have dealt 10+ damage.
flavorText: Gwen snip-snip-snipped her way through the Black Mist, thinking it strange how completely it enveloped the area, and once she had, the enchanted manse stood out amongst the bleak woods like a beacon. Little wonder Gwen was drawn to it. How curious it was--but also, how grand!
name: Gwen

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "To pieces!" - Gwen
name: Snip Snip!

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus one time for every 2 power <link=card.parent><style=AssociatedCard>Gwen</style></link> has. (<style=Variable></style>max 50 times, min 2 times)
descriptionRaw: Drain 1 from the enemy Nexus one time for every 2 power Gwen has. (max 50 times, min 2 times)
flavorText: "To pieces!" - Gwen
name: Snip Snip Snip!

description:
Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to an enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Gwen</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to an enemy.
Create a Gwen in your deck.
flavorText: "Needles out!" - Gwen
name: Gwen's Thread the Needle

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>:  When another ally gains Power from <link=keyword.Hallowed><sprite name=Hallowed><style=Keyword>Hallowed</style></link>, so do I. <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus one time for every 2 Power I have.
descriptionRaw: Attack:  When another ally gains Power from Hallowed, so do I. Drain 1 from the enemy Nexus one time for every 2 Power I have.
flavorText: She knew that the Black Mist must be driven back from wherever it had spread to, and the joy and light these spirits lent her efforts cut through it readily. If she could help their celebration in the meantime, all the better!
name: Gwen

description: Kill an ally to deal 3 to a unit and summon a random Husk.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to deal 3 to a unit and summon a random Husk.
flavorText: "Be as loud as you like." - Evelynn
name: Hate Spike

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Revive an attacking <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of the  <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> dead ally other than <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Eternal Dancers</style></link> with my power or less.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Revive an attacking Ephemeral copy of the  strongest dead ally other than Eternal Dancers with my power or less.
flavorText: It's always easier to join someone on the dance floor than be the first person on it. The twins, however, are always delighted to show others how it's done.
name: Eternal Dancers

description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <nobr><link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Mark of the Isles</style></link></nobr>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Spirit Journey</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Crumble</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Fleeting Mark of the Isles, Spirit Journey, or Crumble in hand.
flavorText: "Polished... decorations. Tokens... learn rules. Curious game. Breathtaking... unparalleled craftsmanship... unforgettable." - Recovered journal
name: Shadow Isles Tellstones

description: Revive an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> dead allied follower and give enemies -1|-0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Revive an Ephemeral copy of the strongest dead allied follower and give enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavorText: Spirits can be banished for a time, but they always return.
name: Harrowing Return

flavorText: Their repertoire was impressive, from minuets and waltzes to ballads and folk songs, but truth be told, the party's guests were dying for something new.
name: Ghastly Band

description: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to an enemy.
flavorText: "Needles out!" - Gwen
name: Thread the Needle

description: When I'm summoned,  summon a random Husk.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned,  summon a random Husk.
flavorText: Unlike other demons, who lure their victims in with false pretenses, Vora is too single-minded in her craving, too overwhelmed by desire. Rather than a predator who stalks her food, she is a wild beast who must be fed.
name: Vora

description: Summon two <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Ghastly Bands</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon two Ghastly Bands.
flavorText: "Keep it lively! Double-time!" - Conductor of the Mists
name: Strike Up The Band

description: Create copies in hand of 2 allied followers that have died this game.
descriptionRaw: Create copies in hand of 2 allied followers that have died this game.
flavorText: "Here we are, dear. I hear tonight will be quite a splendid affair, and I suspect we'll see many familiar faces!" - Ghostly Reveler
name: Formal Invitation

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Ghastly Band</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create a Ghastly Band in hand.
flavorText: "Play on, my friends! We will have a livelier concert than ever before!"
name: Conductor Of The Mists

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Revive the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> dead ally.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 2: Revive the strongest dead ally.
flavorText: The sound of sword on shield was like a death knell, and it drew forth spirits whose tethers to the world had not quite been cut, whose will could not be quelled even in death.
name: Haunted Tomb

flavorText:
"We CORDIALLY INVITE you to the party of a lifetime at THE MIDNIGHT REVEL. Join us in celebration at PORCELAIN MANSE for drink, dance, and delight! (Celebrations to end promptly at the 13th hour)" 
- An invitation written in elegant cursive
name: Boisterous Host

flavorText: What would a fancy party be without fancy refreshments?
name: Phantom Butler

description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
<link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from a unit.
descriptionRaw:
Toss 3.
Drain 2 from a unit.
flavorText: Even in the Shadow Isles, old growth still finds new purpose.
name: Undergrowth

flavorText: Whether he was a ghost, a memory, or a dream, something about him was familiar...
name: Ghostly Paramour

description: When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
flavorText:
"Beware those who smile on these haunted isles. Perhaps they are too newly arrived to understand the brutality of this place. Perhaps they are crazed. Perhaps they are something else entirely. But beware."
- Notes from Jens Tommen
name: Sultur

description: Draw an ally with 5+ Power, or grow an ally to 5 Power this round.
descriptionRaw: Draw an ally with 5+ Power, or grow an ally to 5 Power this round.
flavorText: "Few are given the opportunity to serve in the Trifarian Legion. Do not squander this chance." - Trifarian Assessor
name: Legionary Charge

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grow my Power to that of the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>equipped</style></link> ally this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grow my Power to that of the strongest equipped ally this round.
flavorText:
“Been having dreams again, hearing that voice in the dark. Ten years... a whole bloody decade spent as the empire's obedient dog. Go there. Kill that. And for what? The glory of Noxus? Glory’s a pretty lie, and I fell for it. But no more. Kayn’s shown me a different path, and it leads to vengeance.”
- Royce, The Butcher’s journal
name: Noxian Defector

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: The <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy and I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Round End: The Strongest enemy and I strike each other.
flavorText: Ancient muscles flexed once more. The warrior heard her general's call, and knew where she was needed--south, in the lands she once known as Icathia.
name: Naganeka of Zuretta

flavorText: The steppes of eastern Valoran were known to be barren, unfit to feed or home the Noxii people. But as the centuries fell by, a new empire was founded, hungry for expansion. Fallow lands found new fertility under new farming techniques, and weapons once thought safely buried become uncovered once again.
name: The Darkin Ballista

description: Draw an ally with 5+ Power.
descriptionRaw: Draw an ally with 5+ Power.
flavorText: "Few are given the opportunity to serve in the Trifarian Legion. Do not squander this chance." - Trifarian Assessor
name: Legionary Charge

description: Grow an ally to 5 Power this round.
descriptionRaw: Grow an ally to 5 Power this round.
flavorText: "Few are given the opportunity to serve in the Trifarian Legion. Do not squander this chance." - Trifarian Assessor
name: Legionary Charge

description: When I'm summoned, I <link=vocab.Improvise><style=Vocab>Improvise</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, I Improvise.
flavorText: Trisk’s life was turned upside down when, during what would be her last fishing tournament, she somehow managed to fish up a sputtering Jax. He refuses to discuss the incident, but the sea monster Trisk rescued him from gets bigger each time she retells it.
name: Ionian Hookmaster

description: You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Naganeka of Zuretta</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: You may spend 8 mana to play me as Naganeka of Zuretta.
flavorText: The steppes of eastern Valoran were known to be barren, unfit to feed or home the Noxii people. But as the centuries fell by, a new empire was founded, hungry for expansion. Fallow lands found new fertility under new farming techniques, and weapons once thought safely buried become uncovered once again.
name: The Darkin Ballista

description: <link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Deal 1 to my supported ally to grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Support: Deal 1 to my supported ally to grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: "It's rather fun, feeding the birds. I wagered with poor Feoward that they'd sup blood as keenly as a Bordent basilisk, and lo and behold: the pigeons are Noxian indeed!" - Edvin Cortain, Crimson Curator
name: Crimson Pigeon

description: Deal 2 to an ally to give allies +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an ally to give allies +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "It's not a feast until someone starts screaming. So scream, boy." - Vladimir
name: Reveler's Feast

flavorText: Vessid isn't the Bordent's fastest Reckoner, but when his great hammers find their target, there's never much of an opponent left to fight back.
name: Great Hammers

description: An <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: An Equipped ally strikes an enemy.
flavorText: "Brothers in blood, once again!" - Noxian Defector
name: Furious Wielder

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Reforge.
flavorText: For months, he'd slogged through the cold and the rain, a thankless task with no end in sight. And yet the end came. Finally, he would make something of himself.
name: Rune Squire

description: Destroy an enemy's equipment. An ally and that enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Destroy an enemy's equipment. An ally and that enemy strike each other.
flavorText:
"One two, watch him scream,
The soldier's caught on fi-re,
three four, watch him burn,
Tibbers wants a py-re!" - Annie
name: Brutal Skirmish

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>Grandmaster at Arms</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>The Light of Icathia</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: Grandmaster at Arms.
Auto-Equip: The Light of Icathia.
levelupDescription: Equipped allies have struck for 12+ damage. <style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Equipped allies have struck for 12+ damage.
flavorText: Centuries ago, Jax lost his homeland to the Void. Now, he travels the world, searching for warriors with the strength of will--and the sheer gall--to one day stand against that terrible foe.
name: Jax

description: If <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jax</style></link> has leveled, <link=card.selfref><style=AssociatedCard>The Light of Icathia</style></link> has <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: If Jax has leveled, The Light of Icathia has Overwhelm.
flavorText: "It's a stick with a heavy bit at the end. Weapon enough for me." - Jax
name: The Light of Icathia

description:
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link> <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>The Light of Icathia</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +1|+1 for each <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>equipped</style></link> ally this round.
descriptionRaw:
Auto-Equip The Light of Icathia.
Attack: Give me +1|+1 for each equipped ally this round.
flavorText: "Icathia's been quiet a long time. But while I'm still standin', her people's roar will echo forever!" - Jax
name: Jax

description: You may put any Weaponmaster cards into your deck during deckbuilding.
descriptionRaw: You may put any Weaponmaster cards into your deck during deckbuilding.
name: Grandmaster at Arms

description:
Give <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jax</style></link> <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round and <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> him.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jax</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give Jax Barrier this round and Forge him.
Shuffle a Jax into your deck.
flavorText: "That's right, eyes on the champ!" - Jax
name: Jax's Counter Strike

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Rune Mage</style></link>.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Delve Into The Pasts</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Rune Mage.
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create 2 Delve Into The Pasts in your deck.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I see 3+ unique World Runes.
flavorText: Ryze crested the ridge, accompanied by Kayle's silent servant. He looked down on a land scarred by war, and caught sight of the darkin monstrosities warring below. For centuries, he had watched on as humanity veered from one catastrophe to another. What if, he thought, his efforts were futile, and Runeterra was doomed to die?"
name: Ryze

description:
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link>, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Played</style></link> or activated, deal 2 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm Played, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm Played or activated, deal 2 to the weakest enemy.
flavorText: Of all the wrongs Ryze had witnessed in his time on Runeterra, this cut the deepest. How could his own master, who inculcated in Ryze the virtues of control and patience, lose himself so fully to the World Runes? How?!
name: Shard of Betrayal

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an attacking enemy.
descriptionRaw: Stun an attacking enemy.
flavorText: "Enough!" - Ryze
name: Rune Prison

description:
Draw 3. Discard any followers drawn.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ryze</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 3. Discard any followers drawn.
Create a Ryze in your deck.
flavorText: "The shards will show me the path..." - Ryze
name: Ryze's Realm Warp

description:
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link>, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link> or activated, refill your spell mana.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm Played, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm Played or activated, refill your spell mana.
flavorText: Lust for power seemed a common trait among the Runeterrans. Even Targon's revered few craved it, and so when they realized that simple flattery could bring them the power of the stars themselves, they didn't hesitate.
name: Shard of Reverence

description:
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link>, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link> or activated, heal allied <link=card.ryze><style=AssociatedCard>Ryzes</style></link> and your Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm Played, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm Played or activated, heal allied Ryzes and your Nexus 2.
flavorText: Love. A fog that blinds the wise to reason, and that rids the patient of patience. Ryze watched on as the King lowered his beloved beneath the waters, and closed his eyes as the screaming began. Ryze felt the cold grip of undeath spread through the room, then beyond. All for love.
name: Shard of Hope

description: Deal 2 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to the weakest enemy.
flavorText: "THEY ARE MINE TO CONTROL! MINE!" - Tyrus
name: Overload

description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Delve Into The Pasts</style></link> in your deck.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Activate all your World Runes. If you have 5 unique World Runes, destroy the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create 2 Delve Into The Pasts in your deck.
Attack: Activate all your World Runes. If you have 5 unique World Runes, destroy the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Ryze pulled himself back to the present. The mindscapes he'd visited had answered his questions, and filled him with purpose. The flaws of Runeterra's people, great as they were, should not condemn them to oblivion.
name: Ryze

description:
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link>, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link> or activated, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Rune Prison</style></link> in hand or if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm Played, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm Played or activated, create a Rune Prison in hand or if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
flavorText: The god-warriors of Shurima were thought peerless. Perfect. But years of war against an unstoppable foe eventually bowed their spirits, then broke them entirely. Xolaani and Aatrox turned on each other in a dispute that soon threatened Runeterra's very existence.
name: Shard of Madness

description: Choose one of two World Runes you don't have in play or in hand and create it in hand. If you can't, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Choose one of two World Runes you don't have in play or in hand and create it in hand. If you can't, draw 1.
flavorText: Before him, the world teetered on the brink of apocalypse. Ryze had the power to save Runeterra, but as he watched the carnage unfolding ahead of him, a single question lingered in him: should he? He resolved to create mindscapes of Runeterra's pivotal moments, and let his understanding of the land's history decide its future.
name: Delve Into The Past

description:
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link>, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Played</style></link> or activated, draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm Played, if I'm unique, activate all your other World Runes.
When I'm Played or activated, draw 1.
flavorText: Ryze watched on as the mindscape before him constructed itself. Before him. the Icathians warred with Shurima in a desperate bid for freedom. Ryze knew too well what came next, but watched on regardless. Cruel purple tendrils burst out, engulfing the battlefield. Icathia reached for freedom, but in the darkness, unleashed the Void upon Runeterra.
name: Shard of Violence

description:
You may put any non-targeted <link=keyword.Burst><sprite name=Burst><style=Keyword>Burst</style></link> and <link=keyword.Focus><sprite name=Focus><style=Keyword>Focus</style></link> spells into your deck during deckbuilding.
At the start of the game, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Delve Into The Past</style></link> in your deck for each Ryze that started the game in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
You may put any non-targeted Burst and Focus spells into your deck during deckbuilding.
At the start of the game, create 2 Delve Into The Past in your deck for each Ryze that started the game in your deck.
flavorText: Can this world be saved? And if it can... should it?
name: The Rune Mage

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Shadow Reaper</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Scythe</style></link>.
When I kill an enemy, heal me 2.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Shadow Reaper.
Auto-Equip: The Darkin Scythe.
When I kill an enemy, heal me 2.
levelupDescription: I've <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> twice.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've struck twice. When I level up, Recall me.
flavorText: As another body fell, Kayn let out a gleeful laugh, knowing that he would soon unleash the second Darkin weapon that lay below. Within him, Rhaast's anticipation grew, knowing that Kayn’s undoing was finally near.
name: Kayn

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Corrupted Scythe</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant Corrupted Scythe +1|+1.
flavorText: As Kayn yielded his spirit to the Darkin, his anger subsided and an unbearable emptiness was left in its place. The young warrior was gone. Only Rhaast remained.
name: Corrupted Scythe

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow Scythe</style></link> +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant Shadow Scythe +2|+0.
flavorText: Kayn’s anger grew into a fearsome blaze amidst Rhaast's furious screams. The Darkin's hold on the shadow warrior burned away, and when Kayn rose to his feet, he knew the full power of the Darkin was his to command.
name: Shadow Scythe

description:
Give <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kayn</style></link> <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round. He starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kayn</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give Kayn Quick Attack this round. He starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
Create a Kayn in your deck.
flavorText: "No escape." - Kayn
name: Kayn's Shadowstep

description:
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>Corrupted Scythe</style></link>.
When I kill an enemy, fully heal me and heal your Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw:
Auto-Equip: Corrupted Scythe.
When I kill an enemy, fully heal me and heal your Nexus 2.
flavorText: Rhaast let out a triumphant howl. Years of waiting, yearning, and now... he was finally free. He lifted Xolaani’s blades and put them to his tongue, savoring the taste of fresh blood. He closed his eyes in bliss, and a smile crept across his face for the first time in millennia. The reaping had begun.
name: Rhaast

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Scythe</style></link> +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant The Darkin Scythe +1|+0.
flavorText:
“Time to reap.”
- Rhaast
name: The Darkin Scythe

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Transform me and all copies of me into <link=card.Rhaast><style=AssociatedCard>Rhaast</style></link> or <link=card.TheShadowAssassin><style=AssociatedCard>The Shadow Assassin</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Transform me and all copies of me into Rhaast or The Shadow Assassin.
flavorText: A fierce and sudden flash of anger overwhelmed Kayn, and a terrible, searing pain passed behind his eyes, bringing him to his knees. Rhaast’s triumphant laughter echoed all around him, mocking and merciless. He had known this day would come--the day he would finally prevail or lose himself to the Darkin...
name: Kayn

description: <link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow Scythe</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Auto-Equip: Shadow Scythe.
flavorText: Tremendous power flowed through his veins. Freed from the Darkin’s influence, the full power of the shadows was his to command. Kayn laughed, slipping into darkness, and emerged a moment later only to silently slit the throat of the guard before him.
name: The Shadow Assassin

description: You may put any Cultist cards into your deck during deckbuilding. Once you have summoned 4+ Cultist units, draw a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kayn</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: You may put any Cultist cards into your deck during deckbuilding. Once you have summoned 4+ Cultist units, draw a Kayn.
flavorText: Only two outcomes are possible: either Kayn bends Rhaast to his will, or he is consumed by it.
name: The Shadow Reaper

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Refill 1 spell mana
descriptionRaw: Attack: Refill 1 spell mana
flavorText: The monks of Hirana send unruly students to the fisherfolk for a lesson in patience. Only a handful ever choose to return to the monastery.
name: Combat Reel

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The World Ender</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Blade</style></link>.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>: Heal your Nexus 2 and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>World Ender</style></link> in hand if you don't have one.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The World Ender.
Auto-Equip: The Darkin Blade.
When I'm summoned or strike: Heal your Nexus 2 and create a World Ender in hand if you don't have one.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played World Ender.
flavorText: Even across continents, Aatrox felt her awakening. How the hatred still burned. He had already broken her statues, now he could wage a final war against the Coward of Icathia, and through destroying her, end this pitiful existence.
name: Aatrox

description: <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aatrox</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Aatrox and an enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Apocalypse comes!" - Aatrox
name: Deathbringer Descent

flavorText: "By my sword, this world must die." - Aatrox
name: The Darkin Blade

description:
I cost 1 less for each time an <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> or Darkin ally has struck this game.
<link=vocab.Assimilate><style=Vocab>Assimilate</style></link> allied followers <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> with Darkin.
descriptionRaw:
I cost 1 less for each time an Equipped or Darkin ally has struck this game.
Assimilate allied followers Equipped with Darkin.
flavorText: "Darkin! Awaken!" - Aatrox
name: World Ender

description:
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Blade</style></link>.
Darkin allies cost 5 less.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>: Heal your Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw:
Auto-Equip: The Darkin Blade.
Darkin allies cost 5 less.
When I'm summoned or strike: Heal your Nexus 2.
flavorText: The battle gathered pace. Xolaani had finally found the courage to face him, and as the two ancient enemies warred, the terrain itself began to wither and bend beneath their fury. An army of celestials descended upon them, desperate to save their dying land--but it was too late. Aatrox would have his day. He would find his peace.
name: Aatrox

description: You may put any non-Champion Darkin into your deck during deckbuilding. Once you've played or summoned 3+ different other Darkin, draw a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aatrox</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: You may put any non-Champion Darkin into your deck during deckbuilding. Once you've played or summoned 3+ different other Darkin, draw a Aatrox.
flavorText: Peace. Peace through war. Peace through death. Peace through oblivion.
name: The World Ender

description:
<link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aatrox</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Deathbringer Descent</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Aatrox and an enemy strike each other.
Create a Deathbringer Descent in hand.
flavorText: "I am the ender of worlds!" - Aatrox
name: Deathbringer Slash

description:
<link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aatrox</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Deathbringer Slash</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aatrox</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Aatrox and an enemy strike each other.
Create a Deathbringer Slash in hand.
Create a Aatrox in your deck.
flavorText: "I will break this land!" - Aatrox
name: Aatrox's Deathbringer Sweep

description: Give <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jax</style></link> <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round and <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> him.
descriptionRaw: Give Jax Barrier this round and Forge him.
flavorText: "That's right, eyes on the champ!" - Jax
name: Counter Strike

flavorText: Do NOT wash it with soap. Warm water or magic only.
name: Pan O' Pain

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Arrow of Retribution</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link> <link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Bow</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Arrow of Retribution.
Auto-Equip The Darkin Bow.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You have targeted 7+ allies.
flavorText: What if, over time, the man that became the Darkin remembered himself, prompted by the mortal voices within? What if, instead of overcoming those voices entirely, he came to believe in them?
name: Varus

description:
Give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and give an ally +1|+0 this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Chain of Corruption</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Give an enemy Vulnerable and give an ally +1|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Chain of Corruption in hand.
flavorText: "Pity those who cross me." - Varus
name: Chain of Corruption

description:
Give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and give an ally +1|+0 this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Chain of Corruption</style></link> in hand. 
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Varus</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an enemy Vulnerable and give an ally +1|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Chain of Corruption in hand. 
Create a Varus in your deck.
flavorText: "Pity those who cross me." - Varus
name: Varus' Chain of Corruption

description: When you play a spell or <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>equip</style></link> an ally, give me +1|+0 (max +5|+0) until the next time my bearer <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you play a spell or equip an ally, give me +1|+0 (max +5|+0) until the next time my bearer strikes.
flavorText: Heartlights Kai and Valmar were not the first to bear the bow and host Varus' inhuman power... but they were the first to remind him of his lost humanity.
name: The Darkin Bow

description:
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link> <link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Bow</style></link>. 
<link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Bow</style></link> activates twice and has max +10|+0.
descriptionRaw:
Auto-Equip The Darkin Bow. 
The Darkin Bow activates twice and has max +10|+0.
flavorText: Varus was empowered, bolstered, reminded of who he was and what he had yet to become. He embraced the sum of his parts instead of working against them--and when they acted, they acted as one.
name: Varus

description:
You may put any Cultist cards into your deck during deckbuilding.
Once you have played 3+ Cultist spells, draw a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Varus</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
You may put any Cultist cards into your deck during deckbuilding.
Once you have played 3+ Cultist spells, draw a Varus.
flavorText: "We will seek out our betrayers, and we will bring them oblivion." - Varus
name: The Arrow of Retribution

description: Draw 3. Discard any followers drawn.
descriptionRaw: Draw 3. Discard any followers drawn.
flavorText: "If I am to act, I must act now." - Ryze
name: Realm Warp

flavorText: Catch and release is an excellent tactic whether you're fishing or fighting.
name: Fishawhack

description: Give <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kayn</style></link> <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round. He starts a free attack challenging an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Give Kayn Quick Attack this round. He starts a free attack challenging an enemy.
flavorText: "No escape." - Kayn
name: Shadowstep

flavorText: The flavors in this pot are so good it hurts.
name: Pot O' Pain

flavorText: Her spectral guardian bursts from the amulet whenever Fireth is in danger. She seems to have no memory of these events, and aggressively denies its existence when her allies try to explain.
name: Sandworn Amulet

flavorText: This wrench is the only belonging Pesh brought with him when he made the move from Piltover to Bilgewater. It’s not magic or anything, though you might think otherwise when you see him put it to work.
name: The Fix-Em 5000

description:
<link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aatrox</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Deathbringer Slash</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Aatrox and an enemy strike each other.
Create a Deathbringer Slash in hand.
flavorText: "I will break this land!" - Aatrox
name: Deathbringer Sweep

flavorText: Fireth says her mother made this rake for her. Exactly where her mother found an artifact of the ancient empire, and exactly why she attached it to a rake, Fireth cannot say.
name: Upcycled Rake

flavorText: Chaska takes a philosophical approach to shepherding. Their flock is whomever happens to be in the vicinity.
name: Shepherd's Authority

description: The first time you <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>equip</style></link> an ally, <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: The first time you equip an ally, Forge it.
flavorText: Ornn made the living forge many, many years ago, and only went looking for it recently. He never once thought it might go looking for a new owner and wander off on its own.
name: Weaponsmith's Apprentice

description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Anaakca</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as Anaakca.
flavorText:
"Warmother, the grip of winter has tightened. The Avarosans have fled beyond their outposts. North is the sea... our only path leads east."
"Do not listen to him, Warmother. That way is the Pale, and beyond it, the whispering wilds. I say better to die than face that cursed land."
"How fortunate for you both that neither must decide my people's fate."
"True, Warmother. But perhaps there is a third way. Let me travel east. Better a scout is lost to darkness than all of our people."
- Warmother Sejuani conferring with her generals
name: The Darkin Spear

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> me with an exact copy of an ally's equipment or the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> equipment from hand.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> me twice.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Equip me with an exact copy of an ally's equipment or the strongest equipment from hand.
Attack: Forge me twice.
levelupDescription: An ally has struck for 8+ damage<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: An ally has struck for 8+ damage.
flavorText: If anyone asked Ornn why he had so little patience, he would answer simply that he did have patience. Tremendous patience, in fact, and that was why his work was incomparable. He simply did not have patience for PEOPLE. But nobody asked, and so he never answered.
name: Ornn

description:
<link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> an ally and deal 1 to all units, then do it again.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ornn</style></link> in deck.
descriptionRaw:
Forge an ally and deal 1 to all units, then do it again.
Create a Ornn in deck.
flavorText: "An iron will must be forged!" - Ornn
name: Ornn's Bellows Breath

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> me with an exact copy of an ally's equipment or the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> equipment from hand.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> me twice, then summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spirit of the Ram</style></link> with my stats.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Equip me with an exact copy of an ally's equipment or the strongest equipment from hand.
Attack: Forge me twice, then summon an attacking Spirit of the Ram with my stats.
flavorText: Some believe that when the world truly needs him, the chosen of Ornn will finally be able to find their god. Isn't that just the way of withdrawn, ornery gods? To be found only in the very last place you look?
name: Ornn

flavorText: "What remains after the fire is either forged, or melted. Better to be steel that takes shape than... something that burns away!" - Ornn
name: Spirit of the Ram

description: <link=vocab.Empowered><style=Vocab>Empowered</style></link> 8: <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Empowered 8: Regeneration.
flavorText: While troll aren't typically known for their intellect, they can be surprisingly ingenious.
name: Woolly Snailmoth

description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy. If you have <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> an ally this game, copy me.
descriptionRaw: Frostbite the strongest enemy. If you have Equipped an ally this game, copy me.
flavorText: Anaakca moved with such speed that the Freljord itself seemed to follow in her wake. Those who survived her butchery soon felt their skin freeze, and their hearts still.
name: The Unforgiving Cold

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time and Dedication</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Time and Dedication in hand.
flavorText: "My mother told me of Ornn, as her mother told her, and her mother before... and now I will tell you. Listen closely. Do not interrupt. Long ago, across a great, hot, churning sea..."
name: Favored Artisan

description: <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> an ally.
descriptionRaw: Forge an ally.
flavorText: "You may be worthy of this. Do not prove me wrong." - Ornn
name: Time and Dedication

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time and Dedication</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Fleeting Time and Dedication in hand.
flavorText: Alone in Hearth-Home's forge with nothing but the sound of the molten river's slow coursing below, and the ring of Hammer on anvil... he quite liked that.
name: Ornn's Forge

description:
Get an empty mana gem.
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Feral Mystic</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Get an empty mana gem.
Summon a Feral Mystic.
flavorText: "The spirits, the stars... again, they bring us together." - Hyara Allseer
name: Wild Mysticism

description: <link=vocab.Empowered><style=Vocab>Empowered</style></link> 3: <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Empowered 3: Overwhelm, Regeneration, and Tough.
flavorText: "Come on, you have to take your medicine! You won't feel better 'til you do!" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Pouty Poro

description: When I'm summoned, grant allies +1|+1 for each different subtype you’ve summoned this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant allies +1|+1 for each different subtype you’ve summoned this game.
flavorText: "...an' there was a BIG creature that cared for aaaaaaall of the LIL' creatures..." - Ingvar the Younger
name: Warden of the Tribes

description: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING or destroy a unit's equipment.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING or destroy a unit's equipment.
flavorText: The cold spares nothing and no one.
name: Fracture

description: Give an ally +0|+3 this round. If it's damaged, give it +2|+3 instead.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +0|+3 this round. If it's damaged, give it +2|+3 instead.
flavorText: "Do not worry, little poro. I am with you!" - Braum
name: Here to Help

description: <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> an ally and deal 1 to all units, then do it again.
descriptionRaw: Forge an ally and deal 1 to all units, then do it again.
flavorText: "An iron will must be forged!" - Ornn
name: Bellows Breath

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: From the top 6 cards of your deck, summon an attacking follower or non-Champion Darkin and grant it +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: From the top 6 cards of your deck, summon an attacking follower or non-Champion Darkin and grant it +1|+1.
flavorText: With newfound vigor, the great warrior Anaakca sped south through the Freljord and into Demacian lands. The outposts prepared as best they could to repel her assault, but no mere mortal would stand between Anaakca's fury and the coward who stoked it.
name: Anaakca

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText:
"Warmother, the grip of winter has tightened to the east. South, the Avarosans have fled beyond their outposts. North is the sea... our only path leads east."
"No, Warmother. That way is the Pale, and beyond it, the whispering wilds. I say better to die than face that cursed land."
"How fortunate for you both that neither must decide my people's fate."
"True, Warmother. But perhaps there is a third way. Let me travel East. Better a scout is lost to darkness than all of our people."
- Warmother Sejuani, conferring with her generals
name: The Darkin Spear

description: The first time I'm <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link>, create a 4 cost copy of me in hand. Grant it the equipment's stats.
descriptionRaw: The first time I'm Equipped, create a 4 cost copy of me in hand. Grant it the equipment's stats.
flavorText: Though he would not admit it, Ornn was quite pleased with the colossi. They served the exact purpose he assigned to them, and best of all, they did not speak.
name: Wrought Colossus

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> an ally twice and heal it and your Nexus 3.
descriptionRaw: Play: Forge an ally twice and heal it and your Nexus 3.
flavorText: The Hearthblood were gone, all of them, when Ornn decided to leave the world. Generations passed and their name was all but forgotten. More recently, however, the tales of Ornn resurfaced, and it was whispered that some had begun to return to the way of the Hearthblood.
name: Hearthblood Mender

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> an ally.
descriptionRaw: Play: Forge an ally.
flavorText: When Fiske had first envisioned an apprentice, he imagined someone dedicated, serious about their craft, strong, and capable. Kindra was none of those things. She was prone to daydreaming. She would rather play than work. She was always fussing with that silly little turtle of hers. However... she was learning. That was what mattered.
name: Adept Weaponsmith

description: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavorText: The cold spares nothing and no one.
name: Fracture

description: Destroy a unit's equipment.
descriptionRaw: Destroy a unit's equipment.
flavorText: The cold spares nothing and no one.
name: Fracture

description: Heal your Nexus 4 and grant all allies and equipment in your deck +1|+1. Draw 1 of them.
descriptionRaw: Heal your Nexus 4 and grant all allies and equipment in your deck +1|+1. Draw 1 of them.
flavorText: "Come, warm yourself by the fire." - Hearthblood Mender
name: Gift of the Hearthblood

flavorText: "Crunch!" - Tarkaz the Tribeless
name: Bone Club

description: Your <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equipped</style></link> allies have <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Your Equipped allies have Overwhelm.
flavorText: The Winter's Claw was right. The Avarosans HAD been too soft. It was time for a new leader, one that would not seek to unify the Freljord through peace, but rule over it.
name: Icevale Cultist
